src: 觉得很有意义的一本证书——急救证

hypo: A certificate that is deemed meaningful - First Aid certificate.

src: 这是我除了驾驶证之外一本觉得重要的技能证书之一！
tgt: I think this is one of the most important skill type certificate except for driving license!
hypo: This is one of the important skill certificates to me, apart from the driving license!

src: 普及一下：急救措施其实是做发生突发事件时候的应急救援，即在救护车来之前的抢救。
tgt: For your information: first aid measures refer to emergency rescue in emergencies, i.e., emergency treatment conducted before the coming of the ambulance.
hypo: Just to clarify: emergency treatment measures are actually emergency rescue measures when a sudden event occurs, that is, rescue before the arrival of an ambulance.

src: 众所周知，在事故发生后救护车来的过程中其实是还有一段时间的，而正是这段时间才是最关键的。
tgt: As everyone knows, there is a period before the coming of the ambulance after the accident happens, which is most critical.
hypo: As is well known, there is actually a period of time between the occurrence of an accident and the arrival of the ambulance, and it is precisely this period of time that is the most critical.

src: 这个时候便是需要急救的时候。
tgt: This period is the most important time for first aid.
hypo: is the time when emergency aid is needed.

src: 如果我真的发生了心脏病、脑溢血、呼吸骤停，那么我们生命的窗口只有四分钟，黄金四分钟！
tgt: If we suffer from heart attack, cerebral hemorrhage or respiratory arrest, our life window is only four minutes, the golden four minutes!
hypo: If I really have a heart attack, stroke, or respiratory arrest, then our window of life is only four minutes, the golden four minutes!

src: 所以身边的人懂得急救是多么重要呀！
tgt: So it is very important for those around us to know first aid!
hypo: So those around us who understand first aid are so important!

src: 当我们身边有人倒下的时候，我们可以通过专业的知识去对他进行抢救，而不是傻傻地站在那里一动不动什么也做不了，这种无助的感觉太让人感到可怕了。
tgt: When somebody falls down, we can conduct first aid with our professional knowledge, instead of doing nothing and only standing there; this helpless feeling is really frightening.
hypo: "When somebody falls around us, instead of just standing there doing nothing, which is a really frightening feeling, we can use our professional knowledge to perform first aid on them."

src: “在中国，我们官方数据每年有三百万人意外死亡，最危险的叫心脏骤停。
tgt: “In China, 3 million people die from accidents every year according to official data, and the most dangerous one is known as cardiac arrest.
hypo: official data, three million people die unexpectedly each year, and the most dangerous is called cardiac arrest.

src: 在美国全国是平均15%能救过来。
tgt: 15% of people of cardiac arrest can be brought back to life in the United States.
hypo: In the United States, on average, 15% can be brought back to life.

src: 在拉斯维加斯的赌场酒店，百分之七八十能救过来，上海、北京低于1%。”
tgt: In the Casino Hotel in Las Vegas, 70% or 80% of them can be brought back to life, and the proportion in Shanghai and Beijing is lower than 1%. ”
hypo: "At the casino hotels in Las Vegas, 70-80% can be saved, while in Shanghai and Beijing it is lower than 1%."

src: 这是第一反应创始人陆乐说的。
tgt: Said Lu Le, the founder of the First Reaction.
hypo: Said the founder of First Reaction, Lu Le.

src: 如果一个人发生了心脏骤停，呼吸没有了，心跳没有了，你掐人中是没有任何作用的。
tgt: Pinching philtrum has no effect at all if a person suffers from cardiac arrest and there is no sign of breathing or heartbeat.
hypo: If a person has cardiac arrest and there is no breathing or heartbeat, pinching the philtrum will have no effect.

src: 必须做人工呼吸、胸外按压才有可能把人救过来。
tgt: Artificial respiration and external chest compression are required to bring them back to life.
hypo: "To bring someone back to life, it is necessary to perform artificial respiration and external chest compression."

src: 我发现我们现在还很少人会有这种意识去学习急救，但是当事情发生的时候就来不及了，所以还是呼吁大家都去学习一下这个技能，让我们在面对突发状况的时候能够及时作出反应。
tgt: I found that very few people have the awareness to study first aid knowledge, but it will be too late once accident happens; therefore, I appeal to everyone to learn this skill, so that we can respond timely when faced with emergency situations.
hypo: "I found that currently very few people have the awareness to study first aid, but once an accident happens, it's too late. Therefore, I appeal to everyone to study this skill, so that we can respond promptly in the face of emergencies."

src: 说不定还能挽救一个人的生命！
tgt: We may bring somebody back to life with this skill!
hypo: Maybe it can save somebody's life back!

src: 急救证可以在你们当地的红十字会培训中心报名，我是在珠海的红十字会培训中心报名的，学生还有优惠呢。
tgt: People can apply for the certificate of first aid at your local Red Cross Training Center, and I applied for my certificate at the Red Cross Training Center in Zhuhai; students are offered with a discount.
hypo: You can apply for a first aid certificate at the Red Cross training center in your local area. I applied at the Red Cross training center in Zhuhai and there are discounts for students.

hypo: PS: The last picture is about the goals that I need to achieve before turning 25. Adding First Aid certification to the list was done a few months ago, but I did achieve it!

hypo: Next, I am going to take other certificates that I want to take. I plan to obtain a diving certificate. Previously, I saw on Xiaohongshu that there is also a Diving First Aid Certificate. It seems that I need to have the Aid Certificate of First before taking this certification. Therefore, the First Aid Certificate is actually very useful!

src: 郑州宜欣是国内混凝土检查井模块砖机设备，检查井砌块机械，井壁墙体模块机械专业的生产厂家，从半自动到全自动化生产线。
tgt: Zhengzhou Yixin is a specialized manufacturer of concrete inspection shaft module brick equipment, inspection shaft building block machinery and shaft wall module equipment, with semi-automatic and automatic production lines.
hypo: Zhengzhou Yixin is a professional manufacturer of domestic concrete inspection well module brick machines, inspection well block machinery, and wall module machinery, from semi-automatic to fully automated production lines.

src: 通过多年的实践和开发，现具备了质量过硬，主要生产液压式、移动式、全自动化检查井系列设备及配套装置。
tgt: Based on practice and development of many years, it is engaged in production of high quality hydraulic type, mobile type and automatic inspection shaft series of equipment and supporting devices.
hypo: "After years of practice and development, we now have high-quality production capabilities for hydraulic, mobile, and fully automated inspection well series equipment and supporting devices."

src: 检查井混凝土模块生产加工设备 郑州井壁砖模块设备组装现场：
tgt: Inspection shaft concrete module production and processing equipment, the assembly site for Zhengzhou shaft wall brick module equipment
hypo: Inspecting the production and processing equipment for concrete modules and assembling the Zhengzhou well brick module equipment on site.

src: 检查井混凝土模块生产加工设备 郑州井壁砖模块设备的特点及优势:
tgt: Inspection shaft concrete module production and processing equipment, the characteristics and advantages of Zhengzhou shaft wall brick module equipment
hypo: Check the characteristics and advantages of Zhengzhou's well brick module equipment for concrete module production and processing equipment.

src: 宜欣检查井砌块砖机设备广泛适用于煤、热、水、电、气等市政地下构筑物的新型砌筑材料。
tgt: Yixin inspection shaft module brick equipment is widely applied in new-type masonry materials for municipal underground structures for coal, heating, electricity and gas.
hypo: The Yixin inspection shaft brick machine equipment is widely applicable to new masonry materials for municipal underground constructions such as coal, heat, water, electricity, and gas.

src: 如：排水、储水设施的各类检查井、雨水口、方沟、化粪池及小型构筑物、桥梁翼墙等。
tgt: Foe example: various types of inspection shafts, gutter inlets, box drains, septic tanks, small-sized structures and wing walls of bridges for drainage and water storage facilities.
hypo: For drainage, various inspection wells, rainwater inlets, square ditches, chemical toilets and small structures, bridge wing walls, etc.

src: 使用混凝土模块筑建检查井的优势在于模块的上下左右四周均为凹凸槽结构，组合砌筑形成链锁。
tgt: The advantage of building inspection shafts using concrete modules is that the four sides of the modules are of concave groove structures, which are built to form chain locks.
hypo: The advantage of using concrete modules to build inspection wells lies in the fact that the modules have concave and convex groove structure on all four sides, which can be combined to form a chain-lock structure.

src: 井壁墙体抗剪力远优于平摩擦砌体的砌筑形式。
tgt: The shearing resistance of the shaft wall is far better than the masonry form of the flat friction of the brickwork.
hypo: The resistance to shearing of the well wall masonry is far superior to that of the flat friction brickwork construction.

src: 模块为中空结构，组合砌筑后纵向孔孔相通，横向孔孔相贯，孔芯浇注后，形成现浇混凝土网状结构，起到了二次补强和防水作用。
tgt: The modules are of hollow structure, with connected holes vertically and interpenetrated horizontally; the cast-in-place concrete mesh structure is formed after pouring of the cores of holes, playing the role of secondary reinforcement and waterproof.
hypo: The module is a hollow structure, and after being combined and built, the longitudinal holes are connected, and the transverse holes intersect. After pouring the hole core, a cast-in-place concrete mesh structure is formed, which plays a role in secondary reinforcement and waterproofing.

src: 模块纵横均设有插筋槽，横向卧筋、纵向插筋相应提高结构整体强度。
tgt: The joint bar grooves are equipped for modules vertically and horizontally; the horizontal and vertical joint bars can improve the overall strength of the structure.
hypo: "The modules are equipped with both transverse and longitudinal reinforcing rib grooves, which correspondingly improve the overall strength of the structure by enhancing the placement of horizontal lying bars and vertical inserted bars."

src: 另外使用混凝土检查井模块砌筑出来的检查井、排水井不容易出现坍塌，下沉，漏水等现象，井壁墙体模块机械性能稳定，操作简单，成形尺寸标准。
tgt: In addition, phenomena such as collapse, sink or water leakage are rare in the inspection shafts and pumping shafts laid with concrete inspection shaft modules, with stable mechanical performance in shaft wall modules, easy operation and standard forming size.
hypo: In addition, the inspection wells and drainage shafts built using concrete inspection well module are less likely to experience collapsing, sinking, leakage and other phenomena. The mechanical properties of the well wall and body modules are stable, the operation is simple, and the forming dimensions are standardized.

src: 混凝土检查井模块砖机设备智能控制配备数据输入、输出装置一键通触摸式液晶显示监控机械操作全部过程，实现理想的人机对话、自动分析比料、密度运转、安全逻辑控制及故障诊断系统。
tgt: The concrete inspection shaft module brick equipment can automatically control the input and output of the configured data, and the one-key contact crystal display can monitor all the process of mechanical operation to realize ideal man-machine dialogue, automatic analysis on materials, density operation, safety logic control and fault diagnosis system.
hypo: The concrete inspection well module brick machine equipment is equipped with intelligent control and data input/output devices, with a one-click touch LCD display monitor to oversee the entire mechanical operation. This enables ideal human-machine dialogue, automatic analysis of proportioning, density operation, safety logic control, and a fault diagnosis system configured for safety.

src: 井壁墙体模块机械液压系统采用单缸液压、输送，双缸液压、输送。
tgt: Single-cylinder and double-cylinder hydraulic pressure and transportation are adopted for the shaft wall module mechanical and hydraulic system.
hypo: The single-cylinder hydraulic conveying and double-cylinder hydraulic conveying systems are adopted for the well wall module mechanical hydraulic system.

src: 独立的液压集成站，避免了由于主机振动对液压系统的影响，从而保证液压系统工作的可靠性。
tgt: The independent hydraulic integration station is utilized to avoid the influences on the hydraulic system caused by vibration of the master so as to ensure reliability of the operation of the hydraulic system.
hypo: The independent hydraulic integrated station avoids the impact on the hydraulic system caused by the vibration of the host, thereby ensuring the reliability of the hydraulic system operation.

src: 混凝土检查井模块砖机设备布料箱行进模箱脱模上升，储料箱门关闭，自动输送托板，全部由液压系统独立完成，从而达到减少机械的磨损和维修。
tgt: In the concrete inspection shaft module brick equipment, the fabric box proceeding box de-molds and lifts, the storage box door closes, and the supporting plate is transported automatically, all of which are independently completed by the hydraulic system so as to reduce mechanical abrasion and times of repair.
hypo: wear, independent hydraulic system.  The concrete inspection well module brick equipment, material box, traveling mold box, and demolding rise automatically, with the material box door closed and the pallets transported automatically, all accomplished independently by the hydraulic system, thereby reducing mechanical abrasion and wear.

src: 混凝土检查井模块砖机设备采用进口电脑、电器，密封件液压件，准保设备综合性能稳定可靠。
tgt: The concrete inspection shaft module brick equipment is composed by imported computer and appliances, as well as sealing elements and hydraulic element to ensure stable and reliable comprehensive performance.
hypo: The concrete inspection well module brick machine equipment adopts imported computer and electrical appliances, sealing and hydraulic components, and the comprehensive performance of the equipment is stable and reliable, to ensure quality.

src: 井壁墙体模块机械激振平台采用整体板钢，台面线切割合模无焊接点，使填料箱自由摆动导向，充分减少机械磨损。
tgt: The integral steel plate is adopted for the shaft wall module mechanical vibration platform, with no welding points of wire-electrode cutting mold closing of mesa, so that the stuffing box can swing and orient freely to greatly reduce mechanical abrasion.
hypo: The module mechanical vibration platform for well wall body adopts integral plate steel, with the table line cut and molded without welding points, allowing free swing guiding of the filling box and effectively reducing mechanical abrasion.

src: 使模具负荷减少、填料并二合一加密振幅，采用一体化、全同步，台振、模振，确保达到振实效果。
tgt: It reduces loads of molds and reinforces vibration; integrated and full synchronization are adopted for vibration of the platform and the molds to ensure the vibration effect.
hypo: The use of integration and full synchronization in both table and mold vibration leads to a reduced load on the mold, and a denser amplitude by combining the filler. This ensures a vibration effect and achieves a strong vibration effect.

src: 井壁墙体模块机械激振机械、电脑自动控制振幅根据原料性价比调节振幅，无磨损制动，从而延长使用寿命，降低成本。
tgt: The shaft wall module mechanical excitation machinery and the computer automatically control the vibration range according to the cost performance of raw materials, leading to no abrasion brake; in this way, it extends the service life and reduces the cost.
hypo: The mechanical vibration machine for the shaft wall module controls the amplitude automatically through computer according to the cost-effectiveness of raw materials, with no abrasion braking, thus extending the service life and reducing costs.

src: 井壁墙体模块机械自动控制和手动控制双重功能。
tgt: The shaft wall module machinery is equipped with dual functions, i.e., automatic control and manual control.
hypo: "The machinery for the wall module has dual functionality, both automatic and manual control."

src: 国际橄榄油协会将橄榄油分为初榨橄榄油（Virgin Olive Oil）和精炼橄榄油（Lampante Olive Oil或Refined Olive Oil）两大类，五个级别。
tgt: The International Olive Oil Association divides olive oil into two categories, Virgin Olive Oil and Lampante Olive Oil or Refined Olive Oil, and five levels.
hypo: The International Olive Council categorizes olive oil into two major types, Virgin Olive Oil and Refined Olive Oil (also known as Lampante Olive Oil), with five different grades.

src: 初榨橄榄油或称为天然橄榄油，是直接从新鲜的橄榄果实中采取机械冷榨、经过过滤等处理除去异物后得到的油脂。
tgt: Virgin olive oil, also known as natural olive oil, is oil obtained from fresh olive fruit after removing foreign matters by mechanical cold pressing and filtering.
hypo: First-pressed olive oil, also known as natural olive oil, is a fat obtained directly from fresh olive fruits through mechanical pressing and filtering to remove impurities.

src: 根据酸度的不同可分为三个级别：
tgt: There are three levels according to acidity:
hypo: There are three levels that can be classified according to acidity.

src: 特级初榨橄榄油（Extra Virgin）：是最高级别、质量最高的橄榄油，是纯天然产品。
tgt: Extra Virgin: is the highest level, best quality olive oil, a pure natural product.
hypo: "Extra virgin olive oil is the best and highest quality olive oil, and it is a pure natural product."

src: 口味绝佳，有淡雅怡人的植物芬芳，酸度不超过1%。
tgt: It has premium taste, a slight and pleasant plant fragrance and a acidity of less than 1%.
hypo: elegant, acidity does not exceed 1%.   The taste is excellent, with a slight and elegant plant fragrance, and the acidity does not exceed 1%.

src: 优质初榨橄榄油（Fine Virgin）：酸度稍高，但不超过2%，味道纯正、芳香。
tgt: Fine Virgin: has a slightly higher acidity of less than 2%, tastes pure and aromatic.
hypo: Fine virgin olive oil: slightly higher acidity, but no more than 2%, pure and aromatic taste.

src: 普通初榨橄榄油（Ordinary Virgin）：口味与风味尚可，酸度不超过3.3%。
tgt: Ordinary Virgin: taste and flavor are acceptable, with an acidity of no more than 3.3%.
hypo: "Ordinary virgin olive oil: The flavor and taste are acceptable, with an acidity of no more than 3.3%."

src: 精炼橄榄油是指酸度超过3.3%的初榨橄榄油精炼后所得到的橄榄油，或成为“二次油”。
tgt: Refined Olive Oil refers to olive oil obtained from the refining of virgin olive oil with an acidity of over 3.3%, also called as “secondary oil”.
hypo: The term "refined olive oil" refers to the olive oil obtained by refining virgin olive oil with an acidity of more than 3.3%, or also known as "secondary oil".

src: 精炼橄榄油可分为两个级别：
tgt: Refined Olive Oil can be divided into two categories:
hypo: "Refined olive oil can be divided into two categories."

src: 普通橄榄油（Olive Oil）：精炼橄榄油与一定比例的初榨橄榄油混合，以调和味道与颜色，其酸度在1.5%以下，呈透明的淡金黄色。
tgt: Olive Oil: is refined olive oil mixed with virgin olive oil in a certain proportion to adjust the taste and color, has an acidity of under 1.5% and a transparent light gold color.
hypo: Regular Olive Oil: Refined olive oil is mixed with a certain proportion of extra-virgin olive oil to adjust the taste and color. Its acidity is below 1.5%, and it has a transparent light golden color.

src: 精炼橄榄杂质油或橄榄果渣油（Refined Olive-Pomace Oil）：是通过溶解法从油渣中提取并经过精炼而得到的橄榄油。
tgt: Refined Olive-Pomace Oil is olive oil obtained and refined from pomace with dissolution method.
hypo: Refined Olive-Pomace Oil: is a type of olive oil extracted from pomace through dissolution and refined process.

src: 看过等级分类的你应该已经发现，橄榄油的酸度是一个非常重要的指标。
tgt: After reading the classification, you may find the acidity of olive oil is an important index.
hypo: "Having seen the grading classification, you should have already discovered that acidity is a very important index for olive oil."

src: 要知道，橄榄果就好像酿制葡萄酒的葡萄一样，来自不同的产区、不同橄榄果品种的橄榄果，就会出产不同标准的橄榄油。
tgt: You should know that olives are just like grapes that make wine, olives from different producing areas and different types of olives will produce olive oil of different standards.
hypo: You should know that olives are just like grapes used for making wine. Olives from different regions and different varieties of olives will produce oil of different standards.

src: 油橄榄的最佳生长地：
tgt: The best growing area of olives:
hypo: The best place for the growth of oil olives:

src: 地中海沿岸具有油橄榄生长所需的最适宜的土壤和气温、日照、空气湿度以及降水量等气候条件。
tgt: The Mediterranean coastal area has the most suitable soil, temperature, sunshine, air humidity, precipitation and other weather conditions for olive growth.
hypo: The Mediterranean coastal area has the most suitable soil and climate conditions, such as temperature, sunlight, air humidity, and precipitation, for the growth of oil olives.

src: 除地中海沿岸外，其它地区只能在适生区零星种植。
tgt: Aside from the Mediterranean costal area, olives can only be planted sporadically in suitable areas in other areas.
hypo: Except for the Mediterranean coast, olives can only be sporadically planted in suitable zones in other areas.

src: 主要产区产地（地中海）：
tgt: Main producing areas (the Mediterranean):
hypo: Main producing areas (Mediterranean).

src: 意大利、西班牙、希腊、土耳其、葡萄牙、摩洛哥、叙利亚、以色列、突尼斯、阿尔及利亚、埃及、巴基斯坦、黎巴嫩等等，与其气候类似的也有远在南纬度的阿根廷、秘鲁、南非等等。
tgt: Italy, Spain, Greece, Turkey, Portugal, Morocco, Syria, Israel, Tunisia, Algeria, Egypt, Pakistan, Lebanon, etc., and Argentina, Peru, South Africa, etc., which are far away in the southern latitude and have similar climate.
hypo: Italy, Spain, Greece, Turkey, Portugal, Morocco, Syria, Israel, Tunisia, Algeria, Egypt, Pakistan, Lebanon, and so on, have climates similar to those located far south such as Argentina, Peru, and South Africa.

src: 油橄榄的采摘月份：
tgt: Picking time of olives:
hypo: harvest for olive oil.

src: 每年的3至6月，是油橄榄树开花坐果的时间，7至10月果实开始发育并且成熟，果实从绿色过渡到红色，紫色，最后变黑。

src: 其实对于身体微胖的女孩子穿衣搭配的讲究很多。

src: 身体胖的女孩穿的裙子不能太短或太长，长度差不多在膝盖，刚好能盖住大腿胖的地方即可。
tgt: Slightly overweight girls shall wear skirts not too long or too short; they shall be of the length at around the knees, just covering the fat part of the thighs.
hypo: The skirt worn by a slightly overweight girl with a plump body should not be too short or too long, with a length around the knees, just enough to cover the area where the thighs are plump.

src: 过长就会给人矮而胖的感觉。

hypo: "If you split your outfit into three sections – top, skirt, and stockings – using different colors, it will make you look naturally slimmer and taller."

src: 其实很多深色系的衣服是微胖女孩子们的标配（这一点作者深有体会），深颜色也是掩盖你身体胖的好方法，高贵典雅的黑色短裙也是微胖女孩的首选。

hypo: Actually, many dark-colored clothes are a must-have for slightly overweight girls (the author has deep experience in this regard). Dark colors are also the best way to conceal your body fat, and a noble and elegant black skirt is also the first choice for slightly overweight girls.

src: 穿上深颜色的衣服，特别是黑色的短裙，会让人觉得你瘦一些。

src: 微胖女孩千万不要穿紧身的短裙，另外上衣不要过短或者塞在裙子里，会让人看了很不舒服，如果腿粗的话，要穿黑色的长筒袜或者网格袜(细格子的那种哦)，选择质地柔软的印花喇叭裙，搭配一件荡领的上衣，可以很好的掩盖胖女孩的不足。
tgt: Slightly overweight girls shall never wear close-fitting short skirts and the upper outer garment shall not be too short or tucked inside the skirt, which seem strange; slightly overweight girls with thicker legs shall wear black stockings or mesh stockings (thin meshes), a flare skirt with print pattern and soft texture, and a loose-collar upper outer garment to cover the defects of the body.
hypo: Slightly overweight girls should never wear tight short skirts. Additionally, their tops should not be too short or tucked into the skirt, which can make people uncomfortable. They should choose a soft, printed flare skirt and pair it with a loose-collar top, which can effectively conceal the shortcomings of slightly overweight girls.

src: 红牌威士忌喝法是什么？
tgt: How to drink Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky?
hypo: How do you drink Red Label whiskey?

src: 每个人的爱好不同，有人喜欢收藏，有人喜欢美食，当然也有人喜欢品酒，红牌威士忌是目前各个国家最畅销的苏格兰威士忌之一，而且红牌威士忌曾获国际洋酒大赛金奖。
tgt: Different people have different preferences; some like to collect, some like food, and certainly some like wine tasting; Johnnie Walker Red Label is one of the fastest selling Scottish whiskies in the world and has won the gold prize of International Wine Competition.
hypo: "Everyone has different hobbies, some like collecting, some like food, and certainly some like wine tasting. Red Label Whiskey is currently one of the best-selling Scottish whiskey in various countries, and it has also won a gold medal in an international liquor competition."

src: 每一瓶红牌威士忌都有独特的味道，不过如果不知道如何品味它，岂不是糟蹋了它的醇香。
tgt: Each bottle of Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky has its own unique flavor, but if you don’t know how to taste it, it would be such a waste of its mellow fragrance.
hypo: Each bottle of Red Label whisky has its own unique flavor, but if you don't know how to taste it, isn't it a waste of its rich aroma?

src: 那么红牌威士忌怎么喝呢？
tgt: Then how do we drink Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky?
hypo: Then, how do you drink red label whiskey?

src: 小编为大家简单介绍下。
tgt: I’ll introduce for you now.
hypo: Now, I will briefly introduce it to everyone.

src: 红牌威士忌喝法：
tgt: How to drink Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky:
hypo: "How to drink Red Label whiskey:"

src: 尊尼获加红牌威士忌由约35种苏格兰威士忌调配而成，具有浓郁芳香及传统苏格兰威士忌的特质，浓郁芳香中带有甘甜及烟熏香味。
tgt: Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky is blended with around 35 kinds of Scotch Whiskies, possesses rich fragrance and the characteristics of traditional Scotch whisky, with both sweetness and smoked smell in its rich fragrance.
hypo: The Johnnie Walker Red Label Scotch Whisky is blended from approximately 35 Scotch whiskies of Scotland, and has the characteristic of a rich aroma and traditional Scotch whiskies. Its strong aroma is accompanied by sweetness and smoky flavor.

src: 入口浓醇清新，略带香草及浓烈的烟熏麦芽味道。
tgt: It is mellow and fresh in the mouth, with a slight taste of vanilla and strong smoked malt.
hypo: The taste is rich and refreshing, with a slight hint of herbs and a strong smoky malt flavor that is mellow in the mouth.

src: 该酒可以直接加冰饮用，或者与最喜爱的饮品混合饮用。
tgt: The wine can be drunk directly with ice or mixed with your favorite drinks.
hypo: The wine can be drunk directly with ice or mixed with favorite drinks for consumption.

src: 红牌威士忌进入国内,为了适应国人的口味,红牌威士忌+可乐或雪碧或新奇士等气泡饮料成为一种经久不衰的时尚。
tgt: After Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky entered China, in order to adapt to the tastes of Chinese people, drinking Red Label whisky with bubble beverage such as Cola, Sprite or Sunkist has become an enduring fashion.
hypo: Red Label Whiskey entered the domestic market. In order to cater to the taste of the Chinese people, Red Label Whiskey with bubble drinks such as cola, Sprite, or Fanta has become a long-lasting fashion.

src: 这些甜味的饮料，除了可以中和酸味,在视觉上能给人带来愉悦，加入饮料,起到冲淡酒味改变口感的效果。
tgt: These sweet drinks not only can neutralize the sour taste, bring pleasure to people visually, but also can dilute the taste of wine and change the overall taste.
hypo: These sweet drinks not only can neutralize sour tastes, but also visually bring pleasure to people. Adding them to beverages can dilute the taste of alcohol and alter the mouthfeel.

src: 红牌威士忌+切片柠檬+方糖(砂糖亦可),是最正宗、最传统的喝法.
tgt: Red Label whisky + sliced lemon + cube sugar (granulated sugar is also acceptable) is the most authentic and traditional drinking method.
hypo: Red label whiskey + sliced lemon + granulated sugar (or can use sugar cubes), is the most authentic and traditional way of drinking.

src: 正宗的红方威味道有些酸涩,加入糖可以中和其中的酸味,柠檬则会给酒带来清新的香味,当然,甜酸度可根据个人的口味爱好调配。
tgt: Authentic Red Label whisky tastes a little sour; adding sugar can neutralize the sour taste, lemon will bring fresh fragrance to the wine, and of course, the sweetness and sourness can be adjusted according to personal tastes.
hypo: The authentic Hongfangwei taste is somewhat sour and a bit harsh, but adding sugar can neutralize the acidity. Lemon will bring a fresh fragrance to the wine. Of course, the sweetness and sourness can be adjusted according to personal tastes.

src: 以上三种都是红牌威士忌的最好喝法，大家可以作为参考尝试下，希望小编的介绍可以帮助到大家。
tgt: The above are the best drinking methods of Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky for your refence, and I hope my introduction can help you.
hypo: "The above three methods are the best ways to drink red label whiskey, and everyone can try them for reference. Hopefully, the introduction provided by the author can help you."

src: 金夫人婚纱摄影(南街店) 暂时还没有分店
tgt: Mrs. Gold Wedding Dress Photography (Nanjie Store) has no branch store yet.
hypo: Madame Jin Bridal Photography (Nanjie Store) currently has no branch stores.

src: 拍照之前因为我们时间没安排好，更换了两次时间，顾问兰兰很耐心地帮我们安排了时间。
tgt: Because I didn’t arrange my time well before the shoot, I rescheduled twice and consultant Lanlan patiently arranged time for us.
hypo: Before taking the photo, because we didn't plan the time well, we changed the time twice. Consultant Lanlan patiently helped us arrange the time.

src: 后来选择了一个天气好的周末拍的。

src: 金夫人的工作人员，无论是顾问，化妆师还是摄影师都超赞的。

hypo: Mrs. Jin's staff, whether advisors, make-up artists, or photographers, are all amazing.

src: 那是我生平第一次正式地化妆，哇～简直不敢相信，我有一天也会变得那么好看，哈哈。

hypo: "That was the first time in my life that I had officially put on make-up. Wow~ I can hardly believe it, I suddenly became so pretty, haha."

src: 晓洁和另一个妹子（抱歉我记不得名字了）化妆超级有耐心，化妆也很自然。

hypo: Xiaojie and another girl (I'm sorry I don't remember her name) are extremely patient with makeup and the makeup was also very natural.

src: 外景在江湾城拍的，幸亏那天天气很好，没有觉得很冷，拍照的时候，化妆师时不时地留意我们的衣服，头饰，稍微有一点不好了就马上帮我们整理。
tgt: We shot the outdoor scene at Jiangwancheng, and fortunately the weather was nice that day, we didn’t feel cold; during the shoot, makeup artist was paying attention to our clothes, headwear, and made adjustment immediately once there was a problem.
hypo: The outdoor scene was filmed in Jiangwan City. Luckily, the weather was very good that day and we didn't feel very cold. During the shoot, the makeup artist frequently paid attention to our clothes and headwear. If anything was a little off, she would make an adjustment immediately.

src: 摄影师也非常幽默，拍照一天下来都觉得很开心。
tgt: The photographer was funny, and we were happy throughout the day.
hypo: The photographer was funny too, throughout the day of taking photos, everyone felt very happy.

src: 在选照片的时候，因为在网上看到很多案例，不愿意让客人删太多照片，但是我们选照片的时候，真的，一点没有让我们加照片的意思，直接套餐里的24张，一张都没有加（听说和我差不多时间拍婚纱照的表妹，七千多的套餐还加了一万多的照片，当时我就惊呆了，心里也很怕自己会选太多）
tgt: When choosing the photos, I saw many cases online where they wouldn’t let the customers delete too many photos, but they didn’t ask us to add photos at all, just the 24 photos in the set and nothing more (I heard that my cousin who was also taking wedding dress photos added photos worth over 10,000 in addition to the 7,000 yuan set, and I was stunned and feared I might choose too many).
hypo: When choosing dress photos, because I saw many examples online, I didn't want the guests to delete too many photos. However, when we chose photos, we honestly didn't have any intention of adding any photos. We just stuck to the 24 photos in the package and didn't add a single one (I heard that my cousin, who took wedding dress photos around the same time as me, added over 10,000 photos to the 7,000+ package, which shocked me and made me afraid of choosing too many photos).

src: 今天照片修好了，兰兰发给我，我看了有两张觉得不太好，他们立刻就帮我重新修了。
tgt: The editing was finished today and Lanlan sent it to me; I felt two were not good enough and they immediately re-edited them for me.
hypo: Today, the photos were fixed. Lanlan sent them to me, but I found two of them were not very good. They immediately helped me fix them again.

src: 把妹妹以前拍的照片翻出来对比，我觉得我们的照片我真的太满意了，简约清新，就是我想要的风格。
tgt: I found the old photos of my sister to make comparison, and I felt that our photos were really satisfying, simple and fresh, exactly what I wanted.
hypo: found is that when I compared the photos my sister took before, I really liked our photos. They were simple and refreshing, exactly what I was looking for.

src: 真心推荐大家去宣汉金夫人拍婚纱照！
tgt: I sincerely recommend choosing Xuanhan Mrs. Gold to take your wedding dress photoshoot!
hypo: "I highly recommend everyone to go to Xuanhan Lady Jin to take wedding dress photos sincerely!"

src: 套系价格：3999 元

src: 李先生告诉记者，近日，他买了一个足浴盆送给父亲做生日礼物，可是父亲泡脚时却感觉脚底发麻。

src: 李先生一开始以为是足浴盆的振动功能引起的，没想到关了振动功能，父亲还是感觉到脚底麻麻的。

hypo: Mr. Li initially thought it was caused by the vibration function of the foot bath basin, but he did not expect that even after turning off the vibration function, his father's feet were still numb.

src: 李先生用电笔一试，电笔居然亮了，李先生惊讶地发现足浴盆的水里居然带电。

src: 后来他联络了商家，商家的态度还不错，尽管退掉了足浴盆，李先生依然感到不快。

src: 大美360集成家装
tgt: Damei 360 Integrated Home Decoration
hypo: Damei 360 integrated home Decoration.

src: 地 址：环城南路156号幸福家园12楼
tgt: Address: Happy Home Building 12, South Ring Road 156
hypo: Address: 12th floor, Happiness Home, No. 156, South Ring Road.

src: 一开始是朋友介绍的因为信任，所以选择来看一下起初我的预算是7万做个基本装修。
tgt: I trusted it because my friend made the recommendation, so I chose to check it out, and originally my budget for a basic decoration was 70,000.
hypo: In the beginning, I came to see because I trusted my friend's recommendation. Initially, my budget was 70,000 yuan for a basic renovation.

src: 来到店里就开始一系列的骗术。
tgt: A series of scam began as soon as I came into the store.
hypo: Upon arriving at the store, a series of scams began.

src: 我是第一次到店只是给他们看了我的户型图，他们并没有去实地量过房子，他们居然就能给我报价说我的135的房子7万是可以搞定的，大概的给我看了一下他们的材料也并不知道他们是什么品牌的材料。
tgt: When I first came to the store, I showed them my floor plan; although they didn’t really go to my apartment to take the measurement, they said they could do it within 70,000 for my 135 square meters apartment, and they showed me their materials whose brand was unclear.
hypo: I first came to the store and only showed them my floor plan. They did not visit the site to measure the house, but they were able to give me a quote of 70,000 for my 135 square meter house. They showed me their materials, but I did not know what brand they were.

src: 他们的第二套骗术就是你只要到店就会拖着你把定金交了（而这个钱一旦交了你是永远退不出来，除非你有足够的经历和他们打理论战）。
tgt: The second scam was forcing you to pay the deposit, which cannot be refunded once paid, unless you have enough experience to reason with them.
hypo: Their second scam is that as soon as you go to the store, they will drag you into paying a deposit (once you pay, you can never get it back unless you have enough experience to argue with them).

src: 我在犹豫要不要交定金的时候，他们就会邀请他们所谓的经理来告诉你，你今天只要把定金交了我们就能给你多少的优惠。
tgt: As I hesitated about whether to pay the deposit, they would invite their so-called manager to tell me that once I paid the deposit on that day, they could give me certain discount.
hypo: When I hesitated to pay the deposit, they would invite their so-called manager to tell me that if I paid the deposit today, they would give me a certain amount of discount.

src: 这个就是一个大坑，我就是活生生被骗的例子，在头脑冲动的时候，交了一万多的定金。
tgt: This is a big swindle, and I was a victim who paid a deposit of more than 10,000 when I didn’t really think it through.
hypo: "This was a big scam, and I am a victim who, in a moment of impulsivity, paid over 10,000 yuan as a deposit, believing it was real."

src: 他给我的报价有很多问题7万不包括水电改造，不包括任何门和橱柜 浴室，而这三个就是基装的费用大头。
tgt: Their quoted price had a lot of problems; for instance, the 70,000 didn’t include water and electricity renovation, doors, cabinets or bathrooms, and these three take up a large proportion of the cost of basic installation.
hypo: The quoted price he gave me has many issues - 70,000 yuan does not include water and electricity renovations, nor does it include any doors or cabinets in the bathroom, which are the major costs of basic installation.

src: 除去这些他们的服务点费收的也比其他家公司的高。
tgt: Apart from these, their service point fee is also higher than that of other companies.
hypo: Apart from these, their point fee charges are also higher than those of other companies.

src: 我对这个公司失去了信任，一开始什么都没有讲清楚就让我签合同。
tgt: I’ve lost trust in this company, because they asked me to sign the contract when they didn’t explain anything clearly.
hypo: "I lost trust in this company because they didn't explain anything clearly before asking me to sign the contract."

src: 当我去找他们退钱的时候他们表现出很有经验的样子，有专门的小团队来对付你。
tgt: When I went to ask for a refund, they acted rather experienced and sent a small team to deal with me.
hypo: When I went to ask for a refund, they showed a very experienced demeanor, and had a specialized small team to deal with you.

src: 无论如何都会一口咬死是客户的问题他们全然无责。
tgt: Anyway, they just said it was the client’s problem and they had absolutely no responsibility for it.
hypo: "No matter what happens, biting off the problem with one mouthful is the customer's problem, and they have no responsibility at all."

src: 各种推卸责任，还有很多细节，不想一一说了都是泪，总之不要选择他们，因为我朋友找他们装修的房子也是质量不好，后期给你算各种费用。
tgt: They just shrunk their responsibility in any way possible, and there were a lot more details that I don’t want to mention now; all in all, do not choose them because my friend had them renovate her apartment, and the quality was poor and they would charge you all kinds of other costs in the later stage.
hypo: There are various excuses for shirking responsibility, and many details that I don't want to mention one by one. In short, don't choose them, because my friend had them decorate her apartment and the quality was poor, and she was later charged with various fees.

src: 坑爹，他们就是原来骗人的龙头装饰，现在改成大美，好像又倒闭了又改成其他的。
tgt: Swindle; they used to be the swindler company Longtou Renovation, then it’s changed to Damei, and now it seems they have closed down and changed into something else.
hypo: "Damn it, it seems that they are still the Longtou Renovation that used to cheat people. They now changed their name to Da Mei, but it looks like they went bankrupt again and changed to something else."

src: 所以大家别选择这样坑爹的装修公司。
tgt: So please don’t choose such a swindler company.
hypo: So please don't choose such a swindler company for decoration.

src: 以后大家在选择的时候多百度看看这些查一下这些咨询因为装修不是小钱。
tgt: When you choose renovation companies in the future, please search them on Baidu because renovation cost is not a small amount.
hypo: choose in the future, please baidu and check these things, consult these things, because home decoration is not cheap.

hypo: Strictly prohibited to publish any form of merchant reviews, please refer to the Merchant Inclusion Statement for details.

src: 去之前看了店里的拍摄作品，更多的是户外婚纱，拍的很漂亮，涉及到的拍摄风格也很多。

hypo: "Before going, I looked at the store's photography works, which mostly included outdoor wedding dresses and were beautifully taken. There were also various photography styles involved."

src: 当天到了之后和小姐姐简单交流了自己的想法，非常耐心地帮我试了两套我纠结的风格衣服，最终敲定开始化妆造型~摄影师拍摄之前会摆一些道具，会指导动作，对各个细节也比较精益求精。
tgt: After I arrived that day, I communicated my own ideas with the young lady and she patiently helped me try on two outfits I was having trouble deciding and I made the final decision before starting styling and makeup~ the photographer would place some props and guide me to pose before the shoot, and was very attentive to the details.
hypo: able to briefly communicate my ideas with the girl on the day of the shoot. She patiently helped me try on two sets of clothes that I was indecisive about, and we ultimately settled on a makeup and hairstyle. Before the photographer began shooting, they arranged some props and guided my movements, paying close attention to every detail.

src: 但是可能因为没和我交流具体的拍摄想法，所以拍出来的不是我想要的风格，但是应该是好看的🙊🙊

hypo: But perhaps because we didn't communicate specific shooting ideas, what was produced was not the style I wanted, but it should still be good-looking 🙊🙊.

src: 拍好之后摄影师会帮忙挑选照片，交流后期风格，感觉挺细心的叭。

hypo: After taking the photos, the photographer would help select them and communicate the post-editing style. I feel like they are really attentive.

src: 修好的片大约要半个月，坐等效果~

hypo: The edited film will be ready in about half a month, so sit tight and wait for the results~

src: 第二次中了写真类的霸王餐活动～全场大部分的衣服能够选择一件拍摄。

src: 最后选择了一件黑色的纱裙，体验下不同的风格。

src: 整个拍摄过程要2个小时左右，化妆+拍摄，负责拍摄的摄影师是95后的弟弟呢，感觉稍微还是有点青涩，希望在顾客拍摄动作指导方面以后能给更多的建议呀～挺健谈的，拍摄过程比较愉快。
tgt: The entire photoshoot took about 2 hours including the makeup and shoot; the photographer was a young guy born after 1995, who seemed to be a little shy; I hope he could give more advice to clients in terms of poses~ he was talkative and the shoot was pleasant.
hypo: The entire shoot process takes about two hours, including makeup and shooting. The photographer responsible for the shoot is the younger brother born in the 1995s. I feel that he is a bit inexperienced, but I hope he can provide more suggestions for customer posing guidance in the future~ He was quite talkative, making the shoot process quite pleasant.

src: 上首页了，也来看看Queenie吧~

hypo: Made it to the homepage, come and see Queenie too~

src: 到店先填了姓名电话然后选服装，婚纱都可以选，换了三四套服装还蛮耐心的，选好后化妆化了很久，服务态度也好，后面拍摄会教你怎么摆造型，就是拍出来的感觉脸好大，精修说是要半个月，三四天就发来了，感觉好像跟原片没啥差别
tgt: After I arrived at the store, I filled in my name and chose the outfits; all the wedding dresses were available to be chosen; I tried on three or four outfits and they were quite patient; after I decided on the dress, they were doing my makeup for a long time and they were also nice during this time; later in the shoot, they would teach you how to pose; I felt my face was too big on the photo; they said detailed editing would take a month, but they sent them to me after three to four days, and they seemed not that different from the original photos.
hypo: After arriving at the store, I filled out my name and phone number and then selected clothing. I was able to choose from a variety of wedding dresses and ended up trying out three or four different outfits. The staff were patient and attentive. After making my selections, I spent quite a while getting my makeup done. The service was great and during the photoshoot, they showed me how to pose for the best shots. However, when the photos came back, my face looked quite large in them. Nevertheless, they sent me the final, edited photos within just three or four days, which was impressive considering they had said it could take up to two weeks. The finished products looked amazing, and there was barely any difference between the edited versions and the original photos.

src: 【环境】整体还好。

src: 可选衣服很多。

hypo: After choosing my clothes, we began to do my hair and makeup. The hair stylist and makeup artist were both very patient in helping me, and the final result turned out extremely satisfying.

src: 推荐理由:精选高粱为原料，采用传统工艺酿造，来自内蒙古高原的白酒，口感更为经典，浓香甜口，涩中带点甜，层次丰富，采用传统固态法白酒工艺，保留了其原汁原味不流失，让酒体带着浓郁又醇厚的口感。
tgt: Recommendation: Made from carefully selected sorghum, brewed using traditional procedure; baijiu from Inter Mongolian Plateau tastes more classic, rich, sweet, astringent and layered; it adopts traditional solid-state Baijiu procedure to keep its original flavor, giving it a rich and mellow taste.
hypo: Reason for recommendation: This baijiu is made from select sorghum as raw material, brewed using traditional methods, and comes from the Inner Mongolian plateau. Its taste is more classic, with a strong and sweet aroma, a slightly astringent sweetness, and a rich layering. It uses the traditional solid-state baijiu brewing process to keep its original flavor from being lost, allowing the body of the liquor to have a rich and mellow taste.

src: 推荐理由:经过多年窖藏，就为更浓，更透澈，是内蒙古大草原游牧民族爱喝的酒，浓香形秉承了传统酿造工艺，陶醉了华夏质朴亲切，适合各类宴席或者居家使用的一款白酒。
tgt: Recommendation: After beings stored in the cellar for many years, it is richer and clearer; it is what nomadic people in Inner Mongolia prairie like to drink; the rich flavor inherits the traditional brewing process, and is intoxicated with the simplicity and friendliness of the Chinese people; it is suitable for all kinds of banquets or drinking at home.
hypo: Reasons for recommendation: After many years of cellar aging, the wine has become richer and more transparent, and it is a favored drink among the nomadic peoples of the Inner Mongolian grasslands. Its strong aroma inherits the traditional brewing process and exudes the rustic and friendly charm of China. It is suitable for all kinds of banquets or for home use as a type of white wine.

src: 双十二那阵，到“汉斯顿”净水器店，看净水器，店内正在做活动，价格比较优惠。

hypo: Home Furnishing has a total of 11 floors, from negative 2nd floor to 9th floor. Negative 1st and 2nd floors are both parking areas, and parking is free during the daytime!

src: 周围是真不怎样，饭店五金店寥寥无几，而且饭店味道一般般。
tgt: The surroundings are really not nice, with few restaurants and hardware store, and the food there tasted average.
hypo: The surroundings are really not that great, there are only a few restaurants and hardware stores around, and the food in the restaurants tasted average.

src: 这个电梯也是很无语，跟有那大病一样，负二到负一，来回折腾，不停我按的这一层，从安全通道下去到一楼，也是很无语，直接通到一个家具店，家具店关门，安全通道出不去!
tgt: This elevator really makes people speechless; it went back and forth from B2 to B1 and did not stop on my floor, and it was ridiculous that when I went to the 1st floor from fire escape, it led to a furniture store which was closed, so I couldn’t get out from the fire escape, either!
hypo: This elevator is also really speechless, just like having a serious illness. It goes from negative two to negative one, constantly going up and down, and it doesn't stop at the floor I press. Going down from the safety passage to the first floor is also really speechless. It leads directly to a furniture store, which is closed and the safety passage cannot be exited!

src: 居然之家还是需要提升，有很多地方都没有开发。
tgt: Easyhome still needs to be improved with a lot of spaces to be developed.
hypo: It turns out that the home still needs improvement and there are many areas that have not been developed.

src: 环境：说实话店里面积大，有8～9层，家里想买的家具、家用电器、各种小东西……，都能买到，好多名牌商家都入驻在店里，慕思、欧派、华帝、老板、峰创之家、汉斯顿、雅克、友邦、丝涟、富品居、万家乐、大自然、中联、美的、雅丹……，品牌真的是太多了，我只能记得这么多了，是购买产品的好去处，逛累了可以坐在沙发上休息休息哦。
tgt: Environment: Honestly, the store is large with 8-9 floors, where you can buy all the furniture, household appliances and small things your home needs, and many famous brands have settled in the store, such as DeRUCCI, OPPEIN, VATTI, Robam, Fengchuang Home, Hunsdon, Yake, AIA, Sealy, Fupinju, GUANGDONG MACRO, Nature, Zoomlion, Midea, Yadan, and so many other brands, I can only remember so many; it is a good place to buy products, and you can sit on the couch and have a rest if you get tired.
hypo: Environment: To be honest, the store has a large area of 8-9 floors. Furniture, home appliances and various small things that people want to buy at home can all be found here. Many famous brand merchants are stationed in the store, such as Mousse, Oppein, Vatti, Boss, Fengchuang Home, Hansdon, Yark, Youbang, Silian, Fupinju, Vanke, Natural, Zhonglian, Midea, Yadang, and there are really too many brands to remember. src: 浙大学术年会上学生唱主角 研究成果让人脑洞大开-新华网
tgt: Students played the leading role at the Annual Academic Conference of Zhejiang University with creative research achievements - Xinhuanet
hypo: At the Zhejiang University Academic Conference, students took center stage and their research results were mind-boggling - Xinhuanet.

src: 用空气来洗手，哈口气判断疾病，精确搜寻雾霾来源 昨天晚上，在浙江大学2016年学术年会开幕式上，一系列脑洞大开的学术成果获得表彰。
tgt: Washing hands with air, diagnosing disease through breath, and accurately seeking for source of smog; last night, a series of creative academic achievements were awarded at the opening ceremony of the 2016 Annual Academic Conference of Zhejiang University.
hypo: Using air to wash hands, judging diseases through breath, and accurately searching for the source of haze. Last night, at the opening ceremony of Zhejiang University's 2016 academic year, a series of innovative academic achievements were awarded.

src: 这些成果的主要研究者都是学生，研究覆盖了环境、机械、能源、医疗、生命科学、人文教育等各大领域，同学们从一个好奇的点子开始，创造出了许多具有应用价值的高端发明，其中一些项目已在国内国际获奖。
tgt: The main researchers of these achievements are students, with research covering major fields of environment, machinery, energy, medicine, life science and humanities education; students created many high-end inventions with application values from a curious idea, and some of them have won awards at home and abroad.
hypo: The main researchers with research in various fields of environment, mechanics, energy, medical, life sciences, humanities education, etc., are all students. Starting with a curious idea, the students have created many high-end inventions with practical value, some of which have already won awards domestically and internationally.

src: 生物传感器：你的家庭体检医生
tgt: Biosensor: your home physical examination doctor
hypo: Biosensors: Your at-home health examination doctor.

src: 生物医学工程学院博士生张迪鸣团队现场展示了一个智能手机端的生物传感器，大小只有智能手机的一半。
tgt: The team of Zhang Diming, a doctoral student of School of Biomedical Engineering, showed a biosensor on the smart phone with the size of only a half of a smart phone.
hypo: Doctoral student Zhang Diming's team from the School of Biomedical Engineering showcased a smart phone-sized biosensor at the scene.

src: “你只需要轻轻呼一口气，这套仪器就能从你呼出的气体成分中，初步检测身体健康状况 。 ”
tgt: “All you need to do is to breathe out, and this set of instrument can detect your physical conditions preliminarily from the components of the air you breathe out.”
hypo: need to do is breathe out gently, and this instrument can preliminarily detect your physical health condition from the composition of the exhaled gas.

src: 张迪鸣介绍说，这套传感器与智能手机相连，呼出气体后，健康报告就会显示在手机上。
tgt: Zhang Diming introduced, this set of sensor is connected to the smart phone; after you breathe out, the health report will be shown on your phone.
hypo: Zhang Diming explained that this set of sensors is connected to a smartphone, and after exhaling gas, the health report will be displayed on the phone.

src: 市场上能够检测健康状况的智能手环，一般检测的是温度、脉搏等物理参数。
tgt: Smart bands on the market which can detect health conditions often measure physical parameters such as temperature and pulse.
hypo: Smart wristbands that can monitor health conditions in the market generally detect physical parameters such as temperature and pulse.

src: 而这套生物传感器运用了石墨烯这种新型材料，它的目标物是化学元素，敏锐的“嗅觉”让它能更深度、准确地体现身体健康状况。
tgt: This set of biological sensor uses the new material of graphene; its target is chemical elements, and its keen “sense of smell” enables it to reflect the health status of the body more in-depth and accurately.
hypo: And this set of biological sensors uses a new material called graphene, with its target being chemical elements. Its sensitive "smell" allows it to reflect the state of the body's health more deeply and accurately.

src: 智能手术灯：医生的高能眼睛
tgt: Smart operation lamp: high-functioning eyes for doctors
hypo: surgical, doctor, high-energy.   Smart surgical light: the doctor's high-energy eyes.

src: 除了智能手机，手术室里也用起了智能手术灯。
tgt: In addition to smart phones, smart operation lamps are now being used in operating rooms.
hypo: Besides smartphones, operating rooms are also using intelligent surgical lights.

src: 这项发明在今年第44届瑞士日内瓦国际发明展中获得银奖。
tgt: This invention has won the silver prize in the 44th International Exhibition of Inventions in Geneva, Switzerland this year.
hypo: This invention won the silver medal at the 44th Geneva International Invention Exhibition in Switzerland this year.

src: 光电科学与工程学院硕士生朱林靖、申俊飞团队在传统手术灯的缺陷中开启了新思路，发明了智能LED手术无影灯。
tgt: The team of Zhu Linjing and Shen Junfei, two graduate students from School of Optoelectronic Science and Engineering, developed a new idea trying to solve the defects of traditional operating lamps and invented the smart LED operation shadow-less lamp.
hypo: The team of Master students Zhu Linjing and Shen Junfei from the School of Optoelectronic Science and Engineering have opened a new way of thinking in the shortcomings of traditional operating lights, and invented an intelligent LED operation shadow-less light.

src: “很多疾病早期检测、切除不到位，跟医生手术室用的灯有关 。 ”
tgt: “Improper early detection of many diseases and inaccurate excision are related to operation lamps used by doctors.”
hypo: "Many diseases are not detected early enough and not effectively removed, which is related to the lights used in the doctors' operating rooms."

src: 申俊飞说，比如癌症早期检查时，医生如果不能及时看清所有肿瘤组织，那么之后癌细胞还会扩散。
tgt: According to Shen Junfei, for example, in early inspection of cancer, if doctors cannot see clearly all the tumor tissues in a timely manner, the tumor cells will still spread.
hypo: cannot timely see all tumor tissue, cancer cells will continue to spread later.

src: 这种智能手术灯有四个灯盘，通过调节光谱，来增强不同组织在光照下的区别度。
tgt: This type of smart operation lamp has four lamp panels, which enhance the distinction degree of different tissues by adjusting the spectrum.
hypo: This intelligent surgical lamp has four lamp discs and enhances the contrast of different tissues under illumination by adjusting the spectrum.

src: 在手术过程中，医生可以根据手术需要和个人习惯，随时调节光斑的大小、光亮程度、光谱、颜色均匀性以及无影率。
tgt: During the operation process, doctors can adjust the size of light spot, brightness, spectrum, color uniformness and shadow-less degree any time according to demands of operation and personal habits.
hypo: During the surgical procedure, doctors can adjust the size, brightness, spectrum, color uniformity, and shadowlessness of the light spot according to the surgical needs and personal habits at any time.

src: 这种智能手术灯已经在浙江大学医学院附属邵逸夫医院、浙江大学医学院附属儿童医院等医院试用，得到较好的反馈。
tgt: This type of smart operating lamp has been tried in hospitals such as Sir Run Shaw Hospital Afflicted to Zhejiang University Medical College and the Children’s Hospital Affiliated to Zhejiang University Medical College, and received favorable feedback.
hypo: This intelligent surgical lamp has been tested in hospitals such as Sir Run Shaw Hospital Affiliated with Zhejiang University School of Medicine and the Children's Hospital Affiliated with Zhejiang University School of Medicine, and received positive feedback.

src: 去年十月，这项发明获得国家挑战杯一等奖。
tgt: Last October, this invention won the first prize of the National Challenge Cup Competition.
hypo: Last October, this invention won first prize in the National Challenge Cup.

src: 用空气洗手：省水又酷炫
tgt: Washing hands with air: save water in a cool way
hypo: hands with air: saves water and looks cool.

src: 普通人洗手就是用水冲，顶多擦点肥皂，挤点洗手液，而李启章等同学则发明了一套“空气洗手装置 ” 。
tgt: Normally, people wash hands by flushing hands with water, with a little soap and sanitizer at most; however, Li Qizhang and his classmates invented a set of “equipment to wash hands with air”.
hypo: Ordinary people wash their hands by rinsing them with water, at most rubbing some soap and squeezing some hand sanitizer, while Qizhang and his classmates invented a set of "air hand washing devices".

src: 只要站上装置的洗手台，我们的体重就能将空气压缩而出。
tgt: As long as we stand on the washbasin of the equipment, our weight can compress the air out.
hypo: As long as we stand on the sink unit, our weight can compress the air out.

src: “就像是一个打气筒。
tgt: “Just like an inflator.
hypo: Just like an inflator.

src: 压缩出的空气，在水龙头处形成流体，和水结合在一起。
tgt: The air compressed out can form a flow at the faucet and combine with water.
hypo: The compressed air forms a fluid at the faucet and combines with the water.

src: 这样，我们就能把手洗干净啦 ！ ”
tgt: As such, we can wash our hands clean!”
hypo: "This way, we can wash our hands clean!"

src: 显色反应和细菌残留实验证明：通过这种方法洗手的效果，和普通的洗手方法是一样的。
tgt: Chromogenic reaction and germ residue experiment results prove that the effect of hand washing this way is the same as that of the ordinary method.
hypo: Chromogenic reaction and bacterial residue experiments proved that the effect of washing hands with this method is the same as that of regular hand washing.

src: 这个装置只需要依靠我们自身的重力作为驱动，既能保证洗净程度，又能节约90%的水，整个过程完全无能耗，节能环保。
tgt: This equipment is only driven by our weight, which can not only guarantee we wash our hands clean, but also save 90% of water; the entire process has no energy consumption and is energy-saving and environment-friendly.
hypo: This device can be solely driven by our own gravity, which can ensure the cleanliness of washing and only needs 10% of water, with zero energy consumption throughout the whole process, making it energy-saving and environmentally friendly.

src: 去年，在第二届全球重大挑战峰会中，这项发明在诸多世界顶尖名校中脱颖而出，获得唯一的金奖。
tgt: Last year, at the 2nd Global Grand Challenge Summit, this invention emerged among all the top universities in the world and was awarded with the only gold award.
hypo: Last year, this invention stood out among many top universities in the world and won the only gold award at the second Global Grand Challenges Summit.

src: 重庆中职学校试点现代学徒制 入学即是企业准员工-新华网
tgt: Modern apprenticeship system is tried in secondary vocational schools in Chongqing, and students are qualified employees-to-be after entrance - Xinhuanet
hypo: Chongqing secondary vocational schools pilot modern apprenticeship system, enrollment is equivalent to being a provisional employee of a company - Xinhuanet.

src: 昨天，记者从市教委获悉，今年起，我市将在60所中职学校试点“现代学徒制”人才培养模式，接受试点培养的学生同时具备学徒身份，招生录入后将被试点企业预录为单位员工。
tgt: It was learned from the Municipal Commission of Education yesterday that our city will start to implement “modern apprenticeship system” in 60 secondary vocational schools from this year, and the students participating in the program have the identity of apprenticeship at the same time, who will be pre-recruited as employees of the experimental units after being enrolled.
hypo: Yesterday, the reporter learned from the Municipal Education Commission that starting this year, our city will pilot the "modern apprenticeship" talent training mode in 60 vocational schools. Students who receive pilot training will also have apprentice status, and after enrollment, they will be pre-registered as employees of pilot enterprises.

src: 市教委要求，规范中职学校招生录取和企业用工程序，明确学徒的中职学校学生和企业准员工双重身份，按照双向选择原则，学徒、学校和企业签订三方协议，对于年满16周岁未达到18周岁的学徒，须由学徒、监护人、学校和企业四方签订协议，确定各方权益及学徒在岗培养的具体岗位、教学内容、权益保障等。
tgt: According to the requirements of the Municipal Commission of Education, it is necessary to standardize the enrollment procedure of secondary vocational schools and the enterprise employment procedure, specify the dual identities of the students as both students of secondary vocational schools and employees-to-be of enterprises; according to the two-way selection principle, three-party agreement shall be signed by apprentices, schools and enterprises; for apprentices from the age of 16 to 18 years old, four-party agreement shall be signed by apprentices, guardians, schools and enterprises, to determine the rights and interests of all parties as well as specific posts, teaching content, protection of rights and interests, etc.
hypo: vocational schools, the employment procedures of enterprises, the dual identity of apprentices as secondary vocational school students and prospective employees of enterprises, the principle of mutual selection, a tripartite agreement between the apprentice, school, and enterprise, and a four-party agreement for apprentices who are between 16 and 18 years old with the consent of their guardians, to determine the rights and interests of all parties involved, as well as the specific positions, teaching content, and protection of rights for on-the-job training.

src: 鼓励试点学校采用现代学徒制形式与合作企业联合开展企业员工岗前培训和转岗培训。
tgt: Experimental unit schools are encouraged to adopt the modern apprenticeship system and work with cooperative enterprises to carry out pre-job training and post-shift training for employees.
hypo: Encourage pilot schools to adopt the modern apprenticeship system and collaborate with enterprises to provide pre-employment training and post-shift training for enterprise employees.

src: 试点学校要改革人才培养模式。
tgt: Experimental unit schools shall carry out reform on talent cultivation model.
hypo: Experimental schools need to reform their talent cultivation model.

src: 校企共同设计人才培养方案，共同制订专业教学标准、课程标准、岗位标准、企业师傅标准、质量监控标准及相应实施方案。
tgt: Experimental unit schools and enterprises shall work together to design talent training plan and jointly formulate professional teaching standard, curriculum standard, post standard, enterprise master standard, quality monitoring standard and corresponding implementation plan.
hypo: Implementation plan for jointly designing talent training programs between schools and enterprises, jointly formulating professional teaching standards, course standards, job standards, enterprise mentor standards, quality monitoring standards, and corresponding implementation plans.

src: 试点以培养学制为一个试点周期，学生在企业的实习时间根据专业人才培养方案确定，顶岗实习一般为6个月。
tgt: The experimental unit schools take each training program as a period for experiment, and the time of internship of students in enterprises shall be determined according to professional talent training plan; in-post internship is generally 6 months.
hypo: "In the pilot phase, the cultivation period of students is set as a pilot period. During their internship in enterprises, the students' schedule is determined based on the plan for cultivating specialized talent, and the duration of the on-the-job training generally lasts for six months."

src: 在企业实践应实施企业班组化管理模式，根据不同专业的特点，1个师傅可带2～5个徒弟，组成学习小组，确保学生熟练掌握每个轮训岗位所需的技能。
tgt: Enterprise working group management mode shall be implemented during enterprise practices; according to features of different majors, one master can teach 2 to 5 apprentices, and learning groups can be formed to ensure that students can master the skills required for each post of training in rotation.
hypo: "In enterprise practice, the enterprise team-oriented management mode should be implemented. Based on the characteristics of different specialties, one master can train 2 to 5 apprentices, forming a study group to ensure that students become proficient in the skills required for each rotation position."

src: 根据安排，从2016年起到2019年8月，我市分三批确定60个市级中职现代学徒制试点，每个试点人数在50人左右，总共培养3000名左右学生（学徒 ） 。
tgt: According to the arrangement, the 60 municipal modern apprenticeship system experimental units will be determined in three batches from 2016 to August, 2019, with about 50 apprentices in each experiment unit, and a total of around 3000 students (apprentices) will be trained.
hypo: According to the plan, starting from 2016 until August 2019, our city has designated 60 city-level modern apprenticeship pilot programs for secondary vocational schools in three batches, with each pilot group consisting of around 50 students, training a total of approximately 3,000 students (apprentices).

src: 按照先试点再推行，由点到面逐步推进的原则，探索建立校企联合招生、联合培养、一体化育人的长效机制，切实提升学生岗位技能，提高学生对口就业率和就业质量。
tgt: According to the principle of experimental units first and implementation later, and gradual advancement from point to area, the long-term mechanism of joint recruitment by schools and enterprises, joint training and integrated training shall be explored and established, so as to fundamentally improve the job skills of students and improve the rate of employment fitting students’ major, as well as the quality of employment quality of students.
hypo: Following the principle of pilot testing before implementation and gradually promoting from point to surface, we will explore the establishment of a long-term mechanism for schools and enterprises to jointly recruit and cultivate students and integrate them into education, which will effectively enhance students' job skills and improve their employment rate and quality.

src: 中国儿童中心将举办系列活动让孩子“高科技”过“六一 ” - 新华网
tgt: China Children’s Center will hold a series of activities to let children celebrate “Children’s Day” with high technology – Xinhuanet
hypo: The China Children's Center will hold a series of activities to allow children to "celebrate Children's Day with high technology." - Xinhua News Agency.

src: 新华社北京５月２０日电（黄小希 周珊珊）记者２０日从中国儿童中心获悉，５月２８日至６月１日“六一”儿童节前后，中国儿童中心计划将举办儿童创客体验、儿童视觉艺术节、亲子书香嘉年华等一系列活动，让孩子们在前沿科技的魅力中度过“六一 ” 。
tgt: Message from Xinhua News Agency Beijing on May 20 (journalists: Huang Xiaoxi and Zhou Shanshan) According to China Children’s Center on May 20, from May 28 to June 1, before and on the “Children’s Day”, China Children’s Center will hold a series of activities such as Children as Makers, Children’s Visual Art Festival and the Carnival of Parent-Child Reading, to let children celebrate Children’s Day while immersing themselves in the charisma of cutting-edge technologies.
hypo: On May 20th, Beijing News Service (Huang Xiaoxi, Zhou Shanshan) - It was learned from the Chinese Children's Center on the 20th that from May 28th to June 1st, before and after the "Children's Day" on June 1st, the Chinese Children's Center will hold a series of activities such as children's maker experience, children's visual art festival, parent-child book carnival, etc. to allow children to spend "Children's Day" in the charm of cutting-edge technology.

src: 据了解，中国儿童中心今年“六一”儿童节期间举办的活动包括“爱家创酷”儿童未来学习嘉年华、首届儿童视觉艺术节 、 “ 书香嘉年华”活动 、 “ 全家爱阅读”绘本系列活动等。
tgt: It is understood that the activities held during the “Children’s Day” by China Children’s Center this year include the “Cool Maker Loves Family” carnival of children’s future learning, the first children’s visual art festival, the “Book Carnival” event and the “Whole Family Loves Reading” Picture Book Reading activity.
hypo: According to reports, the China Children's Center will hold various activities during this year's "June 1st" Children's Day, including the "Love Home Cool Creation" Children's Future Learning Carnival, the First Children's Visual Arts Festival, the "Book Fair Carnival" event, and the "Whole Family Love Reading" Picture Book Series activity.

src: 中国儿童中心副主任李忠明在２０日举行的２０１６年“六一”儿童节媒体通气会上介绍说 ， “ 爱家创酷”儿童未来学习嘉年华是今年中国儿童中心庆“六一”的重点活动。
tgt: According to the introduction from Li Zhongming, Deputy Director of China Children’s Center, at the 2016 “Children’s Day” media exchange meeting held on May 20, “Cool Maker Loves Family” carnival of children’s future learning is a key activity held by China Children’s Center for “Children’s Day”.
hypo: Li Zhongming, Deputy Director of China Children's Center, introduced at the media briefing for the 2016 "June 1st" Children's Day on the 20th that the "Love Home Creative" Children's Future Learning Carnival is the key activity of celebrating "June 1st" at China Children's Center this year.

src: 活动着眼于将社会创新与家庭个人创意有机结合，通过儿童和家庭参与体验各种创新教育活动，让创新实践成为大众家庭的文化基因，让“动手做”成为广大家庭新的学习和生活方式。
tgt: The activity focuses on combining social innovation and family and personal creativity; the activity makes innovative practices a cultural gene of the public by letting children and their families experience various innovative and educational activities, to make “do-it-yourself” as a new way of learning and living of families.
hypo: The activity aims to organically combine social innovation with family and personal creativity, and through the participation and experience of various innovative educational activities by children and families, make innovation practice become the cultural gene of the general public family, and make "hands-on learning" a new way of learning and life for the majority of families.

src: 据悉 ， “ 爱家创酷”儿童未来学习嘉年华包括“豆果创客”体验活动、老牛儿童探索馆周年庆暨“探索全家爱 童萌过六一”活动、ＶＲ全民体验计划 、 “ 创客部落”互动工作坊等几十项前沿科技体验内容。
tgt: It is understood that “Cool Maker Loves Family” carnival of children’s future learning includes dozens of leading scientific and technological experience such as the “Douguo Makers” experience activity, Old Cow children exploration house anniversary celebration and the “Exploring Love of the Whole Family, Celebrate the Children’s Day with Innocence” activity, VR Public Experience Plan and “Creator Tribe” interaction workshop.
hypo: According to reports, the "Love Home Creation" Children's Future Learning Carnival includes dozens of cutting-edge technology experience contents, such as "Doogoo Maker" experience activities, Old Cow Children's Exploration Museum anniversary celebration and "Exploring the Whole Family Love on Children's Day" activities, VR nationwide experience plan, and "Maker Tribe" interactive workshops.

src: 南非医生：奥密克戎传播力虽强 但多为轻症
tgt: Doctors from South Africa: Although more transmissible, most of the patients infected by Omicron are mild cases
hypo: South African doctor: Although Omicron is highly transmissible, it mostly causes mild symptoms.

src: 南非许多医生和医疗专家认为，新冠病毒奥密克戎变种所致病症比德尔塔变种更为轻微，虽然传播速度更快。
tgt: Many doctors and medical experts in South Africa believe that patients infected by Omicron are milder cases compared with those infected by Delta, although Omicron is more transmissible.
hypo: Many South African doctors and medical experts believe that the symptoms caused by the Omicron variant of the coronavirus are milder than those caused by the Delta variant, despite its faster transmission.

src: 据美联社报道，随着奥密克戎变种在南非的传播，南非豪登省的一个五千多名医生组成医师组织报告说，他们目前治疗的新冠病人出现的症状都比较轻微，例如身体疼痛和咳嗽等与流感类似的症状。
tgt: According to report from the Associated Press, as Omicron is being transmitted in South Africa, a report by a physician organization composed by more than 5,000 doctors in Gauteng, South Africa says that most of the current patients of COVID-19 in treatment have mild symptoms, such as body ache and cough, which are similar to symptoms of flu.
hypo: As Omicron variant spreads in South Africa, a group of over 5,000 doctors in the Gauteng province reported to the press, according to the Associated Press, that the new Covid-19 patients they are currently treating are exhibiting mild symptoms such as body aches and coughs, which are similar to those associated with the flu.

src: 该组织总监安本·皮莱（Unben Pillay）医生说，他每天都要看几十名病人，但是还没有任何病人需要住院。
tgt: According to Doctor Unben Pillay, chief supervisor of the organization, he needs to provide medical services to dozens of patients every day, but none of them needs to be hospitalized.
hypo: The organization's director, Dr. Unben Pillay, said that he sees dozens of patients every day, but none of them require hospitalization.

src: 皮莱说 ： “ 他们能够在家里控制疾病，大多数人在隔离10至14天内康复 。 ”
tgt: Pillay said, “Their diseases can be controlled at home, and most of them can recover after quarantine of 10 to 14 days.”
hypo: Pillay said: "Their disease can be controlled at home, and most people recover within 10 to 14 days of isolation."

src: 他说，这包括老年患者和那些有健康问题的患者，这些人群本来更容易因冠状病毒感染而陷入重症。
tgt: He said that those included aged patients and patients with health problems, who were easier to become severe cases due to infection of the COVID-19.
hypo: He said that this includes elderly patients and those with health problems, who are originally easier to fall into severe illness due to the coronavirus infection.

src: 他说，与之相比，在上一波的德尔塔疫情中，他治疗的新冠患者“呼吸困难，血氧水平低。
tgt: He said that, in comparison, the COVID-19 patients he treated in the last round of epidemic suffered from “breathing difficulties and low blood oxygen.
hypo: "He said that compared to the previous wave of the Delta outbreak, the COVID-19 patients he treated suffered from breathing difficulties and low blood oxygen levels."

src: 许多人几天内就要住院 ” 。
tgt: Many of them needed to be hospitalized within only a few days”.
hypo: "Many people will be hospitalized within only a few days."

src: 在南部非洲首次报告奥密克戎变异毒株后的两周内，其他医生也分享了类似的经验。
tgt: Other doctors shared similar experience within 2 weeks after the first report of Omicron the new variant in South Africa.
hypo: Within two weeks of the first report of the Omicron variant strain in southern Africa, other doctors shared similar experiences.

src: 虽然收集足够的数据还需要几个星期的时间，但医生的观察和早期证据提供了一些线索。
tgt: Although it will take some more weeks to collect sufficient evidence, observation and early proof from doctors have provided some clues.
hypo: Although collecting enough data will take a few weeks, the doctor's observations and early evidence have provided some clues.

src: 据南非国家传染病研究所总结：在近几周住院的新冠患者中，只有30%是严重病症，是前一波疫情重症比例的一半；平均住院时间从8天缩短到2.8天；近期的新冠患者中，仅有3%死亡，而在南非早期爆发的病例中，死亡比例达20 % 。
tgt: According to the summary made by National Institute of Infectious Diseases of South Africa, among the patients of COVID-19 who were hospitalized within the last few weeks, only 30% of them were severe cases, which accounts for a half of the proportion of severe cases of the last round of epidemic; the average stay at hospital is reduced from 8 days to 2.8 days; only 3% of the latest patients of COVID-19 died, which used to be as high as 20% in the cases of the early epidemic phase in South Africa.
hypo: According to the summary of the National Institute of Communicable Diseases of South Africa, in recent weeks, only 30% of hospitalized COVID-19 patients had severe symptoms, which is half of the proportion of severe cases during the previous wave of the epidemic; the average hospital stay has been reduced from 8 days to 2.8 days; among recent COVID-19 cases, only 3% resulted in death, whereas the death rate reached 20% in the cases that broke out in South Africa earlier.

src: 非洲健康研究所所长威廉·哈内科姆（Willem Hanekom）引用国家传染病研究所的数据和其他报告说 ： “ 目前，几乎所有的迹象都表明，这是一种较温和的疾病 。 ”
tgt: By quoting the data from National Institute of Infectious Diseases of South Africa and other reports, Willem Hanekom, Director of Africa Institute of Health said, “At present, almost all the evidence indicates that this is a relatively mild disease.”
hypo: Willem Hanekom, director of the African Health Research Institute, quoted data from the National Institute of Infectious Diseases and other reports, saying, "Currently, almost all indications suggest that this is a relatively mild disease."

src: 他还说 ： “ 现在还是早期，我们需要获得后期数据。
tgt: He also said: “However, it’s still at early stage, and we need to obtain data of later stage.
hypo: said, "Currently, it is still the early stage, we need to obtain data from later stages."

src: 通常情况下，住院和死亡发生的时间较晚，而我们进入这一波疫情的时间只有两周 。 ”
tgt: In general situations, hospitalization and death happen later, and it’s only two weeks since we entered into this round of epidemic.”
hypo: death occur later, two weeks.   "In general circumstances, hospitalization and death occur later, but we entered this wave of epidemic only two weeks ago."

src: 与此同时，世界各地的科学家正在观察病例数和住院率，同时测试目前的疫苗和治疗方法的效果。
tgt: At the same time, scientists from all over the whole world are observing the number of medical cases and the rate of hospitalization, as well as testing the effect of the current vaccines and treatment method.
hypo: At the same time, scientists around the world are observing the number of cases and hospitalization rates, while testing the effectiveness of current vaccines and treatment methods.

src: 尽管德尔塔仍然是全世界主要的新冠病毒株，但奥密克戎病例正在数十个国家出现，其中南非为疫情中心。
tgt: Although Delta is still the main COVID-19 virus strain of the world, Omicron cases are emerging in dozens of countries with South Africa at the center of the epidemic.
hypo: Although Delta is still a major strain of the coronavirus worldwide, Omicron cases are appearing in dozens of countries, with South Africa as the epicenter of the outbreak.

src: 据卫生官员介绍，豪登省在12月的第一周发现的新病例增加了400 % ， 测试显示，奥密克戎变体的病例占90%以上。
tgt: According to introduction from health officials, the new cases detected in Gauteng province in the first week of December increased by 400%; according to test results, Omicron variant cases accounted for more than 90%.
hypo: According to health officials, the new cases detected in the first week of December in Gauteng increased by 400%, and tests showed that more than 90% of the cases were of the Omicron variant.

src: 教育时评:拯救被拐儿童要靠什么？
tgt: Education news commentary: What should we do to rescue abducted children?
hypo: Education review: What is the key to rescuing abducted children?

src: 如果类比“没有买卖就没有杀害”的著名公益广告语，那么，在没有“收拐”需求的良好环境里，群防群治、全民反拐，使拐卖行为无利可图、风险大、成本高，这类犯罪也就不会屡屡发生。
tgt: As the famous public service advertising says, “there is no killing if there is no buying”; in a good environment with no demand of “buying abducted children”, if the masses can prevent and fight against abduction together and make abduction an action with no benefit, high risk and cost, then such crimes will not happen again.
hypo: As the famous public service slogan goes, "no trade, no harm." Similarly, in a good environment where there is no demand for child abduction, community prevention and control and universal anti-abduction efforts make abduction and trafficking unprofitable, risky, and costly. As a result, this type of crime will not happen again and again.

src: 近日，公安部刑事侦查局打拐办开发的儿童失踪信息紧急发布平台上线。
tgt: Recently, the platform of emergency release of missing children information developed by the Anti-Abduction Office of Criminal Investigation Bureau of the Ministry of Public Security went online.
hypo: Public Security, Criminal Investigation Bureau, anti-trafficking efforts, children, disappearances, emergency release platform online.  Recently, the Ministry of Public Security's Criminal Investigation Bureau's anti-trafficking efforts developed an emergency release platform for information on missing children to go live.

src: 这是为建立儿童失踪信息发布的权威渠道、及时找回被拐儿童而创设的互联网信息平台。
tgt: This is an Internet information platform established as an authoritative channel for the release of missing children information and timely finding the abducted children.
hypo: This is an internet information platform created to establish an authoritative channel for the release of information on missing children and to facilitate the timely recovery of abducted children.

src: 听闻此App名为“团圆 ” ， 顿觉暖意十足。
tgt: I feel warm after hearing the App is named “reunion”.
hypo: I heard that this app is called "Family Reunion", and I feel a great warmth from it.

src: 新技术手段不仅名称“文艺 ” 、 情怀满满，而且信息化运用得当，实用、有效。
tgt: This new technical means not only has an “artistic” name and full of warm feelings, but also makes appropriate use of informatization, making itself practical and effective.
hypo: The new technology means not only has a literary and emotional name, but also makes appropriate use of information technology, practical and effective.

src: 打拐执法，首要目标是寻回被拐的孩子，保护其人身安全、自由。
tgt: The first and foremost objective of fighting against abduction is to find the abducted children and ensure their security and freedom.
hypo: The foremost goal of cracking down on child abduction is to recover the first children who have been abducted and protect their personal safety and freedom.

src: 其次才是对嫌疑人的审判与惩罚。
tgt: The judgment and punishment to the suspect is secondary.
hypo: Secondly, it is the judgment and punishment of the suspect.

src: 刑事惩罚的意义，从个别惩罚、社会预防到法律教育，可以列举很多“大词 ” 。
tgt: In terms of the significance of criminal punishment, lots of “big words” can be listed from individual punishment and social prevention to legal education.
hypo: The significance of criminal punishment can be listed with many "big words," from individual punishment and social prevention to legal education.

src: 但在拐卖案件告破之前，应优先关注被害人的人身安全。
tgt: However, before solving an abduction case, the safety of the victims should be priority.
hypo: Before solving the abduction case, priority should be given to the personal safety of the victim.

src: 事分轻重缓急，在急切的“寻救”目的之下，诸如“拐卖儿童是否应当一律死刑”之类众说纷纭、争议较大的话题，可以暂搁下来，谨慎讨论；但救助被拐儿童的事情等不得。
tgt: There are orders of priority; with the urgent goal of “rescue”, the discussion on contentious topics with divergent public opinions such as “if death penalty shall be applied to criminals of child abduction” can be shelved for now and be discussed with discretion; however, rescuing abducted children cannot be delayed.
hypo: The importance of matters varies. Under the urgent goal of "rescue," controversial topics such as whether child trafficking should be punishable by death can be set aside for cautious discussion. However, the matter of rescuing abducted children cannot be delayed.

src: 根据此类案件的侦办经验，人贩子惯于在得手之后尽快远离作案地点。
tgt: According to the experience in solving such cases, human trafficking traders tend to run away from the crime scene as soon as possible after the crime.
hypo: According to the experience of investigating such cases, human traffickers tend to leave the crime scene as soon as possible after succeeding.

src: 寻拐行动多耽搁一分钟，孩子就可能更远离家长一步，案件侦破的难度也就增加一分。
tgt: Therefore, with each minute delayed in finding abducted children, the children are farther from the parents, and the difficulty of solving the case also increases.
hypo: If the search and rescue operation is delayed by even one minute, the child may be farther away from their parents, and the difficulty of solving the case will increase by one point.

src: 在此情况下，拿出如“团圆”平台这样直接有助于侦破案件、寻回孩子的有效办法，确实是务实的行动。
tgt: In this case, it is a practical action to present a platform such as “reunion” which can help solve the case and provide an effective method to find the children.
hypo: In this situation, taking out an effective method like the "Tuan Yuan" platform can directly help solve cases and retrieve missing children, which is indeed a practical action.

src: 毕竟 ， “ 打拐”是需要运作起整个法制系统来做好的一件大任务。
tgt: After all, cracking down on abduction is a major task that requires the coordination of the entire legal system.
hypo: After all, "fighting against trafficking" is a huge task that requires the coordination of the entire legal system to be done well.

src: 打击犯罪、保障儿童和家长权益，从立法的完善，到司法的保障，以及执法的缜密，无不需要贯彻“护幼扶弱”的关怀。
tgt: To crack down on crimes and protect the interests of children and parents, the care of “protecting the young and helping the weak” shall be implemented in the improvement of legislation, and in safeguarding judicial system and meticulous enforcement.
hypo: "From perfecting legislation, to safeguarding judicial protection, and meticulous law enforcement, all aspects of combating crime and safeguarding the rights and interests of children and parents require the implementation of a caring attitude of 'protecting the young and supporting the weak'."

src: 此外，拐卖儿童的预防，从家庭到社会，都还可以做得更好。
