tgt: Xi Jinping pointed out that the world today is undergoing major changes rarely seen in a century; global scientific and technological innovation has entered an intensive and active period; the latest round of scientific and technological revolution and industrial reform have exerted a profound impact on the global economic structure.
hypo: Chinese President Xi Jinping pointed out that the world is currently experiencing a great change that rarely occurs in a century, with the intensification and activation of global technological innovation. The new round of technological revolution and industrial changes have had a profound impact on the global economic structure.

src: 粤港澳大湾区要围绕建设国际科技创新中心战略定位，努力建设全球科技创新高地，推动新兴产业发展。
tgt: The Greater Bay Area of Guangdong, Hong Kong and Macau should center on the strategic positioning of building an international scientific and technological innovation center, strive to build a highland of global scientific and technological innovation, and promote the development of emerging industries.
hypo: The Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area aims to strategically position itself as an international center of technology innovation and promote the development of emerging industries to build a global highland of technological innovation.

src: 中国愿同世界各国科学家、国际科技组织一道，密切国际科技交流合作，加强重大科学问题研究，促进共性科学技术破解，深化重点科学项目协作，共同推进世界科学事业发展，更好造福人类。
tgt: China is willing to work with scientists, international scientific and technological organizations around the globe to carry out close international scientific and technological exchanges and cooperation, strengthen research on major scientific problems, promote the cracking of common scientific technologies, deepen cooperation on key scientific projects, jointly promote the development of science on a global scale and better benefit mankind.
hypo: China is willing to work closely with scientists and international scientific organizations from around the world, to strengthen international scientific exchange and cooperation, enhance research on significant scientific problems, promote the resolution of universal scientific and technological problems, deepen collaboration on key scientific projects, and jointly advance the development of the world's scientific enterprise, for the betterment of humanity.

src: 2021年大湾区科学论坛当日在广东省广州市开幕，主题为“探索未来，共享科学 ” ， 由广东省人民政府主办。
tgt: 2021 Greater Bay Area Science Forum hosted by Guangdong Province People’s Government opened that day in Guangzhou, Guangdong with theme “discover the future, share science”。
hypo: The 2021 Greater Bay Area Science Forum opened in Guangzhou, Guangdong Province, with the theme of "Exploring the Future, Sharing Science," sponsored by the People's Government of Guangdong Province.

src: 广西大学生休学创业年限最长可达５年-新华网
tgt: University students in Guangxi can suspend schooling to start their own business for as long as 5 years - Xinhuanet
hypo: In Guangxi, the maximum length of the suspension of studies for college students to start their own businesses can reach up to 5 years - Xinhua net.

src: 新华社南宁５月１９日专电（记者张莺）记者近日从广西壮族自治区教育厅获悉，今后广西各高校将实施弹性学制，放宽大学生休学年限，在校生休学创业的年限在原有学制基础上可延长２至５年，休学创业时间可视为实践教育时间。
tgt: Message from Xinhua News Agency Nanning on May 19 (journalist: Zhang Ying) according to information from Department of Education of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region, universities and colleges in Guangxi will implement flexible education system and broaden the time limit for schooling suspension for students, and the year limit for students at school who suspend schooling to start their own businesses can be extended by 2 to up to 5 years based on the original length of education system, and the time for suspension from school and entrepreneurship can be regarded as the time for practical education.
hypo: On May 19th, Xinhua News Agency Nanning Special Report (Reporter Zhang Ying) reported that recently, the Education Department of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region announced that all universities in Guangxi will implement a flexible education system. The leave of absence for students will be extended, and the period for students' leave of absence for entrepreneurship can be extended from 2 to 5 years based on the original academic system. This time period can be considered as practical education time.

src: 为促进大学生创业创新能力提升，广西教育、人社等部门合力搭建创业平台，建设更多大学生校外实践教学基地、大学科技园、大学生创业园、创业孵化基地等，给大学生创业提供外在保障。
tgt: In order to promote the capabilities of entrepreneurship and innovation of university students, Departments of Education and Human Resource and Social Security of Guangxi worked together to establish the an entrepreneurship platform, set up more off-campus practice teaching bases, university science and technology parks, entrepreneurship parks for university students and business incubation bases, which provide external support for the entrepreneurship of university students.
hypo: In order to promote the improvement of the entrepreneurial and innovative abilities of university students, the education and human resources departments of Guangxi have joined forces to build an entrepreneurship platform, to construct more off-campus practice teaching bases for university students, science and technology parks, university student entrepreneurship parks, and entrepreneurship incubation bases, to provide external support for university students' entrepreneurship.

src: 根据要求，到２０２０年，各高校创新创业实践基地面积，本科学校要达到３０００平方米以上，高职学校要达到２０００平方米以上。
tgt: According to related regulations, up until 2020, the area of innovation and entrepreneurship practice base of undergraduate universities shall be at least 3,000 square meters and that of vocational schools shall be at least 2,000 square meters.
hypo: According to requirements, by 2020, the area of innovation and entrepreneurship practice bases in each university should be at least 3,000 square meters for undergraduate universities and at least 2,000 square meters for vocational universities.

src: 政府鼓励高校设立创新创业学分，优先支持在创新创业实践中表现优异的学生转专业。
tgt: Governments encourage universities to set up credits for innovation and entrepreneurship, to give priority in the transfer of major of students with outstanding performance in innovation and entrepreneurship.
hypo: Governments encourage universities to establish credits for innovation and entrepreneurship, and prioritize the transfer of students who have performed outstandingly in innovation and entrepreneurship practice.

src: 高校教师每两年要至少有两个月到行业企业挂职锻炼，以此提高教师创新创业教育的意识和能力。
tgt: Teachers in universities and colleges are required to take a temporary post in enterprises of related industries to train for at least two months every two years, so as to improve the awareness and ability of innovation and entrepreneurship education of the teachers.
hypo: High school teachers are required to participate in at least two months of industry visits and hands-on training every two years to enhance their awareness and ability in entrepreneurship education.

src: 自治区教育厅要求广西各高校深入实施大学生创新创业训练计划，力争使每一名大学生在校期间都参与一项创新创业训练计划。
tgt: It is required by the Department of Education of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region that universities and colleges shall thoroughly implement the innovation and entrepreneurship training program for university students, and strive to make each student participate in one innovation and entrepreneurship training program while in university.
hypo: The Education Department of the Autonomous Region requires all universities in Guangxi to deeply implement the training program for college students' innovation and entrepreneurship, striving to ensure that every college student participates in at least one innovation and entrepreneurship training program during their academic years.

src: 高校要积极组织学生参加各级各类创新创业竞赛，并给予经费支持。
tgt: Universities and colleges shall actively organize students to participate in various types and levels of innovation and entrepreneurship competitions, and provide financial support.
hypo: High schools should actively organize students to participate in various levels and types of innovation and entrepreneurship competitions, and provide financial support.

src: NEWS GOV-MO: 澳大向7位杰出人士颁授荣誉博士学位
tgt: NEWS GOV-MO: University of Macau awarded the degree of honorary doctorate to 7 distinguished people
hypo: NEWS GOV-MO: Macau awards honorary doctorate to 7 distinguished individuals.

src: 澳门大学今（11）日举行“2021年荣誉学位及高等学位颁授典礼 ＂ ， 向刘遵义、陈凯先、中村修二、李兰娟、李效良、朱丽兰及江朝晖颁授澳大荣誉博士学位，以表彰其卓越成就、为社会和教育的发展所作出的重大贡献。
tgt: The “2021 Award-Giving Ceremony for Honorary Degree and Advanced Degree” was held in University of Macau today (the 11th day of this month) to award the degree of honorary doctorate of the University of Macau to Liu Zunyi, Chen Kaixian, Shuji Nakamura, Li Lanjuan, Li Xiaoliang, Zhu Lilan and Jiang Zhaohui to commend their outstanding achievements and their major contributions to social and educational development.
hypo: The University of Macau held the "2021 Honorary and Higher Degree Awarding Ceremony" today (11), conferring the honorary doctoral degrees of the University of Macau to Liu Zunyi, Chen Kaixian, Nakamura Shuji, Li Lanjuan, Li Xiaoliang, Zhu Lilan, and Jiang Zhaohui to recognize their outstanding achievements and significant contributions to society and education.

src: 颁授典礼上，行政长官兼澳大校监代表、社会文化司司长欧阳瑜在澳大校董会主席林金城、澳大校长宋永华陪同下颁授荣誉博士学位。
tgt: At the award-giving ceremony, Ouyang Yu, the chief executive, the representative of the university superintendent of University of Macau and the director of the Social and Cultural Department, awarded the degree of honorary doctorate accompanied by Lin Jincheng, chairman of the university board, and Song Yonghua, president of University of Macau.
hypo: At the University of Macau's convocation ceremony, the representative of the Chief Executive and the University of Macau's supervisor, as well as the Director of the Social and Cultural Affairs Bureau, Ouyang Yu, conferred an honorary doctorate in the presence of the University of Macau's Board of Directors Chairman, Lin Jingcheng, and President, Song Yonghua.

src: 刘遵义教授获颁荣誉教育博士学位、陈凯先教授获颁荣誉理学博士学位、中村修二教授获颁荣誉理学博士学位、李兰娟教授获颁荣誉理学博士学位、李效良教授获颁荣誉工商管理博士学位、朱丽兰教授获颁荣誉理学博士学位，江朝晖女士获颁荣誉理学博士学位。
tgt: Professor Liu Zunyi was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Education; Professor Chen Kaixian was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Science; Professor Shuji Nakamura was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Science; Professor Li Lanjuan was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Science; Professor Li Xiaoliang was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Business Administration; Professor Zhu Lilan was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Science and Ms. Jiang Zhaohui was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Science.
hypo: "Professor Liu Zunyi was awarded an honorary Doctor of Education degree, Professor Chen Kai was awarded an honorary Doctor of Science degree, Professor Nakamura Shuji was awarded an honorary Doctor of Science degree, Professor Li Lanjuan was awarded an honorary Doctor of Science degree, Professor Li Xiaoliang was awarded an honorary Doctor of Business Administration degree, Professor Zhu Lilan was awarded an honorary Doctor of Science degree, and Ms. Jiang Zhaohui was awarded an honorary Doctor of Science degree."

src: 欧阳瑜致辞时首先向获颁发荣誉博士学位的七位杰出人士，表示热烈的祝贺并致以崇高的敬意，他们分别在不同的领域取得非凡的成就，为国家的发展和世界的进步作出了卓越的贡献；同时，欧阳瑜向毕业生和家长表达最真挚的祝福，也向大学爱岗敬业、学术精湛的教职员团队致以由衷的敬意。
tgt: In his speech, Ouyang Yu enthusiastically congratulated and expressed great respect to the seven distinguished people awarded with the honorary doctorate, who made outstanding achievements in different fields and excellent contributions to the development of the country and the progress of the world; at the same time, Ouyang Yu expressed the most sincere wishes to the graduates and their parents, and showed sincere respect to the teachers who cherish their posts, stay devoted to their career, and have exquisite academic skills.
hypo: fields, outstanding achievements, country's development, world's progress, graduation students, sincere wishes, faculty and staff team, dedication, academic excellence.   During his speech, Ouyang Yu first congratulated and paid homage to the seven outstanding individuals who were awarded honorary doctoral degrees, expressing warm congratulations and profound respect. They have achieved extraordinary accomplishments in different fields, making outstanding contributions to the country's development and the world's progress. At the same time, Ouyang Yu conveyed his sincere wishes to the graduating students and their families, as well as offered heartfelt respect to the dedicated and academically excellent faculty and staff team of the university.

src: 澳大人文学院讲座教授孙艺风宣读刘遵义赞辞时表示，刘遵义教授是一位享誉全球的经济学家，以其卓越的学术成就和前瞻性的教育理念而闻名。
tgt: When reading the praises to Liu Zunyi, Sun Yifeng, a chair professor of the Faculty of Humanities of University of Macau, praised Professor Liu Zunyi as an economist famous across the world, who is famous for his excellent academic achievements and prospective educational ideas.
hypo: During the lecture at the Faculty of Humanities of the University of Macau, Professor Sun Yifeng announced his praise for economist Liu Zunyi, stating that Professor Liu is a world-renowned economist famous for his remarkable academic achievements and forward-thinking educational ideas.

src: 除了在经济发展、经济增长及东亚经济领域取得的成就外，他还是一位富有远见的教育领导者。
tgt: Apart from achievements made in economic development and growth as well as in the economic industry in East Asia, he is also a visionary educational leader.
hypo: Apart from the achievements he has made in economic development, economic growth, and East Asian economic field, he is also a visionary educational leader.

src: 简而言之，他在众多领域都有杰出建树。
tgt: In short, he has made achievements in many fields.
hypo: In short, he has outstanding achievements in numerous fields.

src: 孙艺风宣读中村修二赞辞时表示，中村修二教授是可持续能源技术的先驱者。
tgt: Sun Yifeng said while reading praises to Shuji Nakamura that Professor Shuji Nakamura is a pioneer in sustainable energy technology.
hypo: When Sun Yifeng read the praise to Professor Nakamura Shuji, he expressed that Professor Nakamura Shuji is a pioneer in sustainable energy technology.

src: 他因发明蓝色发光二极管（LED）而成为2014年诺贝尔物理学奖的三位获奖者之一。
tgt: He became one of the three prize winners of 2014 Nobel Prize in Physics with his invention of blue LED.
hypo: He became one of the three winners of the Nobel Prize in Physics in 2014 for inventing the blue light-emitting diode (LED).

src: 中村教授的发明不仅彻底改变了照明行业，更推动产生了如今广泛应用于日常生活和工业生产的白色发光二极管，为人类的福祉做出了巨大的贡献。
tgt: The invention of Professor Shuji Nakamura has utterly changed the lighting industry and led to the creation of the white LED, which is widely applied in daily life and industrial production today, making great contributions to welfare of human beings.
hypo: Professor Nakamura's invention not only utterly changed the lighting industry, but also propelled the widespread use of white light-emitting diodes in everyday life and industrial production, making great contributions to human well-being.

src: 孙艺风宣读李兰娟赞辞时表示，李兰娟教授作为中国人工肝事业的开拓者，创建独特有效的李氏人工肝系统，治疗重型肝炎肝衰竭获重大突破，显著降低肝衰竭的病死率。
tgt: When reading the praises to Li Lanjuan, Sun Yifeng praised her as the pioneer of the artificial liver industry in China, who has created the unique and effective Li’s artificial liver system, made great breakthroughs in the treatment of severe hepatitis and hepatic failure, and significantly reduced the fatality rate of hepatic failure.
hypo: "Sun Yifeng stated during the reading of Li Lanjuan's praise that Professor Li Lanjuan, as a pioneer of China's artificial liver industry, created the unique and effective Li's artificial liver system, which has made significant breakthroughs in the treatment of severe hepatitis and liver failure, and significantly reduced the mortality rate of liver failure."

src: 在这次新冠肺炎抗击战中，她和团队所提出的“四抗二平衡”方案及带去的人工肝、微生态和干细胞三大技术，显著提高了重症救治率。
tgt: In the fight against the COVID-19, the “four-against and two-balance” scheme proposed by her and her team and the three technologies including artificial liver, micro-ecology and stem cells have significantly improved the treatment and cure rate of severe cases.
hypo: During the fight against COVID-19, her team's proposed "Four Antis and Two Balances" plan, as well as the three major technologies brought along: artificial liver, microecology, and stem cells, significantly improved the cure rate of critically ill patients.

src: 孙艺风宣读李效良赞辞时表示，李效良教授为运营管理的创新研究奠定了基础，塑造了供应链理论和实践的思维方式，并彻底改变了世界各地的商业模式。
tgt: When reading the praises to Li Xiaoliang, Sun Yifeng said that he laid a foundation for creative research on operation management, shaped the way of thinking for the theory and practice of supply chain and thoroughly changed the commercial mode all over the world.
hypo: When reading, Sun Yifeng expressed that Professor Li Xiaoliang had laid a foundation for innovative research in operations management, shaped the thinking of supply chain theory and practice, and thoroughly changed commercial models around the world.

src: 李效良因普及运筹管理中的长鞭效应概念而闻名，并探索了应对这种现象的措施。
tgt: Li Xiaoliang is famous for popularizing the concept of bullwhip effect in operation management, and he has explored the measures to cope with this phenomenon.
hypo: Li Xiaoliang is famous for popularizing the concept of bullwhip effect in supply chain management and has explored measures to address this phenomenon.

src: 如今，各国在疫情及紧张的经济局势下，长鞭效应愈发突显，引发供应链严重破坏。
tgt: Now, all countries are facing the epidemic and the intense situations in economics, and the bullwhip effect has been increasingly prominent, leading to serious destruction in the supply chain.
hypo: Nowadays, under the epidemic and tense economic situation, the bullwhip effect is becoming more and more prominent among various countries, leading to severe disruption of the supply chain.

src: 李效良具有远见的研究如雪中送炭，帮助行业应对困境，从而带来巨大的社会价值。
tgt: The prospective research conducted by Li Xiaoliang is like offering fuel in snowy weather, helping the industries to cope with the difficulties and bringing about huge social values.
hypo: The research conducted by Li Xiaoliang, with his far-sightedness, is like sending coal in the snow, helping the industry to overcome difficulties, and bringing about huge social values.

src: 孙艺风宣读朱丽兰赞辞时表示，在科研工作中，她发现了一种突破性和创新的染色技术用于制备样品，在国内外科技同行中享有较高声誉。
tgt: When reading the praises to Li Zhu Lilan, Sun Yifeng said that Zhu Lilan found a groundbreaking and creative staining technique during scientific research and applied it in preparing samples, and she enjoyed great reputation among counterparts in science and technology at home and abroad.
hypo: When announcing Zhu Lilan's accolades, Sun Yifeng stated that while performing scientific research, she found a groundbreaking and innovative staining technique that she applied for sample preparation, earning high reputation among her peers both domestically and abroad.

src: 她以非凡的科技成就荣膺国际欧亚科学院院士等重要荣誉称号，以自己辉煌的业绩为自己在世界科技圣殿赢得了应有的崇高地位。
tgt: She was awarded with honorary titles such as an academician of International Eurasian Academy of Sciences with her outstanding scientific achievements, and won the lofty position in the temple of science and technology of the world with her splendid achievements.
hypo: She was honored with important titles such as the prestigious Eurasian Academy of Sciences for her extraordinary technological achievements, and her brilliant career has earned her the lofty status she deserved in the world's scientific arena.

src: 澳大中华医药研究院代院长陈新宣读陈凯先赞辞时表示，陈凯先教授从事药物研发40余载，杰出的科学成就以及对国家、澳门、澳门大学、国家重点实验室的重要贡献使其拥有崇高的国际地位和声望。
tgt: When reading the praises to Chen Kaixian, Chen Xin, the acting dean of Institute of Chinese Medical Sciences of University of Macau, said that Professor Chen Kaixin has been engaged in research and development of medicine for more than 40 years, and has won lofty international status and reputation due to his excellent scientific achievements as well as his great contributions the country, Macau, University of Macau and national key laboratories.
hypo: Acting President Chen Xin of the Australia-China Academy of Medical Research read praises to Professor Chen Kaixin, stating that Professor Chen Kaixin has been engaged in drug development for over 40 years, and his outstanding scientific achievements as well as his important contributions to the country, Macau, the University of Macau, and the National Key Laboratory have given him a lofty international position and reputation.

src: 他对澳门和大湾区中医药事业发展的积极推动作用充分体现了其为国家医药发展战略奉献的使命感。
tgt: His active promotion of the development of Traditional Chinese Medicine to Macau and the Greater Bay Area has sufficiently reflected his sense of mission in his contribution to medical development strategy in our country.
hypo: His active promotion of the development of traditional Chinese medicine in Macau and the Greater Bay Area fully reflects his sense of mission to contribute to the national medical development strategy.

src: 澳大科技学院院长须成忠宣读江朝晖赞辞时表示，江朝晖女士参与研发的重大发明和专利，至今累积超过15项与存储虚拟化、导航、文件系统和电源管理相关，无不实用性高，使用广泛，提升人类生活便利度。
tgt: When reading the praises to Jiang Zhaohui, Xu Chengzhong, dean of the Institute of Technology of University of Macau, said that 15 significant inventions and patients developed with the participation of Ms. Jiang Zhaohui are related to storage virtualization, navigation, document system and power management, which are all highly practical, widely applied and improved the convenience of life.
hypo: The President of the University of Macau Science and Technology, Cheng Zhong, said when reading the praises of Jiang Zhaohui, that Ms. Jiang has participated in the research and development of major inventions and patents, accumulating more than 15 items related to storage virtualization, navigation, file systems, and power management, all of which are highly practical and widely used, enhancing the convenience of human life.

src: 作为卓有成就的发明家，江女士往往能把高深的科技和理论化繁为简，普及大众。
tgt: As an inventor with outstanding achievements, Ms. Jiang can turn sophisticated technology and theories into simple concepts and popularize them to the public.
hypo: As a highly accomplished inventor, Ms. Jiang can often turn complex science and theories into simple ideas that can be easily understood by the general public.

src: 最后，陈凯先作为荣誉博士代表宣读谢辞。
tgt: At last, Chen Kaixian delivered the thank-you speech as the representative of honorary doctorates.
hypo: Finally, Chen Kai, as a representative of honorary doctorates, read out the thank-you speech.

src: 他很高兴看到澳门及大湾区的医药事业树立了一个良好的典范：从澳大建立的第一个中药质量研究国家重点实验室到大湾区中医药的蓬勃发展，澳大在整合大湾区中医药领域优秀人才中贡献了巨大作用。
tgt: He was happy to see that the industry of medicine in Macau and Greater Bay Area has set a good example: from the University of Macau establishing the first National Key Laboratory of Traditional Chinese Medicine Quality Research to the prosperous development of the traditional Chinese medicine industry in Greater Bay Area, the University of Macau has played a major role in integrating outstanding talents of traditional Chinese medicine.
hypo: He was pleased to see that the pharmaceutical industry in Macau and the Greater Bay Area had set a good example: from the establishment of the first national key laboratory for traditional Chinese medicine quality research at the University of Macau to the thriving development of traditional Chinese medicine in the Greater Bay Area, the University of Macau has played a huge role in integrating outstanding talents in the traditional Chinese medicine field of the Greater Bay Area.

src: 此外，他认为澳大的管理团队拥有远见卓识，不仅在学术上为学生提供科研沃土，同时为社会输送了许多拥有责任心的人才。
tgt: In addition, he thinks the management team of the University of Macau is far-sighted, who not only provide students with abundant resources of research, but also send a lot of responsible talents to society.
hypo: In addition, he believes that the management team of the University of Macau has great foresight, providing students not only with a lot of academic research opportunities but also delivering a lot of responsible talents to society.

src: 他很荣幸能跟澳大展开交流与合作，并对澳大近年取得的成就表示由衷祝贺。
tgt: He was honored to carry out exchanges and communication with University of Macau and congratulated University of Macau on the achievements it achieved in recent years.
hypo: He was honored to have the opportunity to exchange ideas and collaborate with the University of Macau, and he offers sincere congratulations on the achievements that the University of Macau has attained in recent years.

src: 美亚裔团体投诉耶鲁等3所常春藤名校招生歧视-新华网
tgt: Asian communities in the US complains about admission discrimination by Yale and two other Ivy League universities - Xinhuanet
hypo: Asian communities complain about discrimination in the admissions process at three Ivy League schools, including Yale - Xinhua News Agency.

src: 新华社华盛顿５月２３日电（记者徐剑梅）美国１３０多个亚裔团体２３日向美国教育部和司法部提交申诉，抗议３所常春藤名校 — — 耶鲁大学、布朗大学和达特茅斯学院在招生过程中歧视亚裔申请学生。
tgt: Message from Xinhua News Agency Washington on May 23 (journalist: Xu Jianmei): More than 130 Asian communities in the US submitted a complaint to the Ministry of Education and Ministry of Justice in the US on May 23 to protest against the discrimination on Asian students in the enrollment of 3 Ivy League universities, Yale University, Brown University and Dartmouth College.
hypo: 23rd, the US Department of Education and Department of Justice received a complaint from over 130 Asian-American groups protesting against Yale University, Brown University, and Dartmouth College, alleging discrimination against Asian-American applicants in their admissions processes.

src: 牵头发起申诉的亚裔教育联盟当天在华盛顿召开新闻发布会。
tgt: Asian American Coalition for Education, who initiated the complaint, held a press conference in Washington on that day.
hypo: The American Coalition of Asian Americans Education, who took the lead in filing a complaint, held a press conference in Washington that day.

src: 该团体主席赵宇空在发布会上说，过去１０年里，符合美国名校录取条件的亚裔申请人数量成倍增长，但在这３所美国名校中，亚裔所占比例基本维持在同一水平。
tgt: According to the speech made by Zhao Yukong, chairman of the group, during the past 10 years, the number of Asian applicants who met the admission qualification of famous universities in the US has doubled and redoubled; however, in these famous universities in the US, the proportion of Asian students basically maintained at the same level.
hypo: The group's president, Zhao Yukong, said at the press conference that in the past decade, the number of Asian-American applicants who meet the admissions requirements of top American universities have doubled. However, at these three prestigious American universities, the proportion of Asian-Americans has remained at the same level.

src: 许多研究表明，这些高校在所谓“综合考量”的招生过程中 ， “ 长期持续性以及系统化地歧视亚裔申请学生 ” 。
tgt: According to lots of research results, these universities “discriminated against Asian students in a long-term, continuous and systematic way” during the so-called “comprehensive consideration”of the admission process.
hypo: Many studies indicate that these universities practice "long-standing and systematic discrimination against Asian-American applicants" during the admission process that is commonly referred to as "holistic review".

src: 赵宇空介绍说，２０１４年桑德斯等学者的研究显示，在这３所高校里，相对申请者人数，亚裔在所有族裔中录取率最低。
tgt: As introduced by Zhao Yukong, according to research results of scholars such as Saunders in 2014, in these 3 universities, Asian students have the lowest acceptance rate among all the ethnic groups considering the number of applicants.
hypo: Zhao Yukong explained that in 2014, research by scholars such as Sanders showed that among all ethnic groups in these three universities, Asian Americans had the lowest admission rates relative to the number of applicants.

src: 美国教育部的数据也显示，在所有常春藤盟校中，布朗大学和达特茅斯学院对亚裔学生的录取比例最低，耶鲁大学和布朗大学对亚裔申请学生实施了事实上的种族配额达２０年以上。
tgt: Data from Department of Education of the US also indicates that among all the Ivy League Universities, Brown University and Dartmouth College have the lowest acceptance rate of Asian students; Yale University and Brown University have been implementing racial quota of Asian applicants for more than 20 years.
hypo: The data from the US Department of Education also shows that among all Ivy League schools, Brown University and Dartmouth College have the lowest admission rates for Asian American students, and Yale University and Brown University have implemented de facto racial quotas for Asian American applicants for over 20 years.

src: 赵宇空告诉新华社记者，他们期望提交申诉后，美国教育部、司法部能够展开调查，并在认定事实后采取措施阻止这些高校继续在招生中歧视亚裔。
tgt: Zhao Yukong told the journalist of Xinhua News Agency that they wished that Ministry of Education and Ministry of Justice of the US could conduct investigation after they submitted the complaint, and take measures to prevent these universities from continuing to discriminate against Asian students in the admission process after identifying the facts.
hypo: Zhao Yukong told the Xinhua News Agency reporter that they hope that after submitting an appeal, the US Department of Education and Department of Justice can conduct investigations and take measures to prevent these universities from continuing to discriminate against Asians in the admission process after confirming the facts.

src: 他们也期望被投诉高校能够主动重视这一问题，改变对亚裔的招生政策。
tgt: They also wished that the universities being complained about could pay attention to this issue on their own initiative and change the recruitment policy for Asian students.
hypo: They also hope that the complained-about universities can take the initiative to pay attention to this issue and change their admission policies for Asian students.

src: 目前，被投诉的３所高校尚未作出回应。
tgt: The 3 universities being complained about have not responded yet.
hypo: Currently, the 3 universities complained about have not responded yet.

src: 亚裔教育联盟成立于２０１５年，当时曾投诉哈佛大学招生歧视，但美国教育部以程序理由未予受理。
tgt: Established in 2015, Asian American Coalition for Education once made a complaint against Harvard University about admission discrimination, but the US Ministry of Education did not accept the complaint on procedural grounds.
hypo: The Asian-American Education Alliance was founded in 2015 and had filed a complaint about admission discrimination against Harvard University, but the US Department of Education did not accept it on procedural grounds.

src: 此次参与申诉的除美国华裔团体外，还包括美国印度裔、韩裔、日裔、巴基斯坦裔教育团体。
tgt: In addition to Asian groups in the US, the groups involved in the complaint also include Indian, Korean, Japanese Americans and Pakistani education groups in the US.
hypo: The groups involved in the appeal this time, in addition to the Chinese-American group in the United States, also include American Indian, Korean, Japanese, and Pakistani education groups.

src: （德国之声中文网 ） " 民主峰会"周五结束后，中国外交部发言人周六（12月11日）发表谈话表示，美国举办"领导人民主峰会 " ， 是"以意识形态划线，把民主工具化、武器化，假民主之名行反民主之实，煽动分裂对抗，转移国内矛盾 " 。
tgt: (Deutsche Welle Chinese Website) After the “Democracy Summit” on Friday, the spokesperson of Foreign Ministry of China delivered a speech on Saturday (December 11), stating that the United States hosting the “Leaders’ Democracy Summit” to “make democracy tool-oriented and weapon-oriented based on ideology, to implement anti-democracy in the name of democracy, so as to incite division and confrontation and to shift domestic contradictions”.
hypo: After the "Democracy Summit" concluded on Friday, the spokesperson for the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs made a statement on Saturday (December 11th), stating that the United States hosting the "Leaders' Democracy Summit" was "drawing ideological lines, weaponizing and toolifying democracy, disguising anti-democracy with the name of democracy, inciting division and confrontation, and shifting domestic conflicts." (Translated from German by AI)

src: 中国政府认为 ， " 长期以来，美国将自己的政治制度和价值理念强加于人，推行'民主改造 ' ， 滥施单边制裁，策动'颜色革命 ' ， 造成灾难性后果。
tgt: According to the Government of China, “for a very long time, the U.S. has been imposing its own political systems and values on others, carried out ‘democratic transformation’, used unilateral sanction indiscriminately and has instigated ‘Color Revolution’, leading to disastrous consequences.
hypo: The Chinese government believes that, "For a long time, the United States has imposed its political system and values on others, promoted 'democratic reform,' imposed unilateral sanctions, instigated 'color revolutions,' and caused disastrous consequences."

src: '民主'早已成为美国干涉别国的'大规模杀伤性武器 ' 。
tgt: “Democracy has long become the weapon of mass destruction the United States used to interfere with other countries.
hypo: "Democracy" has long become a "weapon of mass destruction" for the United States to interfere with other countries.

src: 此次峰会是拜登兑现其竞选承诺的行动。
tgt: The summit was the action that Biden took to fulfill his promise made during the campaign.
hypo: The summit was an action for Biden to fulfill his campaign promise.

src: 为期两天的会议以视频方式进行，全球111个国家领导人应邀与会，其中包括台湾领导人，但中国和俄罗斯没有受到邀请。
tgt: The meetings during the 2-days summit were held via video call, and leaders from 111 countries were invited to attend the meeting, including the leaders of Taiwan; however, leaders of China and Russia were not invited.
hypo: During the two-day meetings held via video, leaders from 111 countries around the world participated, including the leader of Taiwan; however, China and Russia were not invited.

src: 峰会前夕，中国和俄罗斯就以美国自身民主出现问题抨击美国，称美国没有资格主持召开这样的峰会。
tgt: China and Russia attacked the U.S. for what was wrong with its own democracy before the summit, and said that the U.S. did not have the qualification to hold such a summit.
hypo: On the eve of the summit, China and Russia criticized the United States by citing its own democracy issues, stating that the United States did not have the qualification to host such a summit.

src: 而国际上和美国国内也有质疑声音，例如批评受邀与会的包括一些有威权专制倾向的领导人，比如菲律宾、波兰和巴西等国的领导人，有人怀疑拜登政府的真正意图并非为了民主而是为了地缘政治目的组织了这次峰会。
tgt: There were doubts internationally and in the U.S.; for example, the U.S. was criticized for inviting leaders who had the tendency to be authoritarians, such as the leaders of the Philippines, Poland and Brazil, and some suspected that the real intention of the Biden government was geopolitics, not democracy.
hypo: "There are also doubts both internationally and domestically in the United States, for example, criticizing the invitation of some leaders with authoritarian tendencies, such as the leaders of countries like the Philippines, Poland, and Brazil, and some people suspect that the true intention of the Biden government in organizing this summit is not for democracy but for geopolitical purposes."

src: 刚上任的德国总理肖尔茨也参加了视频民主峰会
tgt: German Chancellor Scholz who just took office also attended the video Democracy Summit.
hypo: Newly appointed German Chancellor Scholz also participated in the video Democracy Summit.

src: 中国外交部周六的声明称 ， " 今天的美式民主病态尽显，金钱政治、身份政治、政党对立、政治极化、社会撕裂、种族矛盾、贫富分化等问题愈演愈烈 " ， 美国的民主是建立在资本基础上的"富人游戏 " 。
tgt: According to the statement made by Chinese Foreign Ministry on Saturday, “the American democracy today is morbid, with increasingly obvious problems such as money politics, identity politics, political opposition, political polarization, social tearing, racial conflicts and polarization of the rich and the poor”, and the democracy of the U.S. was the “game of the rich” established based on the capital.
hypo: The statement by the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs on Saturday declared that "today's American democracy is morbid, with issues such as money politics, identity politics, partisan conflict, political polarization, social division, racial conflict, and wealth disparity increasingly prevalent." The democracy of the United States is a "rich man's game" built on a foundation of capital.

src: 美国总统拜登在发言中表示 ， " 作为政府的领导人，我们有责任倾听我们的公民，加固民主的护栏，推动改革，实现透明的问责治理，更能抵御专制的缓冲和冲击的力量，以及那些想在公共利益之前赤裸裸地追求权力的人 。 "
tgt: The U.S. President, Biden, expressed in his speech, “as the leaders of the government, we have the responsibility to listen to ideas of our citizens, reinforce the guardrail of democracy, promote reforms and realize transparent accountability and governance, to fight against the power of impact of buffer of autocracy and those who bluntly pursue power before public benefits.”
hypo: The President of the United States, Joe Biden, stated in his speech, "As leaders of the government, we have a responsibility to listen to our citizens, strengthen the barrier of democracy, promote reform, achieve transparent and accountable governance, better withstand the power of impact of tyranny and those who pursue power nakedly ahead of public benefits."

src: 他强调，民主并不是想当然的 ， " 我们必须在每一代人当中不断更新它，在我看来，这是我们这个时代的决定性挑战 。 "
tgt: He emphasized that democracy should not be taken for granted, “we must keep update it in every generations which is, in my opinion, the decisive challenge of our era.”
hypo: He stressed that democracy is not taken for granted, "We must constantly update it in every generation, in my view, this is the decisive challenge of our era."

src: 拜登还说，全球民主及人权"面对持续且令人忧心的挑战之际，民主需要斗士来捍卫 " 。
tgt: Biden also said that global democracy and human rights are “facing continuous and worrying challenges, and democracy should be guarded by fighters”.
hypo: Biden also said that "at a time when global democracy and human rights are facing continuous and worrying challenges, democracy needs to be guarded by fighters."

src: 美国方面承诺，在本次民主峰会后，将展开为期一年的行动，包含一项金额4.244亿美元的倡议，以加强世界各地的民主，并对独立新闻媒体提供支持。
tgt: The United States promised that after this Democracy Summit, it will carry out a series of year-long actions including a 424.4 million USD initiative to strengthen democracy around the globe and provide support to independent new media.
hypo: The United States has promised to carry out a one-year plan after the Democracy Summit, which includes an initiative of $424.4 million to strengthen democracy around the world and provide support for independent news media.

src: 美国希望各国在计划于2022年底举行的实体民主峰会前，作出具体的公开承诺，以改善其民主制度。
tgt: The U.S. wants all countries to make specific and open promises before the democratic summit held at the end of 2022, so as to improve the democratic system.
hypo: The United States hopes that countries will make specific public commitments to improve their democratic systems before the physical democratic summit scheduled for the end of 2022.

src: 拜登说 ， " 让我们所有国家都落实我们的承诺并在明年报告我们所取得的进展 " 。
tgt: Biden said, “let’s all fulfill our promises and report our progresses next year”.
hypo: Biden said, "Let us fulfill our promises in all nations and report our progresses next year."

src: 教育思考：大学考试如何让“学霸 ” “ 学渣”各得其所-新华网
tgt: Thought on Education: How do examinations in college allow straight A students and slack students both get what they deserve - Xinhuanet
hypo: Education Thinking: How to Allow "Top Students" and "Underachievers" to Both Achieve Success in College Examinations - Xinhuanet

src: 兰州交通大学3名学生给校领导写信，反映对大学考试的困惑，并提出提高考试难度，变换考试题型，让考试真正体现学生实际水平的诉求。
tgt: Three students in Lanzhou Jiaotong University wrote a letter to leaders of the university to reflect their confusion on examinations in university, and raised the ideas to increase the difficulty of examinations, change types of questions and let the examinations reflect the real learning level of students.
hypo: Three students from Lanzhou Jiaotong University wrote a letter to the school leaders, expressing their confusion regarding university exams and advocating for improvements such as increased difficulty, varied question types, and a better reflection of students' actual abilities.

src: 的确，长期以来，大学考试都是一个“热门话题 ” 。
tgt: Indeed, examinations in universities have been a “heated topic“ for a long time.
hypo: , for a long time, university entrance examinations have been a "hot topic".

src: 在大学校园，学生来自五湖四海，能力水平各不相同，再加之学习程度不一，学习的情况千差万别。
tgt: Students on campus come from all corners of the country, with varied abilities and levels; due to different efforts spent in study, their situations of study vary significantly.
hypo: In the university campus, students come from all corners of the world, with varying levels of ability, and coupled with differences in their study levels, their situations of learning are vastly different.

src: 对于具有如此多元特征的群体进行考核，存在不同感受，在所难免。
tgt: It is inevitable for different feelings about the examinations to exist in such a diversified group.
hypo: It is inevitable for there to be different feelings about assessing a group with such diverse characteristics.

src: 当然，如果考试试题题型单一、重复率高，题目过于简单，必然会造成另一种截然不同的感受。
tgt: Certainly, it will cause a completely different experience if there are few types of questions, the questions are repetitive or too simple.
hypo: Of course, if the exam questions have a single type, a high repetition rate, and are too simple, it will certainly create a completely different feeling.

src: 不用功的学生，可能考前集中突击就能及格，如若再想其他办法，有可能达到事半功倍的效果。
tgt: Students who do not study hard can pass the exam after cramming before the exam; if they think of other ways, they may half the work with double results.
hypo: don't work hard may be able to pass the exam with a last-minute cram session before the test. However, if students try other methods, they may be able to achieve twice the results with half the effort.

src: 如此一来，就出现“学渣”平时不投入也能过关、甚至得了高分 ； “ 学霸”平时从不落课，作业、笔记样样好，考试也没高出多少的“怪现状 ” 。
tgt: As such, there will be a “strange phenomenon where “slack students” who don’t ordinarily study pass the exam and even getting high scores; “straight A” students who never miss any class, take notes, do assignments get scores that are not much higher.
hypo: As a result, there is a strange phenomenon where "academic underachievers" can pass even without putting in much effort, and sometimes even achieve high scores. "Academic overachievers", on the other hand, who never skip class, have good homework and note-taking habits, do not score much higher on exams.

src: 这样看来，兰州交大的学生反映大学考试中存在的问题并非毫无来由，相信这种状况也不只兰州交大存在。
tgt: In this way, the problems in college exams reflected by students of Lanzhou Jiaotong University are not groundless; it is believed that such situations do not exist only in Lanzhou Jiaotong University.
hypo: way, it seems that the issues raised by the students of Lanzhou Jiaotong University regarding the university exams are not groundless, and it is believed that this situation is not exclusive to Lanzhou Jiaotong University.

src: 从这层意义上讲，要为这3名写信直陈的学生点赞。
tgt: In this sense, we should applaud for the three students who wrote the letter to reflect the problem directly.
hypo: In this sense, we should give a thumbs up to the three students who wrote the letter candidly.

src: 其实，上过大学的人都清楚，突击备考、想各种办法从老师处“套取”考题，争取划考试范围，求得考前得到“重点辅导”的现象并不少见，甚至在考试中夹带小抄、考后求老师高抬贵手的情况也不是奇闻。
tgt: In fact, people who have been to colleges know that the phenomena of cramming for an exam, “trying to winkle” exam questions from teachers, trying to get the scope of the questions and acquiring “key tutoring” before exam are not rare; further, bringing notes to exams or begging teachers to give higher marks after exams are not rare, either.
hypo: Actually, those who have attended college are clear that the phenomenon of cramming for exams, trying various methods to "extract" exam questions from teachers, striving to delineate exam topics, and seeking "key coaching" before exams is not rare, and even incidents of sneaking cheat sheets into exams and asking teachers for leniency after exams are not unheard of.

src: 在笔者看来，作为一种教学质量评估导向，衡量一所大学考试的合格与否，更在于教师对教与学的全面把握，以及在此基础上的科学命题。
tgt: In the view of the author, as a guidance for teaching quality evaluation, judging if the exams in a college are qualified or not relies more on the comprehensive mastering on teaching and learning by teachers, as well as the setting questions scientifically on this basis.
hypo: In the view of the writer, as a teaching quality evaluation guide, measuring the pass or fail of a university exam relies more on the teacher's comprehensive mastery of teaching and learning, as well as scientifically-based test questions built on this foundation.

src: 进入大学本科阶段，专业开始细分，很多专业课程以基础知识为主。
tgt: Majors are segmented after entering the undergraduate study, and many specialized courses are carried out with basic knowledge as the main content.
hypo: Entering the undergraduate stage of university, majors begin to be subdivided, with many courses focusing mainly on fundamental knowledge.

src: 毋庸置疑，是否全面掌握一个学科的基本知识点，是大学考试要考察的内容。
tgt: Undoubtedly, whether the students have mastered the basic knowledge is a content to be inspected in the exams in college.
hypo: Without a doubt, whether one has fully grasped the basic knowledge points of a subject is what the university exams aim to test.

src: 而本科知识基本都是学科基础理论和基本常识，从知识点而言，变化的空间并不大，基本是固定的。
tgt: Knowledge during the undergraduate study is mainly basic theories and common sense of the subject, and in terms of knowledge points, they are basically unchanged and there is not much room for variation.
hypo: "And undergraduate knowledge is basically subject fundamental theory and basic common sense. In terms of knowledge points, there isn't much space for change, it's basically fixed."

src: 就像有教师所言 ， “ 20年前学大学数学的基本知识，现在还在学，还是重点 。 ”
tgt: As some teachers have said, “the mathematical basic knowledge in college twenty years ago is still being taught today and it is still a key content.”
hypo: As some teachers have said, "The basic knowledge of mathematics learned in university 20 years ago is still being taught and is still a priority."

src: 但知识点基本不变，并不代表考试题型单一、试题重复。
tgt: However, the unchanging basic knowledge points do not mean there can be single type or repetitive questions.
hypo: But the fact that the knowledge points are basically unchanged does not mean that the exam questions are the same and that there are repetitive questions.

src: 在很多大学，考试一般都会组成出题组，再由学科资深教师统筹组成试卷，考试阅卷也由承担该科的全体老师参与，这样就能在一定程度上克服试题重复的情况。
tgt: There will usually be a group working on setting test questions for the exams, and senior teachers of the subject will coordinate and compile a test paper; marking test papers will be undertaken by all teachers of the subject; this can in a sense overcome the situation of repetitive questions.
hypo: In many universities, exams are generally composed by a team of question setters, and then the test paper is organized by experienced subject teachers. The grading of the exam is also carried out by all teachers in charge of the subject, thus overcoming the situation of repetitive questions to a certain extent.

src: 但要拟出一套符合教与学实际的试题，题目根据学生学习整体情况，难易呈正态分布，还需综合掌握教学情况，全面分析学生学习的程度，从而使考试命题对难易、题型有动态把握，既能突出基础知识考察，又能兼顾能力考查，同时对题型进行创新设计。
tgt: In order to prepare a set of test questions in accordance with practical conditions of teaching and learning, it is necessary to set questions with normal distribution in difficulty degree according to general learning conditions of students; it is also required to learn about the teaching situation, comprehensively analyze how well the students have learned so as to have a good command of the level of difficulty and type of question in designing the test paper, giving priority to inspection of basic knowledge, and testing their ability at the same time; creative designs on the type of question can be made as well.
hypo: In order to formulate a set of test questions that are in line with teaching and learning practices, the questions should be normally distributed in difficulty based on students' overall learning situation, and comprehensive analysis of their learning level should be taken into consideration to achieve dynamic control over the difficulty and types of test questions, highlighting testing of basic knowledge while also taking into account ability assessment and innovative design of question types.

src: 考试是大学教育的指挥棒，有什么样的考试，学生就会有相应的备考方案，长此以往，将影响大学教育的成效。
tgt: College exam is the baton of college education, and students prepare for college exam according to the exam types; for this reason, college exams will influence the effect of college education in the long run.
hypo: Exams are the baton of college education. Depending on the type of exams, students will have corresponding study plans. Over time, this will affect the effectiveness of college education.

src: 对于学生的建议信，兰州交大校方高度重视，已在全校部署了整改的方案。
tgt: Lanzhou Jiaotong University pays special attention to the letter of advise from the students; it has deployed the scheme for rectification in the university.
hypo: The Lanzhou Jiaotong University authority highly values the advise from students' letters of advise, and has already deployed the plan for improvement throughout the entire school.

src: 要求各教学单位组织教师开展研讨和课程结课考试对照自查，制定考试试卷命题及相关制度，同时加强对考试试卷命题及审核环节的监督与检查，细化成绩评定，加强课程教学各环节的全面考核。
tgt: It requires all teaching units to organize teachers to deliberate and conduct self-inspection on exams at the end of a course, formulate systems about question setting for exam paper, strengthen supervision and inspection on question setting and review, specify grade evaluation work, and strengthen comprehensive inspection on various links of course teaching.
hypo: The request is for each teaching unit to organize teachers to deliberate and compare end-of-course exams, set exam questions and related regulations, while also strengthening supervision and inspection of the exam question setting and review process, refining score assessment, and enhancing comprehensive assessments of all aspects of course teaching.

src: 从机制上解决试题类型单一、题目重复等问题是大学考务需要面对的议题，当然需要出台相应的制度，但功夫贵在日常，需要教师对教学情况的全面掌握，不单要吃透教学内容，更须吃透学生学习情况，两头吃透，教与学将更好对接，形成良性互动，考试也将更加符合实际，从而让“学霸”和“学渣”各得其所。
tgt: Solving problems such as types of questions are few and repetitive questions by way of changing the system is a task that college exam administration needs to deal with; regulations need to be issued, but efforts should be made in normal times; it requires teachers to comprehensive master the teaching and learning situation; they need to not only master their teaching content but also the learning situation of the students; mastering both can better connect teaching and learning, forming an effective interaction; exams will be more fit for the actual situation, and straight A students and slack students can both get what they deserve.
hypo: The issue that university exam management needs to address is to solve the problem of monotonous test types and repetitive questions from a mechanism perspective. Of course, corresponding systems need to be put in place, but the key lies in daily efforts. Teachers need to have a comprehensive master of the teaching situation, not only mastering teaching content but also understanding the learning situation of students. With a comprehensive understanding, teaching and learning can be better connected, forming a virtuous interaction. Exams will also become more practical, allowing both "straight-A students" and "struggling students" to achieve their respective goals.

src: 沙巴3200名新生婴儿无报生纸 因特制防伪纸断货
tgt: 3200 new infants in Sabah have no birth certificates because of the supply shortage of the specially made security paper.
hypo: Sabah's 3,200 newborn babies have no birth certificates due to the shortage of specially made anti-counterfeit paper.

src: （亚庇11日讯）沙巴国民登记局说，由于特制防伪纸存货用光，所以自10月初开始就无法颁发报生纸给初生婴儿，至今累积的受影响者达3200人。
tgt: (Kota Kinabalu News on the 11th) According to the National Registration Bureau of Sabah, new infants cannot be provided with birth certificates from the beginning of October due to supply shortage of the specially made security paper; a total of 3,200 infants have been influenced so far.
hypo: "Kota Kinabalu, 11th October - The Sabah National Registration Department announced that since early October, birth certificates cannot be issued to newborn infants as the special anti-counterfeit paper is out of stock, affecting a total of 3200 infants so far."

src: 不过，该局主任凯鲁阿米努斯保证，所有已经申请报生纸的婴儿，资料已经记录在系统，当防伪纸在下周运到后就会补发。
tgt: However, director of the bureau, Kerouaminus, promised that the data of all the infants applying for birth certificate has been recorded in the system, and the certificates will be issued as soon as the security paper arrives next week.
hypo: However, the director of the bureau, Kaluaminus, assures that all babies who have applied for birth certificates have their information recorded in the system, and they will be issued with the security paper once it arrives next week.

src: 他在新闻发布会上，针对一家网媒指沙巴报生纸印制问题出现长达10个月的报导，作出解释。
tgt: He made the explanation at the press conference regarding to an online media’s report that the paper shortage of birth certificates in Sabah has been going on for ten months.
hypo: He explained at the press conference regarding a report from an online media outlet that there has been a shortage of newsprint in Sabah for up to 10 months.

src: 他说，有关问题在2个月前就出现，砂拉越也面对同样的问题。
tgt: He said that related problems started 2 months ago, and that Sarawak is also facing this problem.
hypo: He said that related problems had arisen two months ago and Sarawak was also facing this.

src: “其中一个原因是生产特制防伪纸的中国厂家受疫情影响，导致延迟运抵我国 。 ”
tgt: “One of the reasons is that the manufacturers of the security paper in China are influenced by the epidemic, leading to a delay in delivery to our country.”
hypo: One of the reasons is that the Chinese manufacturer of special security paper was affected by the epidemic, resulting in delayed delivery to our country.

src: 他解释，沙巴报生纸使用的防伪纸和其他地区不同，因此不能商借其他州属的存货。
tgt: He explained that the security paper used for birth certificates in Sabah is different from that of other regions, and therefore stock in other regions cannot be borrowed.
hypo: "He explained that the anti-counterfeit paper used for Sabah's birth certificates is different from those used in other regions, thus it cannot be borrowed from the stocks of other states."

src: 凯鲁阿米努斯透露，最新一批防伪纸已经于本月6日运抵吉隆坡，过后于8日交给印刷公司，进行部分印制工作。
tgt: Kerouaminus disclosed that the latest batch of security paper has been delivered to Kuala Lumpur on December 6, and was handed over to the printing company on December 8 for part of the printing work.
hypo: "Keluar Aminous revealed that the latest batch of anti-counterfeit paper had arrived in Kuala Lumpur on the 6th of this month and was subsequently delivered to the printing company on the 8th for some printing work."

src: “该局下周四将派人到吉隆坡取货，回到沙巴立刻进行最后阶段的打印，估计多2个工作日（12月20日）就可以交到申请者手上 。 ”
tgt: “The National Registration Bureau of Sabah will dispatch staffs to pick up the goods in Kuala Lumpur next Thursday to complete the printing of the last stage after returning to Sabah, and it is estimated that they can be given out to the applicants at most 2 working days later (December 20).”
hypo: "The bureau will send someone to Kuala Lumpur next Thursday to pick up the goods, and immediately proceed to the last stage of printing upon arriving in Sabah. It is estimated that it will take an additional 2 working days (December 20) to be delivered to the applicant's hands."

src: “我们会通知申请者前往各地分局领取报生纸 。 ”
tgt: “We’ll notify the applicants to get the birth certificates at their local branch bureau.”
hypo: We will notify applicants to go to the local branch offices to collect their birth certificates.

src: 他补充，沙巴今年至今共发出2万4801张报生纸。
tgt: He added that Sabah has issued 24,801 birth certificates so far this year.
hypo: "He added that Sabah has issued a total of 24,801 birth certificates so far this year."

src: 人民日报评论员 ： “ 十四五”实现良好开局 — — 论学习贯彻中央经济工作会议精神-新华网
tgt: Commentators from People’s Daily: “The 14th Five-Year Plan” has seen a good start – discussion on studying and implementing the spirit of the Central Economic Work Conference – Xinhuanet
hypo: Commentator of People's Daily: "Good Start Achieved for the 14th Five-Year Plan" -- On Learning and Implementing the Central Economic Work Conference Spirit - Xinhuanet

src: 新华社北京12月11日电 人民日报12月12日评论员文章 ： “ 十四五”实现良好开局 — — 论学习贯彻中央经济工作会议精神
tgt: Message from Xinhua News Agency Beijing on December 11: “The 14th Five-Year Plan” has seen a good start – discussion on studying and implementing the spirit of the Central Economic Work Conference
hypo: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, December 11th - People's Daily commentator article on December 12th: "Realizing a good start for the 14th Five-Year Plan"- on learning and implementing the spirit of the Central Economic Work Conference.

src: “实现了‘十四五’良好开局 ” ， 12月8日至10日举行的中央经济工作会议高度评价一年来我国经济社会发展取得的成绩。
tgt: “Realizing a good start of the 14th Five-Year Plan”, the achievements made in economic and social development in our country for the past year were highly praised at the Central Economic Work Conference held from December 8 to 12.
hypo: The Central Economic Work Conference, held from December 8th to 10th, highly praised the achievements of China's economic and social development over the past year, and realized a good start to the "14th Five-Year Plan".

src: 习近平总书记在会上发表重要讲话，深刻总结2021年经济工作，深入分析当前经济形势，对2022年经济工作作出重大部署，为我们做好明年经济工作，迎接党的二十大胜利召开，指明了前进方向、提供了根本遵循。
tgt: General Secretary Xi Jinping gave an important speech at the conference, made a profound summary of the economic work of 2021, conducted in-depth analysis on current economic situations, made significant deployment on economic work of 2022, pointed out the direction for moving forward and provided the fundamental principles for the economic work next year to welcome the 21st National Congress of the CPC.
hypo: General Secretary Xi Jinping delivered an important speech at the meeting, deeply summarizing the economic work in 2021, analyzing the current economic situation in-depth, and making major deployments for the economic work in 2022, providing us with fundamental guidance for moving forward and working well in the economic work next year, and welcoming the successful convening of the 20th National Congress of the Party.

src: 我们隆重庆祝中国共产党成立一百周年，正式宣布全面建成小康社会、实现第一个百年奋斗目标，开启全面建设社会主义现代化国家、向第二个百年奋斗目标进军新征程。
tgt: We solemnly celebrated the centenary of the foundation of the Communist Party of China, officially announced the comprehensive building of a moderately prosperous society and the realization of the first centennial objective, and we will embark on a new journey of building a modern socialist country in an all-round way and march towards the second centennial objective.
hypo: We celebrate with great ceremony the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China, officially announcing the comprehensive building of a moderately prosperous society and the achievement of the first centenary goal, laying the foundation for the comprehensive building of a socialist modernized country and embarking on a new journey towards the second centenary goal.

src: 我们召开党的十九届六中全会，总结党的百年奋斗重大成就和历史经验，通过百年党史上第三个历史决议《中共中央关于党的百年奋斗重大成就和历史经验的决议 》 ， 这是新时代中国共产党人牢记初心使命、坚持和发展中国特色社会主义的政治宣言，是以史为鉴、开创未来、实现中华民族伟大复兴的行动指南。
tgt: We held the Sixth Plenary Session of the 19th Central Committee of the Party, summarized the significant achievements and historical experience of one-hundred-year struggle of the Party, passed Resolution of the CPC Central Committee on the Major Achievements and Historical Experience of the Party’s Centennial Struggle, the third historical resolution in the one-hundred year history of the Party, which is also the political declaration for the Chinese Communists in the new era in order to bear in mind our initial aspiration and mission, and insist on developing socialism with Chinese characteristics; it is an action guide for creating the future and realizing the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation by taking history as reference.
hypo: We convened the Sixth Plenary Session of the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China to summarize the major achievements and historical experience of the Party's century-long struggle. Through the third historical resolution in the Party's centennial history, "Resolution of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China on the Major Achievements and Historical Experience in the Party's Century-long Struggle," this is a political manifesto for the new era for Chinese communists to keep their original mission in mind and adhere to and develop socialism with Chinese characteristics. It is a guide for action to learn from history, create the future, and realize the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation.

src: 一年来，世界百年未有之大变局和新冠肺炎疫情全球大流行交织影响，外部环境更趋复杂严峻，国内新冠肺炎疫情防控和经济社会发展各项任务极为繁重艰巨。
tgt: For the past year, under the intertwined influences of the great changes never seen during the past one hundred years and the COVID-19 global pandemic, external environments were more complicated and grim, and the tasks of pandemic prevention and control and various economic and social development tasks are extremely heavy and arduous.
hypo: Over the past year, the world has experienced an unprecedented and intertwined event of a global pandemic and a major upheaval. The external environment has become even more complicated and severe, while the domestic tasks of COVID-19 prevention and control, and economic and social development have become extremely heavy and arduous.

src: 以习近平同志为核心的党中央坚持统筹国内国际两个大局，坚持稳中求进工作总基调，沉着应对百年变局和世纪疫情，统筹疫情防控和经济社会发展，加快构建新发展格局，强化宏观政策跨周期调节，着力促进经济持续健康发展，着力深化改革开放创新，奋力完成改革发展艰巨任务，党和国家各项事业取得了新的重大成就。
tgt: The Party Central Committee with Xi Jinping as the core insists on taking both the domestic and international situations into consideration, adheres to the general tone of seeking progress in stability, calmly copes with the great changes in the past one hundred years and the epidemic of the century, coordinates epidemic prevention and control and economic and social development as a whole, accelerates the construction of the new development pattern, strengthens the cross cyclical adjustment of macro policies, lays emphasis on promoting continuous healthy development of economy and deepening reform, opening up and innovation, and works hard to complete reform and development tasks; new significant achievements in various undertakings of the Party and our country have been made.
hypo: Comrade Xi Jinping, as the core of the Party Central Committee, adheres to the overall national and international situation, and adheres to the general work guideline of seeking progress while maintaining stability. He calmly responds to the centenary changes and the century's pandemic, coordinates epidemic prevention and control with economic and social development, accelerates the construction of a new development pattern, strengthens macro policy adjustments across cycles, focuses on promoting sustained and healthy economic development, and deepens reform, opening up and innovation. The Party and the country have achieved major new achievements in various undertakings of completing difficult reform and development tasks.

src: “十四五”实现良好开局，一个重要方面体现在，构建新发展格局迈出新步伐，高质量发展取得新成效。
tgt: One of the important aspects of the good start of the “14th Five-Year Plan” is that we are taking a new step in constructing the new development pattern, and new achievements have been obtained with high-quality development.
hypo: development pattern, new progress, high-quality development, new results.   The "14th Five-Year Plan" has achieved a good start, with an important aspect reflected in taking new steps to build the new development pattern, and new progress has been made in high-quality development, resulting in new results.

src: 我国经济发展和疫情防控保持全球领先地位，发展韧性强、潜力大、动力足的特点持续显现；国家战略科技力量加快壮大，重大创新成果竞相涌现，科技创新能力持续提升，关键核心技术攻关实现新突破；产业链韧性得到提升，对外贸易量增质升，结构继续优化，以新产业新业态新模式为代表的新动能成长壮大；改革开放向纵深推进，着力打通制约供需适配和要素流动的堵点，以高水平对外开放打造合作竞争新优势；民生保障有力有效，就业规模持续扩大，居民收入增长与经济增长基本同步，全年粮食连续7年保持在1.3万亿斤以上，喜获“十八连丰 ” ； 生态文明建设持续推进，碳达峰碳中和工作统筹推进，绿色低碳转型步伐稳健，生态环境保护取得新成效。
tgt: The economic development and epidemic prevention and control of our country is a leading position in the world, with the characteristics of strong development tenacity, great potential and sufficient motivation continuing to emerge; the strategic scientific and technological strength has expanded in an accelerated way, with significant innovative achievements emerging continuously; the scientific and technological innovation ability is continuously improved, leading to new breakthroughs in key and core technologies; the industry chain tenacity is improved, and the foreign trade quantity and quality have been elevated, structure is further optimized, and new kinetic energy represented by new industries, new business forms and new models grows and expands; the reform and opening up are promoted in a deeper way, so as to break through the blocking points restraining the matching of the supply and the demand and the flowing of factors, and to build new competitiveness for cooperation with high-standard opening up; the guarantee of people’s livelihood is powerful and effective, employment scale is further expanded, and personal income growth is basically in step with economic growth; the grain output of the whole year has been more than 1.3 trillion jin for 7 consecutive years, getting “good harvest for 18 consecutive years”; the construction of ecological civilization has been continuously promoted, and the peak carbon dioxide emissions and the carbon neutrality works have been planned as a whole, the green low-carbon transformation has been ongoing in a steady way, and ecological environment has made new achievements.
hypo: Our country's economy and epidemic prevention and control continue to maintain a leading position globally with the characteristics of strong resilience, great potential, and abundant dynamism being continuously promoted. The national strategic scientific and technological strength is rapidly growing, with significant innovative achievements emerging, and the ability for technological innovation continuing to improve. Breakthroughs have been achieved in key core technology research. The resilience of the industrial chain has been enhanced, with an increase in the quality and quantity of foreign trade, and a continuous optimization of its structure. New driving forces, represented by new industries, new formats, and new modes continue to grow and expand. Reform and opening-up are promoted continuously, with a focus on breaking through bottlenecks that restrict supply and demand adaptation and factor mobility. High-level opening-up is being developed to create new competitive advantages. Effective safeguarding of people's livelihood and continuous expansion of employment scale are taking place, with growth in residents' income synchronization with economic growth and the annual grain yield for seven consecutive years exceeding 1.3 trillion kilograms, achieving the "18 consecutive abundance." The construction of ecological civilization is continuously promoted, with a coordinated promotion of carbon peaking and carbon neutrality work. A steady and stable pace is being pursued for green and low-carbon transformation, and new achievements are being made in the protection of the ecological environment.

src: 这些成绩的取得，是以习近平同志为核心的党中央坚强领导的结果，是习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想科学指引的结果，是全党全国各族人民勠力同心、艰苦奋斗的结果。
tgt: These achievements are the results of the strong leadership of the Party Central Committee with Xi Jinping as its core, the results of the scientific guidance of Xi Jinping thought on socialism with Chinese Characteristics in the new era, and the results of unity and hard work of the entire Party and the people of all ethnic groups in China.
hypo: "The achievements made are the result of the strong leadership of the Party Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping at its core, guided by Xi Jinping's new era of Chinese socialism with Chinese characteristics, and the result of the united efforts and hard work of the entire party, people of all ethnic groups across the country."

src: 实践再次证明，党确立习近平同志党中央的核心、全党的核心地位，确立习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想的指导地位，对新时代党和国家事业发展、对推进中华民族伟大复兴历史进程具有决定性意义。
tgt: It is proved by practice again that the establishment of the position of Xi Jinping as the core of the Party Central Committee and the Party, and the establishment of the guiding position of Xi Jinping thought on socialism with Chinese Characteristics in the new era play a decisive role in promoting the development of the Party and the country in the new era and in propelling the historical process of the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation.
hypo: Once again, practice has proven that the establishment of Comrade Xi Jinping as the core of the Party Central Committee and the core of the whole party, as well as the establishment of his guiding position in the new era of socialism with Chinese characteristics, holds decisive significance for the development of the Party and the country in the new era and for advancing the historic process of the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation.

src: 有习近平总书记作为党中央的核心、全党的核心领航掌舵，有习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想科学指引，有全党全国各族人民团结一心、顽强奋斗，我们就一定能够战胜各种艰难险阻，在全面建设社会主义现代化国家新征程上创造新的时代辉煌、铸就新的历史伟业。
tgt: With General Secretary Xi Jinping as the core of the Party Central Committee, with the scientific guidance of socialism with Chinese characteristics of Xi Jinping in the new era, with unity and struggle of people of all ethnic groups in the Party and the whole country, we can solve all difficulties and create new glories and historical achievements in the new journey of building a socialist modern country in an all-round way.
hypo: With General Secretary Xi Jinping as the core of the Party Central Committee and the entire party, Xi Jinping's new era of socialism with Chinese characteristics as a scientific guide, and the united and tenacious struggle of the whole party and all ethnic groups throughout the country, we can certainly overcome various difficulties and obstacles, and create new era brilliance and forge a new historical undertaking in the new journey of building a socialist modern country in an all-round way.

src: 明年将召开党的二十大，这是党和国家政治生活中的一件大事。
tgt: The 20th National Congress of the CPC will be held next year, which is a major event for the political life of our Party and country.
hypo: Next year, the 20th National Congress of the Party will be held, which is a major event in the political life of the Party and the country.

src: 弘扬伟大建党精神，坚持稳中求进工作总基调，完整、准确、全面贯彻新发展理念，加快构建新发展格局，全面深化改革开放，坚持创新驱动发展，推动高质量发展，坚持以供给侧结构性改革为主线，统筹疫情防控和经济社会发展，统筹发展和安全，继续做好“六稳 ” 、 “六保”工作，持续改善民生，着力稳定宏观经济大盘，保持经济运行在合理区间，保持社会大局稳定，我们就一定能保持平稳健康的经济环境、国泰民安的社会环境、风清气正的政治环境，以优异成绩迎接党的二十大胜利召开。
tgt: We should carry forward the great spirit of Party building, insist on the fundamental principle of seeking for improvement in stability, implement the development idea in a complete, accurate and comprehensive way, accelerate construction of the new development pattern, comprehensively deepen reform and opening up, insist on driving development with innovation, promote high-quality development, insist on taking the supply-side structural reform as the principal line, coordinate the epidemic prevention and control and economic and social development as a whole, plan development and security as a whole, continue to implement “six-stability” and “six-guarantee” work, continue to improve people’s livelihood, lay emphasis on stabilizing macroscopic economy, keep economy operation within reasonable ranges and maintain social stability; in this way, we must be able to keep a stable and healthy economic environment, a peaceful and safe social environment, a clean and upright political environment, and welcome the successful convocation of the 20th CPC National Congress with excellent results.
hypo: If we carry forward the great spirit of the Party's founding, persist in the general working principle of pursuing progress while maintaining stability, comprehensively, accurately and thoroughly implement the new development concept, accelerate the establishment of new development patterns, deepen reform and opening-up in an all-around way, adhere to innovation-driven development, promote high-quality development, focus on supply-side structural reform, coordinate epidemic prevention and control with economic and social development, balance development and security, continue to do a good job in the "six stabilities" and "six guarantees", continuously improve people's livelihoods, focus on stabilizing the macroeconomic situation, maintain the economy within a reasonable range, and keep the overall social stability, we can certainly maintain a stable and healthy economic environment, a safe and peaceful social environment, and a clean and honest political environment, and welcome the 20th Party Congress with outstanding achievements.

src: 让我们更加紧密地团结在以习近平同志为核心的党中央周围，增强“四个意识 ” 、 坚定“四个自信 ” 、 做到“两个维护 ” ， 不断提高政治判断力、政治领悟力、政治执行力，以实际行动把党中央决策部署落实到位，不断把新时代中国特色社会主义事业推向前进。
tgt: Let us unite more closely around the Party Central Committee with Xi Jinping as the core, strengthen “four-awareness”, be steadfast in insisting on “four self-confidence”, achieve “two-maintenance”, keep improving political judgment, political perception, political execution, implement the decisions made by the Party Central Committee with practical actions, and keep promoting socialism with Chinese characteristics in the new era.
hypo: Let us unite more closely around the Party Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping as the core, enhance our "Four Consciousnesses", strengthen our "Four Confidences", uphold the principle of "Two Safeguards", continuously improve our political judgment, political perception and political execution, and implement the decisions and arrangements of the Party Central Committee with practical actions, and continuously advance the cause of socialism with Chinese characteristics in the new era.

src: 教育资讯：北京压缩2016年初中入学特长生比例-新华网
tgt: Education News: Beijing reduces the proportion of students with special talents in middle schools enrollment in 2016 - Xinhuanet
hypo: Education News: Beijing is reducing the ratio of enrollment in talented middle school students in 2016 - Xinhua News Agency.

src: 21日、22日两日，北京市初中入学特长生考查工作由各区教委统一组织实施。
tgt: On the 21st and the 22nd, the inspection of the enrollment of students with special talents in middle schools was organized and implemented by education commissions of different districts.
hypo: On the 21st and 22nd, the examination for enrolling talented middle school students in Beijing was carried out by the education commissions of each district in a unified manner.

src: 今年，北京各区均压缩了特长生招生比例，特长生竞争更为激烈。
tgt: This year, districts in Beijing have reduced the proportion of students with special talents in the enrollment, leading to more fierce competition in students with special talents.
hypo: This year, Beijing's districts have all reduced the ratio of admissions for students with special talents, making competition among such students even more intense.

src: 以东城区为例，今年该区小学升初中特长生入学比例总体不超过全区招生计划数的5 % ， 计划招生人数为380人，到校比例不超过学校招生计划数的10 % 。
tgt: Take Dongcheng District as an example, the entrance proportion of students with special talents in the enrollment of middle schools does not exceed 5% of the total number in the district; the planned number is 380, and the proportion of students checking in at the school shall not exceed 10% of the enrollment plan of the school.
hypo: Taking Dongcheng District as an example, this year the overall proportion of specialized students admitted to junior high schools in this district shall not exceed 5% of the total enrollment plan. The enrollment plan is for 380 students, and the proportion of students who actually enter the school shall not exceed 10% of the school's enrollment plan.

src: 凡具有体育、艺术、科技特长且在网上报名的学生均有资格参加特长生招生考查。
tgt: Students with talent in sports, art and science and technology who applied online are all qualified to participate in the inspection of students with special talents.
hypo: All students who have talents in sports, arts, and technology and have applied online are eligible to participate in the enrollment examination for talented students.

src: 为方便学生就近参加考查，东城区延续去年的考查安排方式，在每个学区分别设置1~2个考查地点，共13个考查地点。
tgt: In order to provide convenience for students to participate in the examination at a nearby location, Dongcheng District continues with the examination arrangement of the past year by setting one or two examination locations in each school district, and there are totally 13 examination locations.
hypo: In order to facilitate students to participate in the examination nearest to them, Dongcheng District continues the examination arrangement method of last year, setting one to two examination locations in each school district, with a total of 13 examination locations.

src: 考点均按考区划分考场，以小时为单位划分时段，考查当天学生将按时段进入考点在不同考区考场内进行考查。
tgt: The examination locations are divided according to the examination districts, and the time frames are divided in hours, and students will be examined in different examination rooms after entering the examination locations according to the assigned time frame.
hypo: "The exam venues are divided according to the examination areas, and are assigned in hourly time slots. On the day of the exam, students will enter the assigned exam venue in different examination areas according to their designated time slot for examination."

src: 5月23日，区教育招生考试中心网上公示考查通过的学生名单，学生可在网上查询考查结果。
tgt: On May 23, the list of the students who have passed the examination will be publicized on the website of the Educational Admission Examination Center of the district, and students can inquire the result of the examination on the website.
hypo: On May 23rd, the list of students who passed the examination and were publicly announced online by the district education enrollment examination center, students can check their examination results online.

src: 波黑奥委会主席：坚信中国有能力在特殊时期办好冬奥盛会-新华网
tgt: President of Bosnia and Herzegovina Olympic Committee: It is firmly believed that China is capable of hosting a successful Winter Olympics during this special time - Xinhuanet
hypo: Bosnia and Herzegovina Olympic Committee President: firmly believes that China has the ability to host a successful Winter Olympics during a special period - Xinhua News Agency.

src: 新华社萨拉热窝12月11日电 波黑奥委会主席克韦西奇近日表示，波方十分期待北京冬奥会，坚信中国有能力在特殊时期办好冬奥盛会。
tgt: Message from Sarajevo of Xinhuanet on December 11, Kvesic, president of Bosnia and Herzegovina Olympic Committee, said recently that Bosnia was looking forward to the Beijing 2022 Winter Olympics and firmly believed that China is capable of hosting a successful Winter Olympics during this special time.
hypo: On December 11th, Xinhua News Agency reported from Sarajevo that the President of the Bosnian Olympic Committee, Kweysic, recently expressed that Bosnia was eagerly anticipating the Beijing Winter Olympics and firmly believed that China is capable of holding a successful Winter Olympic Games in this special period.

src: 日前中国驻波黑大使季平在萨拉热窝奥林匹克中心会见波黑奥委会主席克韦西奇。
tgt: Ji Ping, ambassador of China in Bosnia and Herzegovina, met with Kvesic, president of Bosnia and Herzegovina Olympic Committee, in Sarajevo Olympic Center a few days ago.
hypo: Recently, Chinese Ambassador to Bosnia and Herzegovina Ji Ping met with the President of the Olympic Committee of Bosnia and Herzegovina, Kevižić, at the Sarajevo Olympic Center.

src: 会见时，克韦西奇积极评价波中关系并表示，他曾于2008年北京夏奥会之际访华，对中方出色的组织工作印象极为深刻，坚信中国有能力在特殊时期办好冬奥盛会；波方十分期待北京冬奥会，波黑奥委会正在积极组织参会；波方希望以此为契机，同中方在体育领域开展更为广泛的交流合作。
tgt: During the meeting, Kvesic spoke positively about the relationship between Bosnia and Herzegovina and China; when he visited China during the Beijing 2008 Summer Olympics, the excellent organization work of the Chinese left him with a deep impression, and he firmly believed that China is capable of hosting a successful Winter Olympics during a special time; Bosnia was looking forward to Beijing Winter Olympics, and Bosnia and Herzegovina Olympic Committee was actively organizing representatives to attend the Olympics; Bosnia and Herzegovina wished to take it as an opportunity to develop wider exchanges and cooperation with China in the sports field.
hypo: During the meeting, Kovacevic positively commented on the relationship between China and Serbia and expressed that he had visited China during the 2008 Beijing Olympics and was deeply impressed by the excellent organization work of the Chinese side.
