hypo: "Xinhua News: Sino-Vietnamese "Peaceful Rescue-2021" Joint Medical Exercise Successfully Concluded."

src: 新华社河内12月12日电（周娜 滕怀金）12日上午，参加中越两军“和平救援-2021”卫勤联合演习的中方参演分队全部安全返回中国广西境内，标志着此次持续7天的演训任务顺利完成。
tgt: Message from Xinhua News Agency Hanoi on December 12 (journalists: Zhou Na and Teng Huaijin): in the morning of December 12, all the Chinese squads participating in the “Peaceful Rescue-2021” military health service joint exercise of armies of China and Vietnam returned to Guangxi, China, indicating the successful completion of exercise and training tasks which lasted 7 days.
hypo: On December 12th in Hanoi, Xinhua News Agency reported that in the morning of the 12th, the Chinese participating team in the "Peaceful Rescue-2021" joint medical exercise between China and Vietnam all safely returned to Guangxi, China, marking the successful completion of the 7-day training mission which lasted for 7 days.

src: 此次联演，中越两军围绕人道主义医学救援这一重大课题，紧扣卫勤救死扶伤使命任务，按照实战化标准完成了联合卫勤指挥、联合现场救援、批量伤员处置等课目内容，有效提升了两军卫勤保障能力。
tgt: In this joint exercise, the armies of China and Vietnam completed joint military health service command, joint field rescue, batched treatment of the wounded and other content according to practical combat standard on the major topic of humanitarian medical assistance and the mission of healing the wounded and rescuing the dying; it effectively improved the military health service support ability of the two armies.
hypo: The armies of China and Vietnam focused on the major topic of humanitarian medical rescue and adhered to the mission of providing medical care for the injured and saving the dying during this joint exercise. They completed the joint medical command, joint on-site rescue, and mass casualty treatment according to combat standards, effectively improving the medical support capability of both armies.

src: 演习成果得到中越两军的肯定。
tgt: The results of the exercise have won recognition from both armies of China and Vietnam.
hypo: The exercise results were affirmed by both the Chinese and Vietnamese militaries.

src: 越方演习指导委员会主任、越南人民军后勤总局副主任兼参谋长阮雄胜在演习结束仪式上说，通过此次演习，越南军医从中国军医身上学到了演习组织及专业活动方面的知识，也见识了中方的医疗、保障设备。
tgt: Ruan Xiongsheng, Director of the Exercise Guiding Committee of Vietnam and the Deputy Director and the Chief of Staff of the Administration of Logistics of People’s Army of Vietnam, said at the ending ceremony that military doctors of Vietnam learned knowledge about exercise organization and specialized activities from military doctors of China, and widened their knowledge of medical and logistics equipment of China.
hypo: "The Chief of the Exercise Guidance Committee of Vietnam and the Deputy Director of the Logistics Department and Chief of Staff of the People's Army of Vietnam, Nguyen Xiongsheng, said at the end of the exercise ceremony that through this exercise, Vietnamese military doctors learned knowledge about exercise organization and professional activities from Chinese military doctors, and also gained insight into China's medical and logistical equipment."

src: 演习取得的成果证明了两国军医力量在医疗援助、疫情防控方面的专业能力。
tgt: The achievements made from the exercise proved the specialized ability of military doctors of two countries on medical assistance and epidemic prevention and control.
hypo: The results obtained from the exercise demonstrate the professional ability of the two countries' military medics in medical assistance and epidemic prevention and control.

src: 中方指导协调组组长、中央军委后勤保障部卫生局副局长陈春明表示，此次演习是在2018年成功举办联合义诊活动的基础上又一次开拓创新实践，具有非常重要的里程碑意义。
tgt: According to Chen Chunming, leader of Guidance and Coordination Group of China and Deputy Director of Health Bureau of the Logistics Support Department of the Central Military Commission, the exercise is another pioneering practice based on the joint voluntary clinics event held in 2018, which has an essential milestone significance.
hypo: The head of the Chinese guidance and coordination team, Chen Chunming, who is also the deputy director of the Health Bureau of the Logistics Support Department of the Central Military Commission, stated that this exercise is another innovative practice based on the successful joint medical consultation held in 2018, and has significant milestone significance.

src: 演习期间，中国人民解放军向越南人民军捐赠了医用防护口罩、医用防护服、快速核酸检测仪器等卫生防疫物资。
tgt: During the exercise, Chinese People’s Liberation Army donated health and epidemic prevention materials such as medical masks, medical protective suits and quick nucleic acid detectors to People’s Army of Vietnam.
hypo: During the exercise, the People's Liberation Army of China donated health and epidemic prevention materials to the Vietnamese People's Army, including medical protective masks, protective clothing, and rapid nucleic acid testing equipment.

src: 先说结论，我个人认为《四海》是一部全方位的烂片，从各种意义上来说都是。
tgt: I will say my conclusion first; I think Only Fools Rush In is utterly a terrible film in any sense.
hypo: "First, let me state my conclusion. I personally think that 'Four Seas' is a completely terrible movie from any sense. Fools rush in, and in all aspects, it fails."

src: 但你要说这部电影是不是一个亮点也没有，那倒也不是至少配乐选的挺好。
tgt: But it is not without any highlight; at least the music is good.
hypo: But if you want to say that this movie doesn't have any highlights, that's not entirely true, at least the music selection is pretty good.

src: 烂片分很多种，让你能在电影院里酣然入睡的算一种，让你看完后义愤填膺的也算一种，《四海》对观众来说就像是峨眉山上的猴子，它能用无数种方式来点燃你的怒火。
tgt: There are many types of terrible films; some make you sleep soundly in the cinema, some make you angry after watching it; Only Fools Rush In is like monkeys on Mount Emei; it can ignite your anger in countless ways.
hypo: There are many types of bad movies, one that makes you fall asleep in the cinema is one type, and one that makes you indignant after watching is another. "The Four Seas" is like the monkeys on Mount Emei to the audience, it can ignite your anger in countless ways.

src: 在侮辱观众这点上，韩寒真的是天赋绝伦。
tgt: Han Han is super talented in insulting the audience.
hypo: "Regarding insulting the audience, Han Han is truly unparalleled in his natural talent."

src: 这部片子最让人感到痛苦的就是它仿佛是克系小说里的造物，难以名状，漏洞多的就像是小马哥身上的风衣。
tgt: The most painful part of the film is that it is hard to describe like a monster in Cthulhu novels, and has as many loopholes as the holes on the trench coat on Javier Mascherano.
hypo: The most painful thing about this film is that it seems like a monster in a Kafkaesque novel, indescribable and full of plot holes, as if it has a trench coat on like Little Ma.

src: 甚至看完后你会怀疑这里面是否有导演暗含的隐喻，但当你仔细思考之后发现它其实就是一坨屎。
tgt: After watching it, you may even wonder if there is metaphors the director planted in it; but you will find that it is only a piece of shit after close examination.
hypo: even doubt whether there are hidden metaphors that the director planted in it, but when you carefully think about it, you will find that it is actually a piece of crap.

src: 先简单的说下我很难理解的一些情节。
tgt: I’ll first briefly talk about some plots that are hard to understand.
hypo: First, I'll briefly talk about some plot points that are hard for me to understand.

src: 男主居住地应该是偏南方的某个小岛上，和他的奶奶相依为命。
tgt: The male leading role lives with his grandma on some island in the south.
hypo: The male protagonist's place of residence should be on a small island in the southern part, relying solely on his grandma.

src: 她奶奶有个愿望是想看下雪，然后剧情就安排邻里中的一个大爷开着小面包车送她去东北看雪。
tgt: His grandma has a wish, watching the snow, and the a old male neighbor drove a minibus to take her to watch the snow in the Northeast.
hypo: Her grandmother had a wish to see snow, so the plot arranged an old man from the neighborhood to drive her to the Northeast in a minibus to see the snow.

src: 高龄老人坐着面包车从南方到东北看雪？？
tgt: An elderly goes to watch the snow in the northeast from the south in a minibus? ?
hypo: Did the elderly person take a bread van from the south to the northeast to see the snow?

src: 他和他爹对此还非常放心。
tgt: He and his father were okay with it.
hypo: his father are very reassured about this.

src: 然后这位老人就没下文了。
tgt: And then there is no follow-up on this old lady.
hypo: And then this old person had nothing more to say.

src: 在废弃轮船上开酒店，女主他哥怎么拿到营业执照的？
tgt: Opening a hotel on an abandoned ship; how does the brother of the female leading role get the license?
hypo: How did the brother of the female lead obtain a business license to open a hotel on an abandoned ship?

src: 岛上飞车党小混混为什么能轻轻松松就把一段山路做到封路？？
tgt: How do the racing bike gang on the island easily block a mountain road? ?
hypo: Why can the island's racing gang easily block off a stretch of mountain road with their racing bikes?

src: 然后路中间送钢筋的卡车就停在路边，四周连卡车司机都找不到。
tgt: Then the truck delivering steel bars in the middle of the road just stopped at the roadside, and the truck driver was nowhere to be found.
hypo: Then the truck carrying steel bars just stopped in the middle of the road and even the truck driver could not be found around.

src: 这道具感也太明显了吧。
tgt: They are obviously props.
hypo: "They are obviously props."

src: 一个征信不行的且有违法嫌疑的小混混飞车党为什么会成为一名辅警？
tgt: Why could a little gangster biker with poor credit and who was suspected of breaking the law become an auxiliary policeman?
hypo: Why would a biker with poor credit and suspected of illegal activity become an auxiliary policeman?

src: 面对高利贷为啥不报警，电影里警察还特地问了是否有难处？
tgt: Why didn’t he call the police when there was usury involved, and the police specifically asked if there was any problem.
hypo: 't you report the usurious loan when the police asked if you were in trouble in the movie?

src: 一个成年人懂得用智能手机，却不知道在旅馆如何用房卡开门，然后强行安排找不到旅馆老板，坐在房间门外睡一宿？
tgt: An adult who knows how to use smart phone doesn’t know how to use the card to open the door at the hotel, and it was forcefully arranged for him not being able to find the owner of the hotel and so he slept outside the hotel for the night?
hypo: An adult who knows how to use a smartphone, but doesn't know how to use a room card to open the door at a hotel, forcefully arranged to sleep outside the room door for a night after being unable to find the hotel owner.

src: 这种莫名其妙的情节充斥在整个影片里，由于情节过于离谱以至于我回忆它们时都会令我感到痛苦。
tgt: Such ridiculous plots were everywhere in the film; the plots are so ridiculous that I feel painful when I remember them.
hypo: The inexplicable plots are prevalent throughout the entire film, to the extent that I feel pained when recalling them due to their absurdity.

src: 除了情节外，更糟糕的是电影的主旨，或者说这电影根本没有主旨，就是一个面目可憎的缝合怪。
tgt: In addition to the plots, the theme of the film is even more terrible, or you can say there is no theme in the film; it’s just a horrible monster that is stitched together.
hypo: Apart from the plot, what's even worse is the theme of the film, or rather, the fact that the film is not even having a theme, rather it is a repugnant stitched together monster.

src: 影片开头你会以为他想拍个喜剧片，20多分钟后你猜它也许是个励志片，看一半时你觉得它可能是个想体现小镇青年生存不易的剧情片，看完后你就压根也不知道自己究竟看了个啥，随之而来的是对自己深深的怀疑，大过年的为什么要跑到电影院去欣赏大便。
tgt: In the beginning of the film, you may think he wants to make a comedy; after twenty minutes, you may guess it’s an inspiration film; after a half of it, you may think it’s a drama showcasing the hardship of a small town boy; after you watch all of it, you don’t even know what you have watched; what follows is deep doubt in yourself; why would you go to the cinema to watch a piece of shit during the Spring Festival?
hypo: You may think he wants to make a comedy film at the beginning of the movie, after twenty-something minutes, you guess it may be an inspirational film, when you watch half of it, you feel it may be a drama that reflects the tough life of young people in small towns. After finishing it, you have no idea what you have just watched, followed by a deep self-doubt, why did you come to the cinema to watch crap during the New Year's holiday.

src: 对于大部分人来说其实也都非常熟悉各类电影的套路了，比如你要想拍摩托车手，那就励志＋喜剧然后告诉观众一个有天赋的菜鸟是如何一步步走向成功的。
tgt: Most people are familiar with the routines of various films; for example, if you want to make a film about a biker, then make it an inspiration + comedy to tell the audience how a talented rookie achieves success step by step.
hypo: For most people, they are actually very familiar with the various formulas of filmmaking, such as if you want to make a movie about a motorcycle rider, then it should be inspirational and comedic, while telling the audience how a talented rookie gradually succeeds.

src: 如果你想拍爱情片，那你就老老实实讲喜欢骑摩托的小镇青年和服务员妹子之间的恩怨纠葛。
tgt: If you want to make a love film, just tell the story about a small town boy who loves to ride motorcycle and a girl who works as a waitress.
hypo: If you want to make a love story, then you should honestly tell the story about the love and conflicts between a town boy who likes riding motorcycles and a waitress.

src: 如果你想反映现实，那最起码你的情节不能出现和正常世界相悖的东西。
tgt: If you want to reflect reality, then the plot should not have anything that is contradictory to the normal world.
hypo: "If you want to reflect reality, then at the very least your plot cannot contain anything that goes against the normal world."

src: （比如尹正演的那个新摩托刚被烧了，然后还能唱歌的角色），就不能去开一些连肯尼迪看了都遭不住的脑洞。
tgt: (Such as the character played by Yin Zheng who sang after his new motorcycle was just burned ) please don’t think about ideas that are ridiculous.
hypo: Zheng, who plays a character that can still sing even after his new motorcycle was burned, cannot go and create some mind-blowing ideas that not even Kennedy can handle.

src: 至于女主明明不是弱智可在某些方面表现的就像个5岁小孩，我真不知道这是演技的原因还是导演的要求。
tgt: As for why the female leading role acts like a five-year-old child when she is not retarded at all, I really don’t know if there is problem with her acting or it was demanded by the director.
hypo: As for the female lead, even though she is clearly not mentally challenged, in some aspects she behaves like a five-year-old child. I really don't know if this is due to her acting ability or if it's the director's request.

src: 还有一点我也挺想不明白，韩寒作为一个赛车手为什么这么热衷于在他自己的电影里添加撞车情节？
tgt: And one more thing I don’t understand is why Han Han as a racer is so keen on adding the plot of car crash in his films?
hypo: There's one thing I still don't quite understand, why is Han Han, as a racer, so keen on adding crash scenes in his own movies?

src: 这样的电影安排在春节档里，难道是为了给观众添堵吗？
tgt: Is such a film being arranged in the Spring Festival season to humiliate the audience?
hypo: Is a film being arranged in the Spring Festival season to deliberately cause trouble for the audience?

src: 感谢今天的支持者，80盒全部送出去了！
tgt: Thank you to all the supporters today; all 80 boxes have been given out!
hypo: Thank you to today's supporters, all 80 boxes have been given out!

src: 美容养颜汤的材料：
tgt: Ingredients of beauty soup:
hypo: Ingredients for Beauty and Nourishing Soup:

src: 白木耳的作用：味甘、性平，归肺、胃、肾经；有强精、补肾、润肠、益胃、补气、和血、强心、滋阴、润肺、生津、壮身、补脑、提神、美容、嫩肤、延年益寿之功效；用于治肺热咳嗽、肺燥干咳、妇女月经不调、胃炎、大便秘结等病症；对阴虚火旺不受参茸等温热滋补的病人是一种良好的补品
tgt: Functions of tremella: sweet in taste and neutral in nature, belong to channels of lung, stomach and kidney, have the effects of strengthening sperm, tonifying kidney, moistening intestine, nourishing stomach, tonifying vitality and blood, strengthening heart, nourishing yin, moistening lungs, promoting secretion, strengthening body, tonifying brain, refreshing beauty, tendering skin and prolonging life; it is used for treatment of diseases such as lung-heat type cough, dry-lung cough, menstrual irregularity of women, gastritis and constipation; it is a good tonic for patients with excessive heat and yin deficiency but are not suitable for warm tonic such as ginseng and velvet antler.
hypo: The function of White Fungus: sweet in taste, neutral in nature, enters the Lung, Stomach, and Kidney meridians; it has the efficacy of tonifying essence, nourishing the Kidney, moisturizing the intestines, promoting gastric health, tonifying Qi, nourishing blood, strengthening the heart, nourishing Yin, moisturizing the lungs, generating fluids, strengthening the body, nourishing the brain, refreshing the mind, enhancing beauty, making the skin tender, and prolonging life; it is used to treat conditions such as lung heat cough, dry cough due to lung dryness, irregular menstruation in women, gastritis, and constipation; for patients with Yin deficiency and excessive internal heat who cannot take warm-tonifying herbs such as Ginseng, it is a good supplement.

src: 桃胶的作用：味苦，性平，归大肠，膀胱经。
tgt: Functions of peach glue: bitter in taste, mild in nature, belong to the large intestine and bladder channels.
hypo: Tremella: Bitter in taste, neutral in nature, belongs to the large intestine and bladder meridians.   Functions of Tremella:

src: 功效：和血，通淋，止痢，止痛，也可以补水，润肠，如果有便秘的人，可以多吃桃胶。
tgt: Effects: tonify blood, dredge lymph, stop dysentery and pain, replenish water, moisten intestines; people with constipation can eat more peach glue.
hypo: Effect: Harmonizes blood, promotes urination, stops diarrhea, relieves pain. It can also moisturize the intestines. For people with constipation, eat more peach gum.

src: 枸杞子的作用：性平，味甘，归肝，胃经。
tgt: Effect of fruits of Chinese wolfberries: neutral in nature and sweet in taste, belonging to the channels of liver and stomach.
hypo: The function of wolfberries: neutral in nature, sweet in taste, belong to the liver and stomach meridians.

src: 益肝明目，滋补肝肾，美白养颜，补虚生津，延缓衰老。
tgt: Nourish the liver and the eyes, tonify the liver and the kidney, whiten and nourish the skin, nourish deficiency, produce secretion and delay aging.
hypo: Nourish the liver and improve vision, nourish the liver and kidneys, whiten and nourish the skin, replenish deficiency and generate body fluids, delay aging.

src: 红枣的作用：味甘，性平，归脾，胃经，有补脾和胃，益气生津养血安神，如果脾胃虚弱，气血不足失眠者可以多服用红枣。
tgt: Functions of red dates: sweet in taste, calm in nature, return to the spleen, go through stomach channel, tonify the spleen and stomach, replenish qi, generate fluid, nourish blood and calm nerves; people whose spleen and stomach are weak, whose Qi and blood are insufficient, and who suffer from insomnia can eat more red dates.
hypo: The function of red dates: sweet in taste, neutral in nature, attributed to the spleen and stomach meridians, can nourish the spleen and stomach, benefit qi, generate fluids, nourish blood, and calm the mind. If one suffers from spleen and stomach deficiency, qi and blood deficiency, and insomnia, they can take more red dates.

src: 龙眼肉的作用：味甘性温，归心,脾经，适用于心脾两虚者。
tgt: Functions of arillus gongan: sweet in taste, warm in nature, return to the heart, spleen channel, suitable for those with deficiency of both heart and spleen.
hypo: The function of longan meat: sweet taste, warm nature, belongs to the heart and spleen meridian, suitable for those with both heart and spleen deficiency.

src: 龙眼肉还能润肤美容，养血安神,,补益心脾，壮阳益气，贫血的人也适合服用，失眠者也适合。
tgt: Arillus gongan can also moisturize and beautify the skin, nourish blood and calm the nerves, tonify the heart and spleen, invigorate Yang and Qi, and is also suitable for people with anemia and insomnia.
hypo: Longan meat can also moisturize and beautify the skin, nourish blood, calm the mind, nourish the heart and spleen, invigorate the yang and energy. It is also suitable for people with anemia and insomnia.

src: 莲子的作用：味甘涩，性平，归心，脾，肾经。
tgt: Functions of lotus seeds: sweet and astringent in taste, flat in nature, return to heart, spleen and kidney channels.
hypo: , neutral, nourish heart, spleen, kidney meridians.  The function of lotus seeds: sweet and astringent in flavor, neutral in nature, nourish the heart, spleen, and kidney meridians.

src: 养心安神，心悸失眠，胃虚，健忘，心烦口渴，滋养补虚，止遗涩精。
tgt: Nourish the heart and calm the nerves, treat palpitations, insomnia, stomach deficiency, forgetfulness, vexation and thirstiness, nourish and replenish deficiency, and prevent spermatorrhea and premature ejaculation.
hypo: Nourish the mind and calm the spirit, alleviate palpitations, insomnia, weak stomach, forgetfulness, irritability, and thirst. Nourish the body to address deficiencies and stop spermatorrhea.

src: 因此，这个养颜美容汤不仅是一道甜品，而且还可以养生！
tgt: Therefore, this beauty soup is not only a dessert, but also helps you stay healthy!
hypo: "Therefore, this beauty and skin care soup is not only a dessert, but it can also promote health!"

src: 多吃，能使您心神安康！
tgt: Eating more can make you healthy both physically and mentally!
hypo: Eating more can bring you peace of mind and well-being!

src: 而且又不会像燕窝那么贵，多吃不会使你口袋破大洞！
tgt: Plus, it won't be as expensive as bird’s nest, so eating a lot will not make you spend a lot!
hypo: Plus, it's not as expensive as bird's nest, and eating more won't make your wallet break!

src: 想尝试一下网球，但又怕自己坚持不下去，所以想先找个差不多的价格练手 。
tgt: I wanted to try tennis, but I was afraid I couldn’t stick with it, so I thought I would just find one at a suitable price to practice with.
hypo: I want to try playing tennis, but I am afraid I will not be able to stick with it, so I want to first find a similar priced option to practice with.

src: 不友好，事实上，价格往往与友好程度成正比，如果不能分辨，那么贵的正常情况会比便宜的拍子友好，这类“入门拍”其实是工业垃圾。
tgt: It was not friendly; in fact, the price is usually in proportional to the degree of friendliness; if you are not able to distinguish, then expensive ones usually are more friendly than cheaper ones, and the so called “entry-level” rackets are in fact industrial garbage.
hypo: Not friendly, in fact, prices often correlate with friendliness, if you can't tell the difference, then expensive ones are usually more friendly than cheap ones, these "entry-level products" are actually industrial waste.

src: 它们强度很低，球打到拍子上面，振动非常大，硬球顶不住，高手都很难驾驭。
tgt: They are low in strength, and there will be too much vibration when the ball hits on it; it cannot withstand hard balls, and even professional cannot handle it.
hypo: Its strength is very low, the ball hitting the racket surface causes very strong vibrations, and the hard ball cannot be handled, even experienced players have difficulty handling it.

src: 它们存在的逻辑和潜台词是———网球这么难，知道你们学不会，也知道你们不舍得买贵的，搞个便宜货糊弄你们，你们玩儿两次，就不会再打了，这样这个拍子便宜，你也不心疼。
tgt: The logic and subtext of their existence is that tennis is so difficult, we know you can’t learn to play it, and we know you're not willing to buy expensive ones, so we make a cheap one to fool you; you won't play it again after using it once or twice; since the racket is cheap, you don't feel it's a waste.
hypo: Their existence and underlying message is - tennis is so difficult, we know you can't learn it, and we also know you don't want to buy expensive equipment, so we'll just trick you with this cheap racket. You'll play with it twice and then never again, so this way the racket is cheap and you won't feel bad about it.

src: 等你真的能分辨好坏，说明你进步了，到时候再来我这里买贵的，我赚两次钱。
tgt: If you can tell the difference, it means you have made improvement; then you can come here to buy the expensive ones and I will make money twice.
hypo: can truly distinguish between good and bad, it means you have improved. Come here and buy expensive items from me then, so I can make money twice.

src: 建议花相似的价钱，买个二手好一点的球拍，选择prince、或者邓禄普的，这两个品牌足够没名气，所以好球拍也卖不上价钱，新拍500、600就很好了，二手的200块，拥有千元拍的享受不香吗？
tgt: I recommend you to spend the same amount of money on a better-quality second hand racket such as prince or DUNLOP; these two brands are not famous, and so even if they are good, they are not expensive; you can get a new one with 500 or 600 yuan and a second hand one with 200 yuan; isn’t it nice to have a thousand yuan racket with only so little money?
hypo: brands, Prince, Dunlop, enjoy the experience of owning a thousand yuan racket.  It is suggested to spend a similar amount of money and buy a second-hand, better quality racket. Choose from these two brands: Prince or Dunlop. These two brands are not very well known, so good rackets are not expensive. A new racket for 500 or 600 yuan is good enough. A second-hand racket for 200 yuan, isn't it delightful to enjoy the experience of owning a thousand yuan racket?

src: 对新手挺友好，但一过了新手阶段就鸡肋了，但大部分人，特别是女生，过不了新手阶段。
tgt: It’s friendly to newbies, but once you passed that stage, it will become not so useful; but most people, especially girls, cannot pass the newbie stage.
hypo: "Very friendly towards beginners, but becomes mediocre after the beginner stage. However, most people, especially girls, cannot get past the beginner stage."

src: 第十八届“世界饮料创新奖”（World Beverage Innovation Awards）是FoodBev Media与德国纽伦堡国际啤酒、酿酒及饮料工业展览会（Brau Beviale）联合举办的奖项。
tgt: The 18th “World Beverage Innovation Awards” is an award jointly held by FoodBev Media and Brau Beviale.
hypo: The 18th World Beverage Innovation Awards is a prize jointly sponsored by FoodBev Media and Brau Beviale, the international beer, brewing, and beverage industry exhibition held in Nuremberg, Germany.

src: 吸引了来自25个国家、22个不同品类的279个作品参赛。
tgt: It attracted 279 works from 25 countries and 22 categories to participate in the competition.
hypo: It attracted 279 entries from 25 countries and 22 different categories to the competition.

src: 10月15日，决赛入围者名单公布，最终获奖者名单将于11月11日（英国夏令时）线上公布。
tgt: On October 15th, the list of the finalists was published, and the final list of winners will be published online on November 11 (BST).
hypo: On October 15th, the list of finalists was published, and the final list of winners will be announced online on November 11th (British Summer Time).

src: 我们看到，元气森林的LP28无糖酸奶入围最佳乳饮料奖，伊利安慕希的“GOGO武汉”营销入围最佳营销活动，百事可乐和人民日报新媒体合作的包装还入围最佳包装设计/标签奖。
tgt: We have seen that Genki Forest’s LP28 sugar-free yoghurt was shortlisted for the Award of Best Milk Drink; the marketing of “GOGO Wuhan” of Yili AMBROSIAL was shortlisted for the Award of Best Marketing Activity; the packaging jointly designed by Pepsi and the new media of People’s Daily was shortlisted for the Award of Best Packaging Design/Label.
hypo: "We have seen that LP28 Sugar-free Yogurt from Yuánqì Forest has been nominated for the Best Dairy Beverage Award, while the "GOGO Wuhan" marketing campaign from Yili Anmuxi has been nominated for Best Marketing Campaign. Additionally, the packaging designed in collaboration between Pepsi-Cola and People's Daily New Media has been nominated for the Best Packaging Design/Label Award."

src: FoodBev Media高级市场营销总监Laura Nettle表示：我们很高兴与Brau Beviale一起庆祝年度世界饮料创新奖的第18年。
tgt: Laura Nettle, senior marketing director of Foodbev Media, said, “we are pleased to celebrate the 18th year of the annual world beverage innovation award with Brau beviale”.
hypo: Laura Nettle, Senior Marketing Director of FoodBev Media, stated: "We are thrilled to celebrate the 18th annual World Beverage Innovation Awards with Brau Beviale."

src: 从新口味、新概念和新功能到品牌、包装和制造，随着行业不断以更可持续的方式进行创新，我们看到了饮料行业的趋势。
tgt: From new tastes, new concepts, new functions to brands, packaging and manufacturing, as the industry continues to innovate in a more sustainable way, we have seen the trends of the beverage industry.
hypo: From new flavors, new concepts, and new functions to branding, packaging, and manufacturing, as the industry continues to innovate in more sustainable ways, we see the trends in the beverage industry.

src: 世界饮料创新奖表彰了全球饮料行业新老品牌今年最具雄心的新产品和新发展。
tgt: The world beverage innovation award recognizes the most ambitious new products and developments of new and old brands in the global beverage industry this year.
hypo: The World Beverage Innovation Awards commended the new and established brands in the global beverage industry for their most ambitious new products and developments this year.

src: 以下是每个类别的决赛入围者的完整榜单。
tgt: Here is the complete list of all the finalists of each category.
hypo: "Below is the complete list of finalists for each category."

src: Ardagh Group开发的技术，可以将100％的回收玻璃重新熔化成新的瓶子。
tgt: Technology developed by Ardagh Group can melt 100% of recycled glass into new bottles.
hypo: The technology developed by Ardagh Group can melt 100% of recycled glass into new bottles.

src: 箱中袋装水，其包装盒采用100％可回收利用，可减少包装66％，减少碳排放97％。
tgt: The packaging of the bagged water in the box is 100% recyclable, which can reduce packaging by 66% and carbon emission by 97%.
hypo: The water in bag packaging in the box uses 100% recyclable packaging, which reduces packaging by 66% and carbon emissions by 97%.

src: LatCub是100％可生物降解，使用更少的纸，并且不使用对环境有害的胶水或胶带。
tgt: Latcub is 100% biodegradable; it uses less paper, and does not use glue or tape that is harmful to the environment.
hypo: LatCub is 100% biodegradable, uses less paper, and is not harmful to the environment with glue or tape.

src: Ardagh Group开发的技术，可以将100％的回收玻璃重新熔化制成新的瓶子。
tgt: Technology developed by Ardagh Group can melt 100% of recycled glass and make them into new bottles.
hypo: The technology developed by Ardagh Group can melt 100% of recycled glass and make them into new bottles.

src: 最终获奖名单将于11月11日（英国夏令时）在FoodBev Media的 YouTube频道公布，FBIF将持续为您报道，敬请期待！
tgt: The final list of the winners will be published on the YouTube channel of FoodBev Media on November 11 (BTS), and FBIF will continue to report for you, so stay tuned!
hypo: The final list of award winners will be announced on November 11 (British Summer Time) on FoodBev Media's YouTube channel. FBIF will continue to report for you. Stay tuned!

src: 2021年什么最火？
tgt: What is the hottest thing in 2021?
hypo: What is the hottest trend in 2021?

src: 无疑是东京奥运会。
tgt: It was none other than the Tokyo Olympics.
hypo: It is undoubtedly the Tokyo Olympics.

src: 您以为只有奥运健儿才能拿奖吗？
tgt: Do you think only Olympic athletes can win awards?
hypo: Do you think only Olympic athletes can win awards?

src: 前段时间有篇《快看！项目经理可冲击金牌的奥运项目》文章很火，里面提到项目经理们在很多项目上，绝对是可以一马当先，无人能匹： 搬砖、出差、熬夜是项目经理的日常，救火、背锅、道歉更是不在话下。
tgt: Recently, there is an article titled Look! An article titled Olympic Disciplines in Which Project Managers Can Win Gold Medals was viral, and it mentioned that project managers can be the foremost and unmatched in many disciplines, such as working arduously, going on business trips, and staying up late, the everyday work of project manager, and handling emergency, taking the blame and apologizing are nothing difficult at all.
hypo: Recently, there was a very popular article titled "Look! Project managers can aim for gold in the Olympic events," which mentioned that project managers are definitely ahead of everyone else in many projects: doing the work of, in many aspects of project management, such as working long hours, going on business trips, and pulling all nighters is part of their daily routine, and putting out fires, taking the blame, and apologizing are just par for the course.

src: 看似玩笑调侃的一篇文章，却也道出了项目经理们的日常辛酸，背后代表的是对当前项目管理工作的力不从心。
tgt: A seemingly joking article also tells the bitterness of their daily work, and the hidden message is their insufficient energy to handle the current project management work.
hypo: A seemingly joking and bantering article actually reveals the daily hardships of project managers, representing their insufficient ability to handle current project management work.

src: 而从事项目管理工作的人员，也渐渐选择通过一些行动来让自己摆脱工作中的困境。
tgt: People engaged in project management also gradually choose to get rid of the predicament in work by taking certain actions.
hypo: Personnel engaged in project management work also gradually choose to take some actions to free themselves from the difficulties at work.

src: 从每年攀升的PMP（国际认证的项目管理专业人士资格）报名人数来看，越来越多的项目管理从业人员通过学习来提升自己的项目管理能力。
tgt: Judging from the increasing number of PMP (internationally certified project management professional qualification) applicants each year, increasing project management practitioners improve their project management ability through learning.
hypo: From the increasing number of registrations for the PMP (an international certification for project management professionals) every year, it can be seen that more and more project management practitioners are improving their project management abilities through learning.

src: 据《中国项目管理二十年发展报告(1999-2019)》称：截止到2019年9月，全国累计PMP®报考人数近60万人次，通过PMP®认证人数约42万人，有效持证人数约30万人, 占全球PMP®持证总量的31.2%。
tgt: According to the 20-year Development Report on China’s Project Management (1999-2019), as of September 2019, the national PMP ® applicants totals 600,000, with 420,000 passed the PMP ® certification, and the number of valid certificate holders are about 300,000, accounting for 31.2% of the total number of certificates of PMP ® in the world.
hypo: According to the "National PMP Development Report of the Past 20 Years in China (1999-2019)", as of September 2019, the cumulative number of national PMP® exam takers was close to 600,000. Approximately 420,000 people passed the PMP® certification exam, and around 300,000 people hold valid PMP® credentials, representing 31.2% of the total global PMP® certification holders.

src: 近10年PMP持证人数逐年递增，这说明越来越多的项目管理者意识到：靠简单照搬以往“老经验”来做事已不可取，瞬息万变的工作环境让我们知道一个要学会，站在科学巨人的肩膀上去探索前行的道路。
tgt: In the past ten years, the number of people holding PMP certificates keeps increasing, which indicates that more and more project managers realize it is no longer advisable to do things by simply copying “past experience”; the rapidly changing working environment tells us that we should learn to stand on the shoulders of scientific giants and explore the way forward.
hypo: In the past decade, the number of people holding PMP certificates has increased year by year, indicating that an increasing number of project managers have realized that relying on simply copying the "old experience" of the past is not feasible. The rapidly changing work environment has taught us that one must learn to explore the way forward by standing on the shoulders of scientific giants.

src: 然而，考了PMP就能保证项目管理工作畅通无阻了吗？
tgt: However, can you ensure the smooth proceeding of project management work after passing the PMP test?
hypo: However, does taking the PMP ensure smooth and unobstructed work in project management?

src: 很多项目管理初学者表示，通过学习PMP/IPMP等相关课程，可以系统性地掌握项目管理的十大领域和五大过程组等相关知识点，但真正进行项目管理工作的时候却还是一头雾水。
tgt: Many beginners of project management say that by learning courses of PMP/IPMP, they can systematically master knowledge points such as the ten fields and five major process groups of project management, but they are still confused when they are actually engaged in project management work.
hypo: Many novice project managers express that by studying related courses like PMP/IPMP, they can systematically master the ten fields and five process groups of project management, but when actually performing project management work, they still find themselves at a loss.

src: 很多项目经理常常反馈以下问题： 项目管理认知不到位，单纯依靠个人经验，空有项目管理理论，不知如何实践； 缺乏系统的项目管理流程制度支撑，工作中无法落地，项目预估不准，把控度灵敏度差，项目一拖再拖； 成员分工不明确、团队中的“老油条”不知如何应对 跨部门协助沟通不顺畅，项目难以推进 ……
tgt: Many project managers often reflect the following problems: project management awareness is not sufficient, relying solely on personal experience, and there is only project management theories and no ideas about how to practice them; lack of support of systematic project management process and system, unable to actually implement the work, inaccurate project estimation, poor sensitivity of control, and project being delayed again and again; the members’ division of labor is not clear, there’s no way to handle the “sophisticated ones” in the team, communication is not smooth between departments, and it is difficult to push the project forward...
hypo: Many project managers often give feedback on the following issues: inadequate understanding of project management, relying solely on personal experience, having theoretical knowledge but not knowing how to put it into practice; lacking support from a systematic project management process and system, unable to execute effectively, inaccurate project estimation, poor control and sensitivity, resulting in project delays; unclear division of labor among team members, uncertainty on how to deal with experienced team members, difficult cross-departmental communication, hindering project progress...

src: 因此，专注产品创新与研发管理领域十余载，已帮助众多优秀的企业培养了大批的产品经理、项目经理等研发关键人才，并获得了 “中国企业研发管理人才培训示范基地”等荣誉称号的中天华夏咨询带着《研发项目经理特训营》线上课程来了。
tgt: Therefore, ZTCHINA, which has been focusing on the field of product innovation and R&D of management for more than ten years and helped many excellent enterprises cultivate a large number of key R&D talents such as product managers and project managers, and won the honorary title of “China Enterprise R&D and Management Talents Training Demonstration Base”, presents the online course R&D Project Manager Special Training Camp.
hypo: Therefore, with more than ten years of focus on product innovation and research and development management, Zhongtian Huaxia Consulting has helped many excellent enterprises cultivate a large number of key talents in research and development management such as product managers and project managers, and has won honors such as "China Enterprise R&D Management Talent Training Demonstration Base". Now, Zhongtian Huaxia Consulting has launched the online course "R&D Project Manager Training Camp".

src: 《研发项目经理特训营》线上课程 这是一种线上碎片化学习的方式，结合了众多研发型企业的实战案例、工具和方法，帮助您掌握项目经理必备知识及标准动作，走上自身项目管理的进阶之路。
tgt: The online course R&D Project Manager Special Training Camp is an online fragmented learning method, which combines the practical cases, tools and methods of many research and development type enterprises to help you master the necessary knowledge and standard actions of project managers, and embark on the advancing journey of project management on your own.
hypo: "The online course 'Special Training Camp for R&D Project Managers' is a form of fragmented online learning which combines the practical cases, tools, and methods of many R&D-type enterprises, helping you to master the necessary knowledge and standard actions of project management and embark on the path of advanced project management."

src: 这也是一次让企业用更低的成本和更少的投入，促进项目经理的培养进程，为企业带来高效运作结果的机会。
tgt: This is also an opportunity for enterprises to promote the training process of project managers and bring efficient operation results to enterprises with less cost and investment.
hypo: This is also an opportunity for enterprises with lower costs and less investment to promote the development process of project managers, and bring efficient operating results for enterprises.

src: 口说无凭，可以先看看其他学员怎么评价这门课程： 这门课程不仅是由中天华夏专家团队（原华为研发管理团队），结合国际先进的项目管理方法论和众多知名企业真实业务场景，对课程内容进行深入浅出的专业讲解。
tgt: That’s all my own introduction, and you may see how other students evaluate this course: This course is not only a professional explanation of the course content in simple terms by the ZTCHINA expert team (former Huawei R&D management team), combining international advanced project management methodology and real business scenarios of many well-known enterprises.
hypo: "Words alone are not enough, but we can first take a look at how other students evaluate this course: This course is not only taught by the Zhongtian Huaxia expert team (formerly the Huawei R&D management team), but also combines international advanced project management methodology and numerous well-known enterprises' real business scenarios for in-depth and easy-to-understand professional explanations of course content."

src: 更是会提供科学实用的管理工具与方法，丰富的模板表单，帮助学员在课后将学习的内容转化运用于具体工作。
tgt: It also provides scientific and practical management tools and methods as well as rich template forms to help students transform and apply the content into specific work after class.
hypo: methods, practical management tool, templates and forms.   It will provide even more practical management tools and methods, abundant template forms to help students transform and apply the learned content into specific work.

src: 号称新山区超跑排气声最大！
tgt: It is said to have the biggest exhaust noises of all supercars in Xinshan District!
hypo: They claim that the exhaust sound of supercars in the District of New Mountain is the loudest!

src: 这次我们团队为大家带来的这款车，是许多男人的梦想！
tgt: The car that our team brings you now is the dream of many men!
hypo: "This car that our team brings you this time is the dream of many men!"

src: 它就是Lamborghini的旗舰超跑，Murcielago的换代车型 — Aventador LP700-4！
tgt: It is Lamborghini’s flagship supercar and Murcielago’s next generation model, Aventador LP700-4!
hypo: "It is the successor model of Lamborghini's flagship supercar Murcielago - the Aventador LP700-4!"

src: 要价马币近两百万，一年的路税马币十几千，四轮驱动，为什么叫LP700？
tgt: It is priced nearly 2 million MYR and pays a road tax of around a dozen thousand each year; it is a four-wheel drive; why is it called LP700?
hypo: The asking price is nearly 2 million Malaysian Ringgit, with an annual road tax of tens of thousands of Malaysian Ringgit, four-wheel drive, why is it called LP700?

src: 因为拥有700匹的马力，你能想象有多快吗？
tgt: Because it has 700 horsepower; can you image how fast that is?
hypo: Because it has 700 horsepower, can you imagine how fast it is?

src: 那算了小编也不知道，数据说0-100km/h加速只需要2.9秒，大概就是小编的myvi才要到30km/h的时候人家就到100km/h了，嗯。
tgt: Forget it, I don’t know, either; data says it takes only 2.9s to accelerate from 0 to 100km/h; when my myvi just reaches 30km/h, it is already at 100km/h, hum.
hypo: "I don't know," says the writer, "but the data says the 0-100km/h acceleration only takes 2.9 seconds. Forget about my Myvi, it probably only reaches 30km/h when the other car reaches 100km/h. Hmm."

src: 低矮的车身、嚣张的剪刀门、遍布车身四周的巨大进气口以及玻璃下一览无余的6.5 v12引擎，完美的诠释了兰博基尼的风格。

src: 2021年，一款名为《Axie Infinity》的区块链游戏在东南亚地区产生了巨大影响，一些因疫情失去了工作机会的居民开始在这款游戏中获得稳定收入。
tgt: In 2021, a blockchain game called Axie Infinity has exerted a huge impact in Southeast Asia, and some residents who lost their jobs due to the epidemic began to earn stable income in this game.
hypo: In 2021, a blockchain game called "Axie Infinity" had a huge impact in Southeast Asia, with some residents who lost job opportunities due to the pandemic starting to earn stable income from this game.

src: 《Axie Infinity》是一款以区块链技术为底层的宠物养成游戏，集合了NFT在内的多种玩法，是目前交易额最高的NFT项目，截止目前已超过30亿美元。
tgt: Axie Infinity is a pet grooming game based on blockchain technology, which integrates a variety of playing methods including NFT, and it is the NFT project with the highest trading volume now, exceeding US $3 billion so far.
hypo: "Axie Infinity" is a pet-raising game built on blockchain technology, featuring a variety of gameplay including NFTs. It is currently the NFT project with the highest transaction volume and has surpassed $3 billion USD to date.

src: TokenTerminal 数据显示，Axie Infinity 日收入超过 820 万美元，直逼《王者荣耀》。

hypo: TokenTerminal data shows that the income of Axie Infinity exceeds 8.2 million US dollars per day, approaching that of "King of Glory".

src: 《Axie Infinity》的火热将一种新的“palytoearn”模式传递给更多人，通过区块链与智能合约的帮助，玩家不再是单一的角色，除了能从游戏里获得乐趣及经济收益以外，还可以参与到游戏生态的治理之中。
tgt: The hotness of Axie Infinity has sent the new “palytoearn” pattern to more people; with the help of blockchain and intelligent contract, players are no longer a single character, and in addition to gaining pleasure and economic revenue from the game, they can also participate in the governance of game ecosystem.
hypo: The popularity of 《Axie Infinity》will bring a new "play-to-earn" model to more people. With the help of blockchain and smart contracts, players are no longer just single characters. In addition to gaining enjoyment and economic benefits from the game, they can also participate in the governance of the game ecosystem.

src: 这种主体性并不由游戏制作方授予，而是由区块链技术保证。
tgt: The subjectivity is not granted by the game producer, but guaranteed by blockchain technology.
hypo: This subjectivity is not granted by the game makers, but guaranteed by blockchain technology.

src: 看到一则关于朋友股价的新闻，我最大的感触是企业在赛道的选择，也就是指投资标的行业的选择，首先要选择成长空间大的行业，至少1000亿以上的市场规模；其次，要选择未来增长性好的行业，考虑在未来3-5年后行业增长性达到最佳状态的行业；最后，要选择有政策扶持的行业。
tgt: I read a piece of news about one of my friends’ stock price, and my biggest feeling is the how the enterprise chooses its track, that is, the choice of the investment target industry; first of all, they should choose a industry with a large space for development and a market size of at least 100 billion; secondly, we should choose industries with good growth in the future and consider the industries with the best growth in the next 3-5 years; finally, choose industries with policy support.
hypo: After reading a news report about a friend's stock prices, my biggest takeaway is that when it comes to choosing targets for investment, companies need to first choose industries with large growth potential, with a market size of at least 1 trillion. Secondly, they should choose industries with good future growth potential, with projected growth reaching its best state within the next 3-5 years. Lastly, they should choose industries with government support.

src: 赛道有多宽指的是市场规模，赛道有多长指的是行业所处发展阶段，赛道是平坦还是崎岖指的是行业的竞争格局。
tgt: The width of the track refers to the scale of market, the length of the track refers to the development stage of the industry, and whether the track is easy or bumpy refers to the competitiveness landscape of the industry.
hypo: The width of the track refers to the market size, the length of the track refers to the industry's development stage, and whether the track is flat or bumpy refers to the industry's competitive landscape.

src: 为对的赛道加油！
tgt: Cheer for the right track!
hypo: Cheer for the right track!

src: 新的一年，第一件事是总结2021 调整2022战术布局。
tgt: In the new year, the first task is to summarize 2021 and adjust the tactical layout of 2022.
hypo: "The first thing in the new year is to summarize 2021 and adjust the 2022 tactical layout."

src: 战术在于“do the things right”，也就是把事做对。
tgt: The key of the tactics is “do the things right”.
hypo: Tactics lie in "doing the things right", which means doing things correctly.

src: 而战略在于“do the right thing”,也就是做正确的事。
tgt: The key of the strategy is “do the right thing”.
hypo: "And the strategy is to 'do the right thing', which means to do the correct thing."

src: 战略在于找方向，战术在于落地，在大多数战术思考之上，都有战略思考的空间。
tgt: Strategy lies in finding direction and tactics lies in implementation; above most tactical thinking, there is room for strategic thinking.
hypo: Strategy lies in finding direction, tactics lies in implementation. Above the majority of tactical thinking, there is room for strategic thinking.

src: 比如如何增加顾客数（战术思维）之上，可以思考是在当前领域持续深化还是横向领域延展（战略思维）；比如提升顾客留存率（战术思维）之上，可以思考如何提升核心顾客和高价值顾客的留存率（战略思维）；在提升活动参与度（战术思维）之上，可以考虑如何设置正确的活动KPI，达到正确的活动目标，比如提升目标顾客参与度、激活高价值沉默客、精准拉新；在提升DAU（战术思维）之上，可以考虑目前的增长是否健康可持续。
tgt: For example, on top of how to increase the number of customers (tactical thinking), we can think about whether to continuously deepen the current field or expand the horizontal field (strategic thinking); for example, on top of improving customer retention rate (tactical thinking), we can think about how to improve the retention of core customers and high-value customers (strategic thinking); on top of improving activity participation (tactical thinking), we can consider how to set the correct activity KPIs to achieve the correct activity goals, such as improving the participation of target customers, activating high-value silent customers, and accurately attracting new customers; on top of improving DAU (tactical thinking), we can consider whether the current growth is healthy and sustainable.
hypo: For example, in terms of increasing the number of customers (tactical thinking), one can consider whether to continue deepening in the current field or extend horizontally into other fields (strategic thinking). For example, in terms of improving customer retention (tactical thinking), one can think about how to improve the retention of core customers and high-value customers (strategic thinking). In terms of increasing participation in activities (tactical thinking), one can consider how to set the correct activity KPIs to achieve the correct activity goals, such as increasing target customer participation, activating high-value silent customers, and precise customer acquisition. In terms of increasing DAU (tactical thinking), one can consider whether the current growth is healthy and sustainable, as well as improving retention of silent customers.

src: 诞生12年，比特币在2021年迎来了几个里程碑事件。
tgt: After coming into being 12 years ago, bitcoins ushered in several milestone events in 2021.
hypo: Born 12 years ago, Bitcoin has reached several milestone events in 2021.

src: 9月7日，中美洲小国萨尔瓦多将比特币定为法定货币，这是比特币第一次成为一个国家或地区的法定货币。
tgt: On September 7, the small country, El Salvador, in Central America designated bitcoins as a legal tender, and this is the first time that bitcoin has become the legal tender of a country or region.
hypo: On September 7th, the small Central American country of El Salvador declared Bitcoin as legal tender, making it the first time that Bitcoin has become a legal tender in a country or region.

src: 10月12日，美国证监会八年来首次批准ProShares公司推出比特币ETF，并在纽约证券交易所上市，这标志着第一支合规的比特币期货ETF登陆美国资本市场，加密货币投资敞口的再次扩大。
tgt: On October 12, the Securities and Exchange Commission of the United States approved the launch of bitcoin ETF by ProShares company for the first time in eight years and listed it on the New York Stock Exchange, marking the landing of the first compliant bitcoin futures ETF in the US capital market and the expansion of cryptocurrency investment exposure.
hypo: On October 12th, the US Securities and Exchange Commission approved ProShares to launch a bitcoin ETF, the first compliant bitcoin futures ETF to list on the New York Stock Exchange, marking the further expansion of cryptocurrency investment exposure.

src: 从区块链技术发展角度来说，比特币并不是主角。
tgt: From the perspective of blockchain technology, bitcoin is not the leading role.
hypo: From the perspective of the development of blockchain technology, Bitcoin is not the main character.

src: 2021年11月14日比特币进行了一次名为“Taproot”的软分叉升级，该升级提高了比特币网络交易的匿名性，且通过改变区块本身的数据结构来减少交易中的数据负担。
tgt: On November 14, 2021, bitcoin carried out a soft bifurcation upgrade called Taproot, which improved the anonymity of bitcoin network transactions and reduced the data burden in transactions by changing the data structure of the block itself.
hypo: On November 14, 2021, Bitcoin underwent a software fork upgrade called "Taproot," which improved the anonymity of network transactions in the Bitcoin network and reduced the data burden of transactions by changing the data structure of the blocks themselves.

src: 一级造价初始注册，继续教育学时问题你遇到了吗?
tgt: In the initial registration of Class 1 cost, have you encountered problems in terms of the class hours of further education?
hypo: Have you encountered any problems in the initial registration of level-one cost engineering and continuing education credits?

src: 逾期注册人员未提供继续教育学习证明 逾期注册应提供近一年不少于30学时的继续教育证明 重新注册应提供近4年不少于120学时的继续教育证明 重新注册应提供每满1个年度不少于30学时继续教育学习证明
tgt: Overdue registrants failing to provide certificates of further education; in overdue registration, the certificate of further education of no less than 30 class hours in the past year shall be provided; for re-registration, the certificate of further education of no less than 120 class hours in the last four years shall be provided; for re-registration, the certificate of further education of no less than 30 class hours every year shall be provided.
hypo: Overdue registered personnel who have not provided proof of continuing education learning shall provide proof of continuing education for no less than 30 school hours within the past year for re-registration, and proof of continuing education for no less than 120 school hours within the past 4 years for re-registration. For re-registration, proof of continuing education learning of no less than 30 school hours per year should be provided.

src: 造价工程师继续教育费用标准
tgt: Expense standard of further education of cost engineer
hypo: Cost standard for further education of a cost engineer.

src: 参加网络继续教育的造价工程师在报名时须向各管理机构交纳学习费用，一般情况标准为:30学时必修课的费用为300元/人年(含继续教育统一教材);
tgt: Cost engineers enrolling in online further education shall pay tuition to various management institutions when signing up; the standard in general is: the cost of 30 class hours of compulsory courses is 300 yuan/person per year (including unified teaching materials for further education);
hypo: Cost engineers participating in online further education shall pay the tuition fees to various management organizations when registering. The general standard is that the cost for 30 mandatory courses is 300 yuan per person per year (including the unified teaching materials for continuing education).

src: 30学时选修课的费用为300元/人年。
tgt: The cost of 30 class hours of elective courses is 300 yuan/person per year.
hypo: The cost of elective courses for 30 class hours is 300 yuan per person per year.

src: 30学时必修课和30学时选修课的费用为600元/人年(含继续教育统一教材)。
tgt: The cost of 30 class hours of compulsory courses and 30 class hours of elective courses is 600 yuan/person per year (including unified textbooks for further education).
hypo: The cost for 30 class hours of required courses and 30 class hours of elective courses, including unified textbooks for continuing education, is 600 yuan per person per year.

src: (一)参加中价协或各省级和部门管理机构组织的注册造价工程师网络继续教育学习，按在线学习课件记录的时间计算学时;
tgt: 1. Participate in the online further education of registered cost engineers organized by the China Cost Engineering Association or provincial and departmental management institutions, and calculate the class hours according to the time recorded in the online learning courseware;
hypo: (One) Participate in the online further education of registered cost engineers organized by the national or provincial and departmental management institutions, and calculate the learning hour according to the recorded time of online learning courseware.

src: (二)参加中价协或各省级和部门管理机构组织的注册造价工程师集中面授培训及各种类型的培训班、研讨会等，每半天可认定4个学时;
tgt: 2. Participate in the centralized face-to-face training of registered cost engineers and various types of training courses, seminars, etc. organized by China Cost Engineering Association or provincial and departmental management institutions, and 4 class hours can be recognized every half day;
hypo: (二) Participate in centralized face-to-face training for registered cost engineers organized by the Mid-Price Association or various provincial and departmental management agencies, as well as various types of training courses, seminars, etc. Four credit hours can be recognized every half day.

src: (三)参加中价协、各省级和部门造价工程师、造价员继续教育授课，每半天可认定10个学时;
tgt: 3. Participate in courses of further education for cost engineers and cost personnel organized by China Cost Engineering Association, provinces and departments, and 10 class hours can be recognized every half day;
hypo: (3) Participate in the teaching of middle-level price association, provincial and departmental cost engineers and cost staff's further education classes, and each half-day can be recognized as 10 class hours.

src: (四)参加中价协和省级课题研究、行业标准编制、教材编写,每项每年认定30学时;
tgt: 4. Participate in the research projects of China Cost Engineering Association and provincial projects, and the compilation of industry standards and textbooks; each item is recognized as 30 class hours per year;
hypo: Participation in intermediate-price cooperative and provincial-level research projects, industry standard development, and textbook writing is recognized as 30 credit hours per year for each item.

src: (六)参加全国造价工程师执业资格考试教材编写以及命题、审题、评卷，每年可认定30学时;
tgt: 6. Participate in the compilation of teaching materials, setting questions, reviewing questions and evaluation of national cost engineer qualification examination, and it can be recognized as 30 class hours per year;
hypo: marking papers, 30 credit hours  (6) Participate in the writing, reviewing questions, and marking papers for the national cost engineer professional qualification examination textbook, and earn 30 credit hours annually.

src: (七)以个人署名且公开发表(以正式刊号为准)的工程造价相关专业论文、著作。
tgt: 7. Professional papers and works related to project cost with personal signature and which are published publicly (with official publication number).
hypo: Engineering cost-related professional papers and works that (7) are signed with personal signature and are publicly published (based on official publication numbers).

src: 出版著作每万字认定12学时;
tgt: 12 class hours per 10,000 words of published works;
hypo: "Of published works, every ten thousand words are recognized as twelve hours of study."

src: 在国家级刊物上发表论文每千字认定8学时，在省级刊物上发表论文每千字认定5学时，在市级刊物上发表论文每千字认定3学时;
tgt: Every thousand words in papers published in national journals is recognized as 8 class hours, every thousand words in papers published in provincial journals is recognized as 5 class hours, and every thousand words in papers published in municipal journals is recognized as 3 class hours;
hypo: "Publishing a paper in a national-level journal is recognized as 8 credit hours per thousand words, while publishing a paper in a provincial-level journal is recognized as 5 credit hours per thousand words, and publishing a paper in a city-level journal is recognized as 3 credit hours per thousand words."

src: (九)参加经中价协、各省级和部门管理机构、省级造价协会批准或授权的工程造价咨询企业组织的可以面向社会的公开培训(企业一般的管理和技能培训除外)，每半天可认定4个学时，每年最高可认定30学时。
tgt: 9. Participate in the public training (excluding the general management and skill training of enterprises) that can be open to the society which is approved by China Cost Engineering Association, provincial and departmental management institutions, and the Provincial Cost Association, or organized by authorized engineering cost consulting enterprise; 4 class hours can be recognized every half day, and at most 30 class hours can be recognized every year.
hypo: (9) Participating organizations approved by the National Association of Cost Consultancy, provincial and departmental management agencies, and provincial Cost Association can organize public training for engineering cost consulting enterprises. This training, which excludes general management and skill training, can be certified for 4 credit hours every half day, with a maximum of 30 credit hours per year.

src: 造价工程师网络继续教育学习流程
tgt: Process of cost engineer online further education
hypo: Continuing Education for Cost Engineers Network

src: 在注册机构收到费用后，学员身份随即开通，造价工程师即可凭着用户名和密码进入网络教育课堂学习。
tgt: After the registration institution receives the tuition, the student identity will be set up immediately, and cost engineers can enter the online education classroom with the user name and password.
hypo: Once the registration institution receives the tuition, the student identity is immediately activated, and cost engineers can access the online education classroom for learning by using their username and password.

src: 学员通过点播课件、提问答疑、网上讨论等方式进行学习。
tgt: Students learn through on-demand courseware, question answering, online discussion, etc.
hypo: Students learn through watching and requesting course materials, asking and getting answers, and having online discussions.

src: 如果忘记密码，登陆时出现用户名和密码不正确，不能登陆学习时，请学员与所属注册机构联系，注册机构可以协助修改学员的密码(但不能修改用户名)，使用其修改后的密码重新登陆。
tgt: If you forget your password, and your user name and password are incorrect when logging in; if you can’t log in and study, please contact your registration institution, and they can help you change the password (but you can’t change your user name) and you can use the new password to log in again.
hypo: If you forget the password and find that the username and password are incorrect when logging in, and cannot access learning materials, please contact the registered institution. The registered institution can assist in resetting the password (but cannot change the username). You can then use the new password to log in.
