hypo: Watch high-definition live streams and videos!

src: 2020年9月，陆先生从房屋中介了解到一处位于浙江余姚丈亭镇的厂房，在多次现场看房后，陆先生决定购买该厂房。
tgt: In September 2020, Mr. Lu learned about a plant located at Yuyao Zhangting Village in Zhejiang through an estate agent and decided to purchase it after seeing it on-site for a few times.
hypo: In September 2020, Mr. Lu learned from a real estate agency about a factory located in Zhangting Village, Yuyao, Zhejiang. After visiting the site multiple times, Mr. Lu decided to purchase the factory.

src: 同年12月，陆先生就购买厂房的细节与房屋所有权人的家属林某进行磋商后，于当天通过银行转账汇款20万元作定金。
tgt: In December of the same year, Mr. Lu negotiated with Lin, a family member of the house owner, about the details of the purchase of the plant, and remitted 200,000 yuan as a deposit by bank transfer on the same day.
hypo: In December of the same year, Mr. Lu discussed the details of purchasing the factory building with Lin, a family member of the house owner, and paid a deposit of 200,000 yuan by bank transfer on the same day.

src: 林某在《厂房买卖定金收条》上作为收款人签名，其中载明，“若买方不想买此厂房，此定金归卖家，如卖方不愿意卖此厂房，定金将双倍返还卖方，双方约定一周内签订厂房买卖合同。”
tgt: Lin signed as the payee on the Receipt of the Deposit for the Purchase and Sale of the Plant, which stated that if the buyer does not to buy the plant, the deposit belongs to the seller; if the seller does not want to sell the plant, the deposit will be returned to the seller in double; both parties agree to sign the plant purchase and sale contract within one week. ”
hypo: Lin signed as the payee on the "Receipt for Deposit in Sale and Purchase of Factory Building," which stated, "If the buyer does not want to buy the plant, the deposit will belong to the seller. If the seller is unwilling to sell the plant, the deposit will be returned to the seller twice. The two parties agree to sign the contract for the sale and purchase of the plant within one week."

src: 然而，之后双方因厂房出售范围、付款方式等主要合同条款未能形成一致意见，导致房屋买卖合同迟迟未能签订。
tgt: However, both parties failed to reach an agreement on the main items in the contract including the scope of the sale of the plant and method of payment, and as a result, they were delaying the signing of the plant purchase and sale contract.
hypo: However, later on, both parties failed to reach a consensus on the main contract terms such as the scope of the sale of the plant and the payment method, which caused a delay in the signing of the housing sales contract.

src: 考虑到双方未能就合同内容达成共识，几天后，林某将20万元定金退回给了陆先生。
tgt: Considering they have not reached an agreement on the content of the contract, Lin returned the deposit of 200,000 to Mr. Lu a few days later.
hypo: "Considering that both parties failed to reach consensus on the content of the contract, a few days later, Mr. Lin returned the 200,000 yuan deposit to Mr. Lu."

src: 好不容易看中的房子，定金交了，房款也准备好了，就差“临门一脚”签合同，卖方却不卖了，这让陆先生无奈又愤怒。
tgt: Mr. Lu was helpless and angry because he had a hard time finding the plant, paid the deposit, prepared the payment and was waiting for the contract to be signed, but the seller didn’t want to sell it anymore.
hypo: It was a hard-fought house that they finally found, they paid the deposit, had the money ready, and just needed to sign the contract to seal the deal. However, the seller refused to sell it anymore, which left Mr. Lu feeling helpless and angry.

src: 为此，陆先生将林某起诉至余姚市人民法院。
tgt: For this, Mr. Lu decided to sue Lin at the Yuyao People’s Court.
hypo: Mr. Lu decided to sue Mr. Lin to the Yuyao People's Court because of this.

src: 法院经审理认为，双方最终未能签订正式合同，不能仅归责于被告，应合理推定为磋商不成，故本案不应适用定金罚则，被告无需承担双倍返还定金的违约责任。
tgt: After the hearing, the court held that the two parties failing to sign a formal contract could not be attributed only to the defendant, but should be reasonably presumed that the negotiation failed; therefore, the deposit penalty should not be applied in this case, and the defendant should not bear the liability for breach of contract and return twice the deposit.
hypo: After trial, the court deemed that the failure to ultimately sign a formal contract could not solely be attributed to the defendant, and should be reasonably presumed as negotiation failure. Therefore, the penalty of forfeiting the deposit should not apply in this case, and the defendant is not obligated to bear the responsibility of returning double the deposit.

src: 一审判决后，原告提起上诉。
tgt: After the judgment of the first instance, the plaintiff appealed again.
hypo: After the first trial judgment, the plaintiff appealed.

src: 近日，二审法院维持原判。
tgt: Recently, the court of second instance upheld the original judgment.
hypo: Recently, the second trial court upheld the original verdict.

src: 【律师提醒】 在交易过程中要尽到必要的审慎注意义务。
tgt: [Reminder from attorney] In the process of trading, we should perform necessary duty of prudence.
hypo: Lawyers remind you to exercise necessary prudence in the trading process.

src: 在签订合同时，作为买方要尽到必要的审慎注意义务，比如，核实房屋所有权人信息、房屋是否被人占用等相关信息，并在合同中明确关于交付的具体时间、地点，以防履行合同时双方产生争议。
tgt: When signing the contract, the buyer should perform necessary duty of prudence, such as verifying the information of the house owner and whether the house is occupied, and specify the specific time and place of delivery in the contract, so as to prevent disputes between the two parties during the performance of the contract.
hypo: When signing the contract, as the buyer, one should perform necessary diligent attention obligations, such as verifying information of the property owner, whether the property is occupied by someone, and other related information, and clearly specify in the contract the specific time and place of delivery to prevent disputes between the parties during the performance of the contract.

src: 你叫郑眠，这是你搬来日本的第二周。
tgt: Your name is Zheng Mian, and this is the second week since you’ve moved to Japan.
hypo: You are called Zheng Mian, and this is your second week in Japan since you moved here.

src: 你走在街上，突然发现有人跟着你，你害怕地越走越快，最后跑了起来。
tgt: You were walking on the street when suddenly you found someone following you; you got scared and you were walking faster and faster and at last running.
hypo: You were walking on the street and suddenly found someone following you. You became increasingly frightened and walked faster and faster, and at last, you started running.

src: 那人在你身后追：“小姐！请等等！”（全程日文对话） 你在便利店门口停下了脚步。
tgt: The one chased behind you, “miss!” Please wait! “(Japanese dialogue) You stopped in front of a convenience store.
hypo: The person chased behind you and said in Japanese dialogue, "Miss, please wait!" You stopped your footsteps at the convenience store entrance.

src: “小姐……我是一名导演，我看你长得很美，有兴趣参加真人秀吗？”
tgt: “Miss... I am a director, and I saw that you’re good looking and so I want to ask you, are you interested in participating in a reality show? ”
hypo: "Miss...I am a director. I noticed that you are very beautiful. Are you interested in participating in a reality TV show?"

src: 你很疑惑，害怕这是骗局。
tgt: You are confused and afraid this might be swindle.
hypo: You might be confused and afraid that this is a scam.

src: 他塞给你一张名片，你发现他真的是日本一家大型娱乐公司的导演。
tgt: He gave you a business card, and you found he’s really a director of a large Japanese entertainment company.
hypo: "He handed you a business card, and you found out that he is actually the director of a large Japanese entertainment company."

src: “小姐如果有时间的话，我们可以去公司里谈，片酬一定少不了。”
tgt: “If you have time, we can discuss it at our company, and the salary is definitely satisfactory. ”
hypo: "Miss, if you have time, we can discuss it at the company, and the remuneration will definitely be satisfactory."

src: 你稀里糊涂就跟他来到了公司，他说他一眼就在街上看见了你，非常希望你能来参加。
tgt: You followed him to the company in a haze, and he told you he found you on the street at first glance and really wanted you to come.
hypo: You followed him to the company all confused, he said he saw you on the street at a glance and really hoped you could come and join.

src: 你想着没什么损失，还能赚钱，就签下了合同。
tgt: You signed the contract since there would not be any loss and you could make money.
hypo: You signed the contract since you thought there was not much to lose and you could even make money.

src: 这是一个大型恋爱真人秀，分为两部分。
tgt: This is a large dating reality show which consists of two parts.
hypo: This is a large dating reality show, divided into two parts.

src: 前期会让明星和素人在现实生活中相处，培养默契。
tgt: In the first part, celebrities and normal people date in real life to form unison between them.
hypo: In the early stages, it will allow celebrities and normal people to interact in real life, fostering mutual understanding.

src: 后期则会进入到游戏中共同闯关。
tgt: In the later stage, they will play in the game together.
hypo: In the later stage, we will enter the game together to beat the level.

src: 下周就要开始正式录制了，你并不知道自己的搭档会是谁，会有什么有趣的事情发生呢？
tgt: The official shooting is next week, and you don’t know who your partner will be and what interesting things might happen.
hypo: The official shooting is about to start next week, and you have no idea who your partner might be or what interesting things might happen.

src: 无意中看到如下一篇文章，从商业的角度以及保存期的角度谈为什么这个客户要保税区里面的物流公司帮做罐装，虽然罐装属于深加工，不属于保税物流公司的经营范围，这里如下这篇文字也许可以解释 为什么客户想要这么做？
tgt: I came across the following article, which talks about why this customer wants the logistics company in the bonded area to help with canning from the perspective of business and shelf life; although canning is deep processing and is not within the business scope of the bonded logistics company, the following text perhaps can explain why the customer wants to do this.
hypo: By chance, I came across the following article discussing, from a business and preservation perspective, why a client wants the logistics company located in the bonded area to assist with canning, even though canning is considered deep processing and falls outside the scope of the bonded logistics company's business. Perhaps the following text can explain why the client wants to do this.

src: 我去很多奶粉的厂家，接触很多奶粉的生产线。
tgt: I have visited many milk powder manufacturers and gained contact with many production lines of milk powder.
hypo: "I visited many milk powder manufacturers and got to see many milk powder production lines."

src: 其实袋装跟听装的奶粉它们的原材料是一模一样的，没有任何区别的。
tgt: Actually, the raw materials of milk powder in bags and in cans are exactly the same.
hypo: In fact, the raw materials for the milk powder in bag and can formats are exactly the same, with no difference.

src: 那么大家肯定会问：为什么袋装保质期是一年，而听装的保质期是两年或更长呢？
tgt: Then you may ask: why is the shelf life of milk powder one year in bags and two years or longer in cans?
hypo: Then you may ask: why is the shelf life of bagged products one year, while the shelf life of canned products is two years or longer?

src: 或者又问：听装与袋装的价格为什么差价这么大呢？
tgt: Or you may ask: why are the prices of bagged and canned milk powder so different?
hypo: Or alternatively ask: Why are the prices of canned and bagged so different?

src: 其实从这点出发很多消费者，或者妈妈级的认为这是因为原材料不一样所以质量上会好很多。
tgt: Actually, from this point of view, many consumers or mothers think that the quality will be much better because the raw materials are different.
hypo: Actually, many consumers or mothers think that starting from this point, the quality is much better because the raw materials are different.

src: 其实原材料一样，只是大家认为贵的就是好的。
tgt: Actually, the raw materials are the same, and people just think the goods are more expensive because they are better.
hypo: Actually, the raw materials are the same, just that people just think the more expensive, the better.

src: 也有消费者出于这种心态吃了后反应还说听装的口感或味道就是不一样！
tgt: There are also customers in this mindset who say that the taste is indeed different after drinking it!
hypo: Some consumers also say that after eating due to this mentality, the taste or flavor of the canned packaging is different!

src: 现在我跟大家先说一下听装贵的原因，贵在哪里？
tgt: Now I will introduce why the canned ones are expensive.
hypo: Now I will introduce the reasons why canned food is expensive and where the cost comes from.

src: 它们的原材料相同为何差价如此之大呢？
tgt: Why are the prices so different when the raw materials are the same?
hypo: Why are the prices so different when their raw materials are the same?

src: 因为厂家在定价的时候大多数都考虑到如果袋装定价太高，消费者很难去接受，这就意味着厂家产生的利润很低，或者说没有利润，那厂家靠什么去生存呢？
tgt: When the manufacturers set the price, they know that if they price too high, it is difficult for the customers to accept and the profits will be very low for the manufacturers or there will be no profit at all; then what will the manufacturers live on?
hypo: Because the manufacturers mostly consider that if the price of bagged products is too high, it will be difficult for consumers to accept, which means that the manufacturers will have very low profit or no profit at all, so what will the manufacturers survive on?

src: 所以他们在听装的定价上，有了一个很大的上升幅度来保障他们的利润空间。
tgt: Therefore, in the price setting of the canned ones, they set it much higher to guarantee their profits.
hypo: So they have had a much higher increase in the pricing of canned goods to ensure their profit margin.

src: 因此大多数厂家主推的是听装，而不是袋装。
tgt: As a result, many manufacturers recommend canned ones instead of bagged ones.
hypo: Therefore, most manufacturers primarily promote canned packaging instead of bagged packaging.

src: 还有你想那么多的厂家每年的广告费都要几千万甚至是几个亿，这个费用何来？
tgt: Just think about where the tens of millions or even hundreds of millions yuan advertising fee of the manufacturers come from every year.
hypo: millions  And what about the annual advertising expenses of hundreds of manufacturers? It costs tens or even hundreds of millions. Where does this expense come from?

src: 大家可想而知。
tgt: Everyone knows it.
hypo: Everyone can imagine.

src: 那么随着社会的发展，市场的推广费用，比如说：商场的促销人员、商场的陈列费用、产品的赠品费用、广告费用等也在不断的增加。
tgt: With the development of society, the market promotion expenses kept increasing, such as the cost of promotion personnel at shopping malls, the display expenses of products at shopping malls, the cost of gifts of products, advertising expenses, etc.
hypo: Therefore, with the development of society, promotion expenses in the market, such as promotion personnel in shopping malls, display expenses in shopping malls, product gift expenses, advertising expenses, etc., are constantly increasing.

src: 所以各个厂家也在不断地增加新品，而且是听装，其价格也是不断地上涨，其实这是随着市场费用的增加而出的新品。
tgt: Therefore, various manufacturers are also constantly adding new products in can packaging, and the price kept rising as well; in fact, these new product are introduced due to the increase of market costs.
hypo: Therefore, various manufacturers are constantly adding new products, which are also in the form of canned goods, and their prices are constantly increasing. In fact, these are new products that have emerged with the increase of market costs.

src: 主要目的是为了获取更高的利润，其实他们的原材料增加的成本最多不会超过3、4元钱。
tgt: The main objective is to gain more profits; the increased cost of raw materials is actually no more than 3 or 4 yuan.
hypo: The main purpose is to gain more profits, but in reality their increased cost of raw materials won't exceed 3 or 4 yuan at most.

src: 还有一部分品牌，为了推广自己的产品，不择手段，跟医院的医生挂钩，由他们协助产品的推广，从一听里面抽成30元到80元不等的利润。
tgt: There are also some brands that, in order to promote their products, cooperate with doctors in the hospital by all means, and ask them to assist in the promotion of products, drawing profits ranging from 30 yuan to 80 yuan from one can.
hypo: Some brands, in order to promote their products, resort to any means possible and collude with hospital doctors to assist in the promotion of their products, taking a profit ranging from 30 to 80 yuan per unit.

src: 而中国的相关法律是绝对不允许这样的操作方式方法的，其实这种做法是在坑害消费者。
tgt: China’s relevant laws by no means allow such operations because this practice is in fact harming consumers.
hypo: And China's relevant laws absolutely do not allow such operations, in fact, this kind of practice is harming consumers.

src: 建议大家在家里有罐的前提下买袋装的奶粉装入罐中，这样可以节省费用，而增加奶粉的保存性和密封性，对小孩子也没有任何影响。
tgt: It is recommended that you buy bagged milk powder and put it into cans if you have cans at home, which can save money and increase the preservation time and hermetic seal of milk powder; it won’t have any influence on the children.
hypo: It is recommended that everyone buy bagged milk powder and pour it into cans at home, which can save costs, increase the preservation and sealing of milk powder, and have no effect on children as long as there are cans at home.

src: 还有大家不要认为听装的保质期就比袋装长，如果在开包以后听装与袋装的保质期是一样的，只是说袋装开包以后不容易保存，容易受潮变质。
tgt: Also, don’t think that the shelf life of canned ones is longer than that of bagged ones; the shelf life of canned ones is the same as that of bagged ones after unpacked; it’s just that bagged ones are not easy to be preserved and are easy to become damp and deteriorate.
hypo: Also, don't think that the shelf life of canned ones is longer than that of bagged ones. If the shelf life of canned and bagged ones is the same after opening, it's just that it's not easy to store the bagged ones after opening and they are prone to moisture and spoilage.

src: 刚看到一篇写例假的文章，太长了。
tgt: I just read an article about period, and it’s too long.
hypo: Just saw an article about period, it's too long.

src: 给不知道的男性科普一下。
tgt: I’ll introduce to men who don’t know about it.
hypo: should explain.   "I should explain to men who don't know."

src: 大部分女孩子会在13-15岁期间的某一天突然经历第一次例假，在50岁左右闭经。
tgt: Most girls will get their first period between 13 to15 years old, and have amenorrhea around 50.
hypo: Most girls will experience their first period suddenly during the ages of 13-15, and will reach amenorrhea around the age of 50.

src: 之后身体健康的前提下会比较规律地每个月来一次。
tgt: Then they get period regularly once every month on the premise of good health.
hypo: health, after.  After being in good health, it will come regularly once a month.

src: 但也不是规律到能精准预测，大概一周左右的公差，需要提前准备，有时候运气差也会翻车（突然提前好几天）。
tgt: But it is not so regular that you can precisely predict it; there is a difference of around a week; you need to prepare early and sometimes you may get unlucky and it arrives several days earlier.
hypo: But it's not regular enough for you to make precise predictions. The margin of error is approximately a week, and you need to prepare ahead of time. Sometimes luck isn't on your side and things can unexpectedly change (like being bumped up by several days).

src: 时间长度、血量、痛经程度因人而异，有些人三天，有些人一周；有些人流的少，有些人大血崩；有些人没什么反应，有些人疼到救护车运走，痛经随着时间会改变，以前不痛不代表一辈子不痛。
tgt: The length of time, blood volume and degree of dysmenorrhea vary from person to person; some people have it for three days and some people a week; some people have small flow and some people have way too much; some people don’t have any reaction, and some people feel so painful that they have to be taken away by the ambulance; dysmenorrhea will change over time, and not having it before doesn’t mean it won’t happen for a lifetime.
hypo: The length of time, amount of blood, and level of menstrual pain vary from person to person. Some people experience it for three days, while others experience it for a week. Some people have light flow, while others have heavy bleeding. Some people don't have much of a reaction, while others are in so much pain that they need to be taken away by ambulance. The severity of menstrual pain can change over time, and just because someone didn't experience pain in the past doesn't mean they won't experience it in the future.

src: 月经无法控制，开始到结束为止的几天内24小时流血，能做的只有用卫生巾或卫生棉条吸血防止流到衣服椅子上。
tgt: You can’t control menstruation; you bleed 24 hours from the beginning to the end, and all you can do is absorb blood with pads or tampons to prevent it from getting onto clothes or chairs.
hypo: Menstruation cannot be controlled, and for several days from the beginning to the end, bleeding occurs 24 hours a day. The only thing that can be done is to use sanitary pads or tampons to absorb the blood and prevent it from flowing onto clothes or chairs.

src: 痛经主要是因为前列腺素的分泌，生理期刚开始还没来得及痛经时赶紧吃布洛芬可有效缓解当月疼痛，痛经开始后再吃没什么用。
tgt: Dysmenorrhea is mainly due to the secretion of prostaglandins; Taking ibuprofen can effectively relieve the pain of dysmenorrhea that month before menstruation begins, but taking it is useless to after dysmenorrhea begins.
hypo: Dysmenorrhea is mainly due to the secretion of prostaglandins. Taking ibuprofen quickly at the beginning of the menstrual cycle before the onset of dysmenorrhea can effectively relieve the pain of the month. After dysmenorrhea begins, taking ibuprofen again will not help much.

src: 生理期前由于子宫充血和前列腺素释放过多，容易拉肚子。
tgt: It is easy to have diarrhea before the period due to uterine congestion and excessive prostaglandin release.
hypo: Due to uterine congestion and excessive prostaglandin release before menstruation, it is easy to have diarrhea.

src: 如果大概到了周期，莫名其妙拉肚子，基本上两天内会来月经。
tgt: If you are near the cycle and you have diarrhea for no reason at all, you will basically get your period within two days.
hypo: If you have diarrhea out of the blue around your cycle, you will basically get your period within the next two days.

src: 卫生巾最好两三个小时更换一次，不然容易滋生细菌，除去睡眠时间，最坏的情况是一天更换6次，每月7天，那就是42片，如果加上提前准备的份可能有50片，并不是每个月用一片。
tgt: It is best to replace sanitary pads every two or three hours, otherwise it is easy to breed bacteria; apart from sleep time, the worst case is to replace them six times a day, seven days a month, and that is 42 pieces; if you add the ones prepared in advance, there may be 50 pieces, not just one piece every month.
hypo: It is best to change sanitary pads every two to three hours, otherwise it is easy to grow bacteria. If you exclude sleep time, the worst case is to change them six times a day. That is 42 pads in seven days every month, and if you add in some preparation, there may be 50 pads, and not every month requires just one pad.

src: （此处修改一下，卫生棉条不必常换，大概五六小时换一次就可以，最长八小时）
tgt: (a little modification here, tampons do not need to be changed often; it can be changed every five or six hours, up to eight hours)
hypo: Make a slight amendment here: tampons do not need to be changed frequently, they can be changed once every five or six hours, and the longest time is eight hours.

src: 月经期荷尔蒙作祟可能会比较暴躁，排卵期也会因为体内激素变化情绪不稳定，就是很倒霉，身体给自己使绊子。
tgt: Hormones during menstruation may make you irritable, and ovulation may also make you emotionally unstable due to hormone changes in the body, which is very troublesome; your body makes itself suffer.
hypo: During the menstrual cycle, hormones may cause emotional instability and it can be very troublesome. During ovulation, the fluctuation of hormones can also result in being unlucky and your body may trip you up.

src: 但官方犯罪率数据能看出女性控制情绪的能力还是很高的，也不会拿情绪问题找借口。
tgt: However, you may see from the official crime rate data that women’s ability to control their emotions is still very high, and they will not make excuses for emotional problems.
hypo: However, official crime rate data shows that women have a high ability to control their emotions and do not make excuses for emotional problems.

src: 流的并不只是血，其中包含脱落的子宫内膜。
tgt: It’s not just blood, but also endometrium that fall off.
hypo: It's not just blood that's flowing, it also includes the fallen off uterine lining.

src: 月经结束后的子宫内膜最薄，之后慢慢变厚，可以理解为子宫是房子，每个月建房子（内膜变厚）准备迎接客人，客人没有来，全部拆掉（月经排出）下个月再建新房子，周而复始。
tgt: After menstruation, the endometrium is the thinnest, and then it gradually thickens; you may think that the uterus is a house; you build a house every month (the endometrium thickens) to prepare for guests, and if the guests do not come, all of them are demolished (menstruation flows out) and a new house is built next month, which starts again and again.
hypo: The endometrium is thinnest after the end of menstruation, and gradually thickens afterwards. This can be understood as the uterus being a house, building a new house (thickening of endometrium) every month in preparation for guests that may not come, and tearing it down completely (menstruation) if they do not arrive. The cycle repeats itself every month.

src: 月经很不方便，连续几十年，每个月几天24小时流血，还会腹痛腰痛，谁愿意？
tgt: Menstruation is very inconvenient; you bleed 24 hours a few days a month for dozens of years, and it also causes abdominal pain and lower back pain; who would want that?
hypo: several decades, every month, bleeding for several days, abdominal pain, lower back pain, who would be willing?  Menstruation is very inconvenient, for several decades, every month for several days, 24 hours of bleeding, there is also abdominal pain and lower back pain, who would be willing?

src: 但是人能出生是因为他的母亲来过月经，月经是为了准备你第一次来到这个世界时要住10个月的房子，大家要感谢自己的母亲规律健康的来过月经。
tgt: But people are born because their mother has menstruation; menstruation exists to prepare for the house where you will live for 10 months before you come to this world; everyone should thank their mother for menstruating regularly and healthily.
hypo: However, people are born because their mother has had menstrual periods, which prepare the house where you will live for 10 months when you first come to this world. Everyone should be grateful to their mother for having regular and healthy menstrual cycles.

src: 以前女性的很多事情被打压，社会给女性洗脑说是肮脏的，羞耻的，大家以为就是那样了，但时代变了。
tgt: In the past, many things about women were suppressed; society brainwashed women and told them it’s dirty and shameful, and everyone thought that it was like that; but times have changed.
hypo: In the past, many things about women were suppressed, and society brainwashed women by saying that they were dirty and shameful. People thought that was just how it was, but times have changed.

src: 如果有人觉得月经恶心，觉得女性的身体为孕育生命做出的准备行为恶心，不该在大庭广众之下说出来，女孩子们站起来，不要再这么想，从未经历过，这辈子也不会经历，也不怎么了解的男性们，不要那么忘恩负义不知好歹，这种态度怎么好意思面对自己的母亲，怎么好意思想要自己的孩子？
tgt: If someone feels that menstruation is disgusting, the female body’s preparation for life is disgusting, and it shouldn’t be said in public; girls, stand up and don’t think this way; men who have never experienced it, won’t experience it in this life, and don’t know much about it, don’t be so ungrateful and unkind; how can you face your mother and children in this attitude?
hypo: If someone finds menstruation disgusting, or thinks that a woman's body preparing for childbirth is disgusting, they should not say so in public. Girls, stand up and stop thinking like this. Men who have never experienced it and will never experience it, and do not understand it very well, should not be ungrateful and disrespectful. How can they face their own mother with such an attitude, or want their own children in life?

src: 最后，姐妹们试试卫生棉条吧，真的好用。
tgt: Finally, sisters, try tampons; they are really easy to use.
hypo: Finally, sisters, try tampons, they are truly useful.

src: 形而上学是指通过理性的推理和逻辑去研究不能直接透过感知而得到答案的问题。
tgt: Metaphysics refers to the study of problems that cannot be answered directly through perception, but only through rational reasoning and logic.
hypo: Metaphysics refers to the study of questions that cannot be directly obtained through perception, using rational reasoning and logic.

src: 形而上学是哲学的基本法则，旨在解释存在和世界的基本性质。
tgt: Metaphysics is the basic law of philosophy, which aims to explain the fundamental nature of existence and the world.
hypo: Metaphysics is the fundamental law of philosophy, aimed at explaining the basic nature of existence and the world.

src: 中文译名“形而上学”取自《易经•系辞上传》“形而上者谓之道，形而下者谓之器”一语，为日本人井上哲次郎（明治时代）由metaphysic翻译而来。
tgt: The Chinese translation of Metaphysics originates from “the metaphysical is the Tao, and the physical is vessel” in the Book of Changes, Texts of Hexagrams, and was translated from metaphysic by Japanese Kajiro Inoue (Meiji era).
hypo: "The Chinese translation of 'Metaphysics' is derived from the phrase 'The Dao, as the metaphysical, has no form; as the physical, it takes on form' found in the Introduction to the Explanation of the Hexagrams in the Book of Changes. The term was translated from the English word 'metaphysic' by the Japanese philosopher Tetsuro Watsuji during the Meiji era."

src: 形而上学分支包括本体论、自然神学及其延伸问题等。
tgt: The branches of metaphysics include ontology, natural theology and its extended questions.
hypo: of metaphysics include ontology, natural theology, and related issues.

src: 本体论就是“研究到底哪些名词代表真实的存在实体，哪些名词只是代表一种概念”。
tgt: Ontology is the “study of which nouns represent real entities and which nouns only represent a concept”.
hypo: "Ontology is the study of which nouns represent real entities and which nouns only represent a concept."

src: 形而上学自然主义，指否认上帝存在。
tgt: Metaphysical naturalism denies the existence of God.
hypo: Metaphysical naturalism refers to the denial of the existence of God.

src: 其理论基础认为所有现象皆可用自然理由的概念解释，由支持科学和演化论的哲学家提出。
tgt: Its theoretical basis believes all phenomena can be explained by the concept of natural reason, which was put forward by philosophers who support science and evolution theory.
hypo: The theoretical foundation of it believes all phenomena can be explained by the concept of natural causes, proposed by philosophers who support science and evolution theory.

src: 而方法自然主义指对上帝不置一词的研究方法。
tgt: Methodological naturalism refers to the research method of keeping silence about God.
hypo: Methodological naturalism refers to the research methodology that does not mention God.

src: 精神哲学是研究意识以及它们与肉体（尤其是大脑）的关系的本质的哲学分支。
tgt: Spiritual philosophy is a branch of philosophy that studies the essence of consciousness and its relationship with the body (especially the brain).
hypo: "Spiritual philosophy is a philosophical branch that studies the nature of consciousness and its relationship with the body (especially the brain)."

src: 二元论与一元论是讨论“心灵与肉体的关系”最主要的两派思想。
tgt: Dualism and monism are the two main schools of thought to discuss the relationship between “mind and body”.
hypo: "Dualism and monism are the two main schools of thought when discussing the relationship between the mind and body."

src: 知识论是探讨知识的本质、起源和范围的一个哲学分支。
tgt: Epistemology is a branch of philosophy that discusses the essence, origin and scope of knowledge.
hypo: Epistemology is a branch of philosophy that explores the nature, origins, and scope of knowledge.

src: 伦理学是对人类道德生活进行系统性思考和研究的学科；在这里，道德定义为一群人或一种文化所认可的所有行为准则。
tgt: Ethics is a discipline which carries out systematic thinking and research on human moral life; here, morality is defined as all the codes of conduct recognized by a group of people or a culture.
hypo: Ethics is a discipline that involves systematic thinking and research on human moral life; here, morality is defined as all the behavioral guidelines recognized by a group of people or a culture.

src: 主要分为元伦理学（抽象地研究伦理理论或批判的本质）、规范伦理学（评判各种不同的道德观，并且对于正确或错误行为给出道德准则建议。
tgt: It is mainly divided into meta-ethics (study of the essence of ethical theory or criticism in an abstract way), normative ethics (judge different moral concepts, and to give moral code suggestions for correct or wrong behavior).
hypo: The main division is between metaethics (abstractly studying ethical theories or criticizing their nature) and normative ethics (judging various moral views and giving ethical code suggestions for correct or incorrect behavior).

src: 它研究人们应该遵守什么样式的道德行为准则）、应用伦理学（将伦理理论应用于实际生活状况的学术，包括生物伦理学、政治伦理学等）、描述伦理学（搜集关于人们怎样生活的信息，从观察到的样式来作总结。
tgt: It studies what kind of moral code of conduct people should abide by), applied ethics (the research where ethical theory is applied to actual living conditions, including bioethics, political ethics), descriptive ethics (collect information about how people live, and summarize from the observed patterns.
hypo: It studies what style of moral behavior guidelines people should follow, applies ethics (the academic work that applies ethical theory to practical life situations, including bioethics, political ethics, etc.), and describes ethics (collects information about how people live and summarizes it based on observed patterns).

src: 它对于伦理的检视不是从预想的理论出发，而是调查实际道德主体（moral agent）所做出、并且被观察到的真实抉择，促成了这决择的所有道德因素，它研讨社会族群所持有的伦理观）。
tgt: Its examination on ethics does not originate from the expected theory, but it investigates the real choices made and observed by the actual moral agent, all the moral factors leading to this decision; it studies the ethics held by social groups).
hypo: agents, ethical views, investigate, observed, decision-making, social groups, and theoretical assumptions.  "The investigation on ethics does not start from theoretical assumptions, but rather from observing the actual moral agents and their real decision-making process, taking into account all moral factors that have influenced their choices. It also involves studying the ethical views held by different social groups."

src: 伦理学历史包括希腊罗马伦理学、中世纪基督教伦理学。
tgt: The history of ethics includes Greek and Roman ethics and medieval Christian ethics.
hypo: The history of ethics includes Greek and Roman ethics, as well as Christian ethics in the Middle Ages.

src: 第一部分：人文主义的伦理思想，以瓦拉与蒙田等人为代表。
tgt: Part I: the ethical thought of humanism, represented by Valla and Montaigne.
hypo: Part I: Humanistic ethical ideas, represented by Valla and Montaigne.

src: 第二部分：宗教改革的伦理思想，以加尔文为代表。
tgt: Part II: the ethical thought of religious reform, represented by Calvin.
hypo: The second part: the ethical ideas of religious reform, represented by Calvin.

src: 第三部分：政治的伦理学，以马基雅维利等人为代表、近代伦理学（17-18世纪，英国经验主义伦理学，代表人物：休谟等，17-18世纪，欧陆理性主义伦理学，代表人物：斯宾诺莎等，18世纪，法国启蒙派伦理学，代表人物：伏尔泰等，18-19世纪，德国学院派伦理学，代表人物：康德与黑格尔等，18-19世纪，英国功利主义伦理学，代表人物：边沁与西基维克等，19世纪，英国进化论伦理学，代表人物：史宾塞与赫胥黎等，19世纪后期，德国新康德主义伦理学，代表人物：李凯儿等，19世纪后期，新黑格尔主义伦理学，代表人物：托马斯·希尔·格林等）、过渡时期伦理学（非理性主义伦理学，代表人物：克尔凯郭儿、叔本华与尼采等）。
tgt: Part III: political ethics, represented by Machiavelli and others; modern ethics (17th-18th century, British empirical ethics, representatives: Hume et al., 17th-18th century, European rationalist ethics, representatives: Spinoza et al., 18th century, French enlightenment ethics, representatives: Voltaire et al., 18th-19th century, German academic ethics, representatives: Kant, Hegel et al., 18th-19th century, British utilitarian ethics, representatives: Bentham, Sikivik et al., 19th century, Britain National evolutionary ethics, representatives: Spencer, Huxley, et al., late 19th century, German Neo Kantian ethics, representatives: Li Kaier et al., late 19th century, Neo Hegelian ethics, representatives: Thomas Hill Green et al.), transitional Ethics (irrational ethics, representatives: Kierkegaard, Schopenhauer, Nietzsche et al.).
hypo: Third part: Political Ethics, represented by Machiavelli and others, modern ethics (17-18th century, British empiricist ethics, represented by Hume, 17-18th century, Continental rationalist ethics, represented by Spinoza, 18th century, French Enlightenment ethics, represented by Voltaire, 18-19th century, German academy ethics, represented by Kant and Hegel, 18-19th century, British utilitarian ethics, represented by Bentham and Sidgwick, 19th century, British evolutionary ethics, represented by Spencer and Huxley, late 19th century, new Kantian ethics in Germany, represented by Rickert, late 19th century, new Hegelian ethics, represented by Thomas Hill Green), transitional ethics (irrationalist ethics, represented by Kierkegaard, Schopenhauer, and Nietzsche, etc.) while including rationalist ethics and irrational ethics.

src: 逻辑学是研究“有效推论和证明的原则与标准”的一门学科。
tgt: Logic is a discipline which studies “the principles and standards of valid argument and proof”.
hypo: Logic is a discipline that studies the principles and standards of effective inference and proof.

src: 逻辑通常包括三个部份：归纳推理、溯因推理和演绎推理，可分为形式逻辑和非形式逻辑。
tgt: Logic usually includes three parts: inductive reasoning, abductive reasoning and deductive reasoning, which can be divided into formal logic and informal logic.
hypo: Logic usually includes three parts: inductive reasoning, abductive reasoning, and deductive reasoning, which can be classified as formal logic and informal logic.

src: 美学是以对美的本质及其意义的研究为主题的学科。
tgt: Aesthetics is a discipline which studies the essence and significance of beauty.
hypo: Aesthetics is a discipline that studies the nature and meaning of beauty.

src: 丁子霖：致友人。
tgt: Ding Zilin: to friends.
hypo: Ding Zilin: To Friends.

src: 本人在此衷心感谢各位朋友在我们亲人遇难后的30多年漫长期间内所给予的人道救助，尤其是在我1994年初曾以个人名义向国内外友人发出过人道救助呼吁以来，迄今为止未曾中断的救助。
tgt: I would like to express my heartfelt thanks to all my friends for their humanitarian assistance for more than 30 years after the death of our family, especially the uninterrupted assistance since I made an appeal for humanitarian assistance to friends at home and abroad in my own name at the beginning of 1994.
hypo: I would like to express my heartfelt gratitude to all friends who have provided humanitarian assistance during the more than 30-year-long period after the loss of our loved ones, especially since my personal appeal for humanitarian assistance to friends both domestically and internationally in early 1994, the aid has continued unbroken till now.

src: 现如今绝大多数遇难者的老父母均已谢世，遗孤们也已长大成家就业。
tgt: Now the old parents of the vast majority of the victims have passed away, and the orphans have also grown up, started working and got married.
hypo: Nowadays, the vast majority of the victims' parents have already passed away, and the orphans have grown up and found work.

src: 是你们的义举帮助我们这些蒙难家庭度过了最为艰难的时刻。
tgt: It is your chivalrous deeds that have helped these families in distress pass the most difficult time.
hypo: It was your chivalrous act that helped us, these families in distress, to pass the most difficult moments.

src: 目前新冠疫情正在全球肆虐，大多数的捐款者也已年届退休。
tgt: At present, COVID-19 is raging around the world, and most donors have retired.
hypo: Currently, the COVID-19 pandemic is wreaking havoc globally, and most of the donors are already retired.

src: 因此，我恳切地请求你们中止给我们难属——天安门母亲群体人道捐款，这项人道救助活动早就应该画上完美的句号了。
tgt: Therefore, I sincerely ask you to stop making humanitarian donations to the family of victims, Tiananmen Mothers group; this humanitarian relief event should have come to a perfect end long ago.
hypo: Therefore, I earnestly request that you stop giving us the Tiananmen Mothers humanitarian relief donations. This humanitarian assistance activity should have ended with a perfect punctuation mark a long time ago.

src: 我将永远铭记你们的爱心，并坚信你们的义举必将为历史铭记。
tgt: I will remember your kindness forever and firmly believe your chivalrous deeds will be remembered by history forever.
hypo: I will forever remember your kindness, and firmly believe that your righteous deed will be remembered by history.

src: 由于种种原因，我只能以此方式表达自己的意愿，请朋友们谅解！
tgt: For various reasons, I can only express my wishes in this way; please understand!
hypo: "Due to various reasons, I can only express my wishes in this way. Please understand, my friends!"

src: 请接受我诚挚的祝福。
tgt: Please accept my sincere wishes.
hypo: Please accept my sincere blessings/wishes.

src: 陶业按：请允许我借此机会，对全美学自联（IFCSS）和明尼苏达中国民主基金会（MCDF）从事人道主义救助32年的历史作一个简单介绍。
tgt: Tao Yean: please allow me to take this opportunity to make a brief introduction to the 32-year history of humanitarian assistance of IFCSS and MCDF.
hypo: Tao Yean: Please allow me to take this opportunity to give a brief introduction to the 32-year history of humanitarian assistance provided by the Chinese Democracy Foundation of Minnesota (MCDF) and the Chinese Students and Scholars Association (IFCSS) in the United States.

src: 在从事人道主义救助的过程中，全美学自联与明尼苏达中国民主基金会是平行的两个组织，项目的执行者常有交叉。
tgt: In the process of humanitarian relief, IFCSS and MCDF are parallel organizations, and there are often intersections between the project executors.
hypo: "In the process of engaging in humanitarian relief, the National Association of Chinese Americans and the Minnesota Chinese Democracy Foundation are parallel organizations that are often cross-involved in executing projects."

src: （苹果日报图：天安門母親網站由陶業負責打理。）pic.twitter.com/UxID9ZGjzm
tgt: (Apple Daily photo: Tiananmen Mother website is managed by Tao Ye. ) pic.twitter.com/UxID9ZGjzm
hypo: Apple Daily image: The Tiananmen Mothers website is managed by Tao Ye.

src: 救助款常常不能顺利送达六四难属手中。
tgt: The relief funds often fail to reach the family of the victims of the June 4th Movement successfully.
hypo: The relief funds often cannot be delivered smoothly into the hands of the victims of the June Fourth Incident.

src: 1994年，经丁老师建议，由“天安门母亲”成立专门小组，统筹和负责人道救助款的接收与分发。
tgt: In 1994, Ding advised that the “Tiananmen Mother” set up a special group to coordinate and take charge of the receipt and distribution of humanitarian relief funds.
hypo: In 1994, Ding advised the "Tiananmen Mothers" to establish a dedicated group to coordinate and be responsible for receiving and distributing humanitarian aid funds.

src: 1998年，MCDF设立《六四孤儿教育基金》，执行11年后，于2009年，在所有六四孤儿都大学毕业后，MCDF继而设立《六四孤苦老人特困户救助基金》，并一直执行至今。
tgt: In 1998, MCDF established the “June 4th Orphan Education Fund”; after 11 years of implementation, in 2009, after all the June 4th orphans graduated from University, MCDF then established the “June 4th Elderly with No Family Destitute Poverty Relief Fund”, which has been implemented until now.
hypo: In 1998, MCDF established the "June Fourth Orphan Education Fund". After 11 years of implementation, in 2009, with all the June Fourth orphans graduating from university, MCDF subsequently established the "June Fourth Elderly Support Fund for the Needy", which has been implemented up until now.

src: 这些项目的资金，主要来自六四当年的校园和社会捐款，来自个人的慷慨捐助，并受到兄弟大学民主基金会的支持。
tgt: The funds for these projects mainly came from campus and social donations of generous individual donations in the year of June 4th event, and were supported by the democracy foundation of brother universities.
hypo: The funds for these projects mainly come from donations of the campus and social contributions during the June Fourth incident, as well as generous donations from individuals, and were supported by the Brother College Democracy Foundation.

src: 自2018年起，还得到了劳改研究基金会的支持。
tgt: Since 2018, it has also been supported by the Reform through Labor Research Foundation.
hypo: Foundation.   Since 2018, we have also received support from the Labor Research Foundation.

src: 直到去年，时隔31年后，六四难属们终于收到了一笔来自香港的当年以六四的名义募捐来的部分捐款。
tgt: Last year, after 31 years, the family of the victims of the June 4th Movement finally received a part of the donation made by Hong Kong in the name of the June 4th Movement.
hypo: Last year, the June Fourth activists finally received a portion of the donations made by Hong Kong in the name of June Fourth, 31 years after the event.

src: 在此期间，《中国人权》也在独立地执行它们的人道救助项目。
tgt: During this period, China Human Rights is also independently implementing their humanitarian relief project.
hypo: During this period, "China Human Rights" also independently implemented their humanitarian relief projects.

src: 我们理解，丁老师叫停六四捐助，是为捐款人考虑，我们也确实都是一些退休老人，收入并非如退休前充裕，特此对丁老师的“致友人”一信表示感谢。
tgt: We understand that Ding called a stop to the June 4th donation for the consideration of the donors; we are indeed retired elderly, and our income is not as much as before; we hereby thank teacher Ding for his “Letter to Friends”.
hypo: We understand that Ding called off the June 4th donation for the consideration of the donors, and we hereby express our gratitude in this letter of "To My Friends" to Ding, as we are indeed retired elderly people whose income is not as abundant as before our retirement.

src: 我们会尊重难属们的决定，在两年内终止这一项目，并在需要时，立即恢复。
tgt: We will respect the decision of the family of the victims and terminate this project within two years and resume it immediately when necessary.
hypo: We will respect the decision of the stakeholders and terminate this project within two years, and resume it immediately when necessary.

src: 对于那些多年来一直坚持慷慨解囊，冒着风险递送人道救助款的那些侠肝义胆的同道们，一并表示感谢和敬意。
tgt: I would like to express my gratitude and respect to those chivalrous fellows who have been giving generously and taking risks to deliver humanitarian relief funds for many years.
hypo: In respect to those chivalrous comrades who have been persistently generous and taking risks to deliver humanitarian aid for many years, we express gratitude and respect to them.

src: 一个想分享个人经历的编程小白。
tgt: I am a programming newbie and I want to share my experience.
hypo: "A programming novice who wants to share personal experiences."

src: 如果是打算在这一行业入行倒是可以选择去找一个地方进行培训，但如果没这方面的想法的话，最好还是自学的好，毕竟培训要花的钱是非常多的，而且还要用6个月的时间去学习。
tgt: If you want to enter this industry, you can choose to find a place to get some training , but if you don’t want to, it’s better to study on your own; after all, trainings are expensive and it will take you six months to learn it.
hypo: "If you plan to enter this industry, you can choose to find a place for training, but if you don't have this idea, it's best to self-study. After all, the money spent on training is very high, and it takes six months to learn."

src: 但如果是打算在这一行业入坑的话培训确实是非常不错的选择，尤其是那些自制力及其弱的人，培训更是非常好的选择。
tgt: However, if you want to enter this industry, then training is a great option, especially for those who are extremely not self-disciplined.
hypo: But if you plan to enter this industry, training is indeed a very good choice, especially for those who are not self-disciplined, training is an excellent choice.

src: 要是自身自制力比较强的话也可以选择自学，只不过会比较累。
tgt: You can choose to teach yourself if you are self-disciplined, but it will be tiring.
hypo: You can choose to self-study if you have strong self-discipline, but it may be more tiring.

src: 当然选择一个好的培训机构是非常重要的事情。
tgt: Certainly, selecting a good training agency is very important.
hypo: Of course, choosing a good training agency is a very important thing.

src: 首先要看这个机构的师资力量，如果师资力量不够强大的话，这个培训机构就没有什么意义了，当然一些新开的培训机构师资力量都不是特别强。
tgt: You need to first look at the faculty of this agency; if it’s not strong enough, you can cross that agency off your list; of course, some new agencies don’t have strong faculties.
hypo: First of all, we need to look at the teaching staff of this agency. If the teaching staff is not strong enough, then this training agency is meaningless. Of course, the teaching staff of some newly opened training agencies is not particularly strong.

src: 其次在选择之前打探一下这个培训机构，最好可以打探一下这个机构出来的学生，毕竟只有机构的学生才知道这个机构到底怎么样，讲解的课程是好或者不好。
tgt: Secondly, you shall do some research on the agency before choosing it; it’s best to contact former students of the agency; after all, only students know how the agency really is and whether the curriculum is good or not.
hypo: Secondly, before making a choice, inquire about the training agency, preferably inquire about the students of the agency, as only the students of the agency know whether the agency is good or not and whether the course explanations are good or not.

src: 你好，其实你这个问题问的我也不知道怎么回答，因为对于你自身的情况并没有做一定的介绍，而学习这个东西和个人自身的情况有很大的关系的。
tgt: Hello, actually I’m not sure how to answer your question since you didn’t introduce your own situation, and learning this is closely related to your situation.
hypo: "Hello, actually I am not sure how to answer your question, because you haven't introduced your situation, and learning this thing has a lot to do with one's personal circumstances."

src: 比如专业、年龄、想学习的语言，甚至在哪个城市，这些都会和你学习或者想要从事的行业有关系的。
tgt: Such as your major, age, the language you want to learn, and even which city you are in; all of these are related to what you want to learn or what industry you want to go into.
hypo: For example, your profession, age, the language you want to learn, and even the city you are in, are all related to the industry you want to pursue or learn about.

src: 如果你是学生的话并且还没有毕业，或者是计算机专业的已经毕业的，那么如果时间充足我个人建议自学，这个是效率和成本最低的，现在很多的线下线上的培训机构其实也很不错，但是一学习成本高，二投入的时间比较多，基本需要集中培训3-6个月。
tgt: If you are a student who haven’t graduated yet, or if you are a computer major and have graduated, then I recommend learning it yourself if you have time, and this is the method with lowest efficiency and cost; many offline and online training agencies are good now, but it comes with great cost and takes a lot of time; it basically needs a concentrated training of three to six months.
hypo: If you are a student and have not graduated yet, or if you have graduated in the field of computer science, I personally recommend self-learning if you have enough time. This is the most efficient and cost-effective way. There are many offline and online training agencies that are actually very good, but basically needs a high learning cost and a lot of time investment, usually requiring 3-6 months of concentrated training.

src: 但是如果是我说的这些情况的话，自学就很方便，现在网络上的很多学习资源都是免费的，或者去b站也有很多的培训资源，如果你不会找资源，你也可以通过简介联系到我，获取免费的资源，或者详细的咨询也行。
tgt: However, if you are in the same situation as I mentioned, it is convenient to learn it yourself; many learning resources are free online, or you can gain access to a lot of training resources on Bilibili; if you don’t know how to search for them, you can contact me according to my bio and get free resources or detailed consultation.
hypo: However, if it's the situations I mentioned, self-learning is very convenient. Many learning resources are free on the internet now, or you can also find a lot of training resources on Bilibili. If you don't know how to find resources, you can also contact me through the introduction to get free resources, or detailed consultation is also available.

src: 另外还有一些比较经典的书籍可以结合视频综合学习。
tgt: There are also classic books to supplement your study with videos.
hypo: In addition, there are some classic books that can be learned comprehensively with videos.

src: 如果你不是计算机专业的，但是也能够支付一定的学习金钱和时间成本，那么建议去培训机构学习，这样学习不用很费劲，老师讲解的也很详细，有问题也有人专门解答，另外在学习规划或者监督方面也有帮助。
tgt: If you are not a computer major, but you can pay certain amount of money and devote your time to your learning, then I suggest you go to an agency to study; it’ll be easier this way as the teachers will explain in detail and there will be designated people answering your questions; in addition, it’ll be helpful to your study planning or help you get supervision.
hypo: are not a computer major but can afford certain costs of learning time and tuition, we suggest you go to a training institution to study. This way, learning will not require much effort, and the teacher will explain things in detail, with someone specially assigned to answer any questions. Additionally, there will be help available for learning planning and supervision.

src: 而且现在很多的培训机构都会签就业协议，有内推名额，学习之后推荐去公司，这样后面找工作的面试环节也能够省不少事情。
tgt: Further, many training agencies will sign employment agreement; they have quota for internal promotion, and you can be recommended to a company after your learning, so that the job interview process can be easier.
hypo: Moreover, many training agencies now sign employment agreements, which include internal promotion opportunities, and recommend students to companies after their study, thus saving a lot of effort in job interviews later.

src: 以上就是我的一些看法，前面说的因为不了解你的情况，所以只大概介绍也并不详细，如果你有其他的想咨询的，可以随时联系我进行交流沟通。
tgt: The above is my opinion; as I said, I don’t know about your situation so my introduction is not detailed; if you want to consult other things, you may contact me any time.
hypo: Above are some of my opinions. What I said earlier was not detailed because I do not know your situation. If you have other questions for consultation, you can contact me anytime for communication and exchange.

src: 本人，承接各种（安装、清洗，维修）、壁挂炉热水器，净水器，洗衣机、空调、马桶、灶头、油烟机、装灯具、擦玻璃，专业美缝，家政服务
tgt: I undertake all kinds of housekeeping services including installation, cleaning, and maintenance of wall mounted water heater, water purifier, washing machine, air conditioner, toilet, stove, range hood, lamp installation, glass cleaning, and professional sewing.
hypo: I undertake various kinds of services including installation, cleaning, and maintenance of wall-mounted gas water heaters, water purifiers, washing machines, air conditioners, toilets, stoves, range hoods, installation of lighting fixtures, glass cleaning, and professional caulking, as well as providing household services.

src: 感谢那些默默给我点赞的人 ，为了生活努力拼搏 生活很累但要继续
tgt: Thanks to everyone who liked my post; I will carry on working hard although life is difficult.
hypo: Thank you to those who silently give me likes, and work hard for their lives. Although life is tiring, we must continue to persist.

src: 生活不会辜负每一个努力的人 ，喜欢就关注我吧 ，感谢那些默默给我点赞的人
tgt: Life will not let hardworking people down; follow me if you like me; thank you to everyone who have liked my post.
hypo: Life will not let hardworking people down, please follow me if you like, and thank those who silently give me likes.

src: 生活就是这样，别人只看结果，自己独撑过程，面对生活，我们除了坚强，就是继续，别无选择，路可以回头看但不能回头走……
tgt: This is life; others only see the result and you must go through it alone; in the face of life, we can only stay strong and carry on; there is no other choice; you can look back on life, but you cannot relive it...
hypo: Life is just like this. Others only see the results, and we have to endure the process alone. Facing life, besides being strong, we have no other choice but to continue. The road can be looked back at but cannot be relived.

src: 保洁是工作，也是职责，生活因服务而美丽，服务因用心而精彩。
tgt: Cleaning is a job and a responsibility; life is more beautiful with services, and services are wonderful because we work hard.
hypo: Cleaning is a job, and also a responsibility. Life becomes beautiful with services, and services are excellent with dedication.

src: 保洁我们虽然做的是最脏的活，但我们会用最认真的态度把客户家每个角落打扫的干干净净，看到客户满意的笑容和竖起的大拇指，那一刻所有的累都值了，付出终有回报！
tgt: Although we do the most dirty work in cleaning, we will try to clean all the corners of the client’s house with our hard work; the moment I see the client’s smile and big thumb up, all the efforts spent are worthwhile; your hard work will pay off!
hypo: Although we do the dirtiest work, as custodians, we will use the most diligent attitude to clean every corner of the customer's home spotlessly. Seeing the smile of satisfaction and the thumbs up from the customer, at that moment, all the exhaustion is worthwhile. There will always be a reward for the effort!

src: 我的日常工作
tgt: My daily work
hypo: My daily work.

src: ——您的要求，我的服务。
tgt: - your requirements, my service.
hypo: Your requirements, my service.

src: 用心服务，用心清洁，留住美好。
tgt: Keep the beauty with attentive service and cleaning.
hypo: Attentive service, attentive cleaning, retain beauty.

src: 您关心的细节，丰桂家政帮你做到了“净”我所能，服务爱家。
tgt: Feng Gui Housekeeping will try our best to care for the details you care about and love your house with our services.
hypo: Our services cared for the details you were concerned about, Fenggui Housekeeping helped achieve the maximum possible cleanliness, and served your beloved home.

src: 保万家洁净，树家政囗碑，服务到位，洁净到家。
tgt: Keep thousands of houses clean, establish a brand of housekeeping; standard service, in-house cleaning.
hypo: Establish a clean and tidy household, plant the home management monument, provide impeccable service, and keep thousands of in-house cleaning.

src: 室内外保洁 ，我的日常工作
tgt: Indoor and outdoor cleaning, my daily work
hypo: Indoor and outdoor cleaning, my daily work.

src: 水晶灯虽然华丽，但长时间不清洗也会黯淡无光，只有清洗后才可以溢放光彩，人生亦是如此
tgt: Although the crystal lamp looks luxurious, it will be dim if it has not cleaned for a long time; only after cleaning, can it shine brightly, and so is life.
hypo: Although crystal lamps are gorgeous, they will become dim and dull if not cleaned for a long time. Only after being cleaned can they shine brightly. Similarly, this is life.

src: 用心去做方能成功，用细致去塑造精致，美缝我们是认真的。
tgt: Do it with heart and we can succeed; we are serious about creating exquisite things with our attention to details, and we are serious about cleaning seams.
hypo: "Do it with care to succeed, create exquisite with meticulousness, we are serious about beautiful seams."

src: 给我机会，一定会让你满意的，质量说明一切，因为专业值得被信赖，你的认可是我最鼓励！
tgt: Give me a chance and you will be satisfied; quality is everything, because professionalism is worth trusting; your recognition is the best encouragement to me!
hypo: Give me a chance, and I will definitely satisfy you. Quality speaks for itself, because professionalism is worthy of trust. Your recognition is my greatest encouragement!

src: 当下的各行各业都不好干啊！
tgt: At present, there is not one industry that is easy to do!
hypo: It's not easy to work in any industry nowadays!

src: 但是我始终相信，只要认真态度，够坚持，够努力，我就会比别人好一点，至少总比坐着抱怨强吧”！
tgt: But I always believe that as long as I am serious, persistent and hard-working, I will be slightly better than others; it’s at least better than sitting around and complaining!”
hypo: But I always believe that as long as I have a serious attitude, enough perseverance, and enough effort, I will be better than others, at least better than those who sit and complain!

src: 一天之计在于晨，所有的美好从清晨开始 希望你携带着快乐、幸运、健康、如意出发 开始新的一天，保持一整天的好心情 早安
tgt: Morning is the most important time of the day; all the good things begin in the morning; I hope you can start a new day with happiness, luck, health and joy; keep a good mood all day long; good morning.
hypo: the key to the day. All the good things start from the morning. I hope you depart with happiness, luck, health, and fulfillment to start a new day and maintain a good mood throughout the day. Good morning.

src: 小时候，幸福是一件东西，拥有就幸福； 长大后，幸福是一个目标，达到就幸福； 成熟后发现，幸福原来是一种心态，领悟就幸福。
tgt: When we were children, happiness was a thing, and we were happy when we had it; when we grow up, happiness is a goal, and we will be happy when we reach it; after maturity, I found that happiness is actually a state of mind, and understanding is happiness.
hypo: "When I was young, happiness was something that, if you possessed it, you were happy; when you grow up, happiness becomes a goal, and if you achieve it, you are happy; when you mature, you realize that happiness is actually a state of mind, and if you understand it, you are happy."

src: 做最真实最善良的自己，依心而行，无憾今生；人生一条路，走自己的路；人生两件宝：身体好、心情好，漂漂亮亮活到老！
tgt: Be the truest and kindest self, act according to your heart, and leave no regrets in your life; life is a road, go your own way; there are two treasures in life: good health and good mood, and you will live a beautiful life!
hypo: Be your most authentic and kind self, follow your heart, and have no regrets in your life. You have one path in life, so walk your own path. There are two treasures in life: good health and a good mood, live beautifully until old age!

src: 人生的每个阶段，都会遇到不同的难题。
tgt: We will encounter different difficulties in different stages of life.
hypo: We will encounter different difficulties at every stage of life.

src: 很多时候，束缚住你的并不是能力，而是积极面对的勇气。
tgt: Often times, what is restraining you is not you ability but your courage to face it actively.
hypo: Many times, what restrains you is not your ability, but the courage to face it actively.

src: 既然无法躲避，不如坦然面对。
tgt: Since you cannot hide, you’d rather face it.
hypo: Since it's impossible to avoid, it's better to face it calmly.

src: 你越害怕，越会被困难击倒；你若迎难而上，问题终会迎刃而解。
tgt: The more scared you are, the easier you will be knocked down by difficulties; if you take it head on, the problem will be solved.
hypo: The more scared you are, the more likely you will be knocked down by difficulties; if you face them head-on, the problem will eventually be solved.

src: 二、虽然右派在历史上有得志时代，但不长，所以短是因为给点儿阳光就灿烂，喝点儿开水就出汗；稍得志便得陇望蜀，遭打击便毛将焉附。
tgt: 2. Although the Rightists had their time in history, it was not long, and the reason why it was short was they were over their head once they got a tiny bit of sweetness; a little success will lead to insatiable desires, and just one blow and they will lose their ground to exist.
hypo: Although the right-wing had its heyday in history, it was short-lived because they easily flourished when given a little sunshine, but sweated when drinking a little hot water. They were quick to desire more when they had some achievements and ground to a halt when faced with setbacks.

src: 但实事求是来说，右派在社会进步过程中起到过积极作用。
tgt: But to speak the truth, the Rightists have once played a positive role in the process of social progress.
hypo: Speaking truthfully, Rightists have played a positive role in the process of social progress.

src: 从结束文革定义真理标准，发展经济提高科技以及促进行政制度化和人权保障等方面，右派的积极意义不该否定。
tgt: The positive significance of the Rightists should not be denied in terms of ending the cultural revolution, defining the standard of truth, developing the economy, improving science and technology, and promoting the institutionalization of administration and the protection of human rights.
hypo: The positive significance of the right-wing should not be denied in defining the standards of truth, developing the economy and improving technology, promoting the institutionalization of governance, and safeguarding human rights since the end of the Cultural Revolution.

src: 三、就我而言，尽管不完全同意李伟东的有些说法，但我很在意他的说法，也很尊重李伟东这个人；因为他是认真的，他对中国是认真的，对中国的社会问题也是认真看待的。
tgt: 3. For me, although I don’t fully agree with some of Li Weidong’s statements, I really care about his statements and respect Li Weidong; Because he is conscientious, he is serious about China, and he also takes China’s social problems seriously.
hypo: "Thirdly, as far as I am concerned, although I do not completely agree with some of Li Weidong's statements, I care a lot about what he says and also respect him because he is serious, serious about China and takes China's social problems seriously."

src: 但我反对他的反共理论，我认为反必要革命，革命则必然导致社会动荡，民生受损，政治团体鱼龙混杂泥沙俱下，再就是外国趁虚而入。
tgt: But I oppose his anti-communist theory; I believe that unnecessary revolution should be opposed to; revolution will inevitably lead to social unrest and damage to people’s livelihood; political groups will be mixed, and foreign countries will avail themselves of the opportunity to get in.
hypo: But I oppose his anti-communist theory, I believe that opposing is not necessary for revolution, and revolution will inevitably lead to social turmoil, damage to people's livelihoods, political groups will be mixed with good and bad, and there will be an opportunity for foreign intervention.

src: 四、改变或改善中国要有耐心和为国为民负责的态度，政治投机企图火中取栗者，那不是右派，是混蛋。
tgt: 4. Changing or improving China requires patience and the attitude to be responsible for the country and the people; those who try to make money from political opportunities are not Rightists, but bastards.
hypo: "Fourthly, changing or improving China requires patience and a responsible attitude towards the country and the people. Those who engage in political opportunism and try to seize the opportunity for selfish gain are not Rightists, but rather scoundrels."

src: 再聊聊左。
tgt: Let’s talk about Leftists.
hypo: 's talk about the left again.

src: 左，其实是一帮时代和政治的弃儿。
tgt: Leftists, in fact, are a group of outcasts of the times and politics.
hypo: , actually, a group of abandoned children of the times and politics.  Leftists, actually, are a group of abandoned children of the times and politics.

src: 如果说右具有对社会的积极意义，共产党还会在需要的时候听取一些右的言论和分析他们的思想，那么左就没这造化了，因为左所要的正是共产党所扔掉的糟粕！
tgt: If the Rightists are of positive significance to society, and the Communist Party will listen to some of the Rightists’ remarks and analyze their thoughts when necessary, the Leftists don’t have such luck, because what the Leftists want is the dross thrown away by the Communist Party!
hypo: If the Rightists have a positive significance for the society, the Communist Party will still listen to some of their speeches and analyze their ideas when needed. However, the Leftists do not have this blessing, because what they want is exactly what the Communist Party has discarded!

src: 五、最近看到一些朋友边怼反贼边驳左癫，还挺动真气，我觉得大可不必。
tgt: 5. Recently, I saw some friends refuting the rebels and crazy Leftists at the same time, and they got really angry; I don't think it’s necessary at all.
hypo: 5. Recently, I saw some friends refuting the anti-revolutionaries while also debunking leftist ideas, and they were quite passionate. However, I don't think it's necessary.

src: 跟汉奸跟左癫都不要试图讲理，都是一根儿筋，无理可讲。
tgt: Don’t try to reason with rebels and crazy Leftists; they are all one track minded and unreasonable.
hypo: "Don't even try to reason with traitors or crazy rebels, they are all stubborn and irrational."

src: 也不要试图证明咱们是正确的，更不要想着让反贼和左癫承认，何必呢？
tgt: Don’t try to prove we are right, and don’t even think about asking rebels and crazy Leftists to admit it; why bother?
hypo: Don't try to prove that we are right, and don't even think about getting rebels and leftists to admit it. What's the point?

src: 我这样告诉朋友们：当反贼骂你五毛，当左癫骂你右狗的时候，恰恰证明我们的这条中间道路是正确的！
tgt: I told my friends: when the rebels call you a fifty-cent and when the leftist call you a rightist dog, they prove we are on the correct track in the middle!
hypo: I tell my friends like this: when rebels call you a "50 cent party" and leftists call you "right dog", it precisely proves that we are on the correct track in the middle way!

src: 许多人少年时候也有理想，老了之后，却忘了理想，或追求理想，却沦为偏执。
tgt: Many people had dreams when they were young, but they forgot about them when they got older; or, they pursue their dreams and become paranoid.
hypo: Many people had ideals when they were young, but after getting old, they forgot their ideals or pursued their ideals but became paranoid.

src: 和理想渐行渐远，甚至屠龙少年终成恶龙。
tgt: They drift apart from their dreams and the young Dragon Slayer will eventually become a vicious dragon.
hypo: As he drifted away from his dreams, even the Dragon Slayer eventually became a vicious Dragon.

src: 左右我觉得一般是指约束和自由，中国从历史文化的先天基因导致中国整体应该是偏左。
tgt: I think left and right generally refers to restraint and freedom; the innate genes of China’s history and culture make China overall relatively left.
hypo: "Referring to constraints and freedom, the term 'left and right' in my opinion generally means that overall, China's history and cultural genes predispose it to be left-leaning."

src: 而国内右派自由，注重效率和发展，左派加强监管，更注重公平以及安全。
tgt: The domestic Rightists are free and stress efficiency and development, while the Leftists strengthen supervision and pay more attention to fairness and safety.
hypo: Meanwhile, domestic Rightists prioritize freedom, efficiency, and development, while Leftists emphasize strengthened regulation, greater emphasis on fairness, and safety.

src: 现在社会总体希望更注重公平，同时中美相争，偏左是肯定的，估计还得持续很多年。
tgt: At present, society overall hopes to pay more attention to justice; at the same time, it is certain that when China and the United States fight, it is bound to lean towards left, which is estimated to continue for many years.
hypo: At present, the overall society hopes to pay more attention to fairness, while the US-China conflict means that leaning left is certain, and it is estimated that it will continue for many years.

src: 虽然看不懂，点赞就完事儿啦
tgt: Just like it if you don’t understand.
hypo: 't have to understand it, just like it and it's done.

src: 啥也不说了，花花就是这么仗义
tgt: No need to say more, Huahua is generous.
hypo: Not saying anything, there's no need to, Huahua is just that righteous.

src: 近两年，美帝对华为芯片的封锁和围堵，不仅让华为陷入前所未有的困境，也让“美系”企业遭遇巨大的损失。
tgt: In the past two years, the blockade and interception of the US on Huawei chips not only made Huawei fall into an unprecedented difficult position but also made “American” enterprises suffer from huge losses.
hypo: In the past two years, the blockade and containment of Huawei's chips by the United States has not only made Huawei face unprecedented difficulties, but also caused huge losses for "American" enterprises.

src: 美帝打压中国芯片产业，要求自家企业及盟友国相关企业同时对我国芯片产业进行封锁，直接导致的后果就是全球芯片供应商的订单和利润受到影响，造成芯片生产企业的研发投入降低、产能下降，从而造成了全球范围内芯片供应链的短缺的紊乱。
tgt: The US suppresses China’s chips industry and required its own enterprises and relevant enterprises of its allies to block China’s chip industry at the same time; the direct consequence was that the number of orders and profits of global chip suppliers were affected, resulting in the decrease in the investment of research and development and production capacity of chip manufacturers, which further led to the disorder of chip supply chain shortages on a global scale.
hypo: The American empire is suppressing China's chip industry, demanding that its own companies and allied companies block China's chip industry at the same time. The direct result is that orders and profits of global chip suppliers are affected, causing a decrease in R&D investment and production capacity of chip manufacturing companies, thereby causing a disruption in the global chip supply chain and a shortage of chips.

src: 如今“缺芯”已经波及到了全球各大行业，比如车企停产、手机涨价，几乎所有用到芯片的行业都深受其害。
tgt: Today, “lack of chips” has affected all major industries of the world, resulting in the suspension of production of car enterprises and rise in prices of mobile phones; almost all the industries using chips are greatly impacted.
hypo: Nowadays, "chip shortage" has affected industries of various kinds globally, such as the suspension of car production and the rise in phone prices, almost all industries that use chips have been seriously affected by it.

src: 为了掌握“芯片”自主权，越来越多国家的科技巨头开始走向“去美化”的道路。
tgt: To gain the right to make their own decisions on “chips”, more and more countries’ tech giants are taking the path of “de-Americanized”.
hypo: In order to gain control of the autonomy in "chips", an increasing number of tech giants in various countries are making decisions to walk down the de-Americanized path.

src: 为了牢牢把控全球半导体控制权，牵制中国半导体行业的发展，最近老美动作频频，又是主持“芯片峰会”；又是邀请64国巨头成立半导体联盟，并拔款扶持美国本土科技巨头，比如，美帝老牌科技巨头英特尔为了夺回在芯片领域的主导地位，斥资200亿美元在美国亚利桑那州建2座晶圆加工厂，并对外开放芯片代工业务。
tgt: In order to firmly holding the right to control global semiconductor in its hands and pin down the development of China’s semiconductor industry, the United States have made frequent moves recently such as hosting the “chip summit”, inviting the giants of 64 countries to establish a semiconductor alliance and allocating funds to support the local technology giants in the United States; in order to regain its leading position in the chip industry, Intel, an old technology giant in the United States, spent $ 20 billion to build two wafer processing plants in Arizona, US and opened its chip OEM business.
hypo: Recently, to firmly grasp the global semiconductor control and restrain the development of the Chinese semiconductor industry, the Americans have been taking frequent actions, hosting a "chip summit," inviting giants from 64 countries to establish a semiconductor alliance, and providing financial support to local technology giants. For example, the long-established American technology giant, Intel, has invested 20 billion US dollars to build two wafer processing factories in Arizona to recapture its dominant position in the chip field and has opened up its chip foundry business to the giants in this industry.

src: 当大多数人都以为，英特尔此番举动将对台积电造成一定冲击，并很有可能抢走台积电的“饭碗”。
tgt: When most people think Intel’s move will make certain impact on Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company and even steal their job.
hypo: When most people thought that Intel's move would have a certain impact on TSMC and was very likely to take away TSMC's "rice bowl".

src: 之所以这么肯定，是因为，英特尔作为美帝老牌科技巨头，在半导体领域深耕几十年，拥有大量的人才队伍和技术储备，必定能在短期内迅速崛起，打败台积电。
tgt: They are sure about it because Intel, as an old tech giant in the US, worked diligently in the semiconductor industry for dozens of years and have a large amount of talent teams and technological reserve; it is bound to rise within a short time and defeat Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company.
hypo: The reason why I am so certain is that Intel, as an old-school American technology giant, has been deeply involved in the semiconductor industry for decades and has a vast amount of talented teams and technological reserves, which will definitely enable it to rapidly rise and defeat TSMC in a short period of time.

src: 然而，对于英特尔的这个决定，台积电创始人张忠谋却不屑一顾。
tgt: However, Zhang Zhongmou, founder of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company, sniffed at the decision of Intel.
hypo: "However, the founder of TSMC, Zhang Zhongmou, disdainfully ignored this decision by Intel."

src: 在今年四月举行的“2021大师智库论坛”上，张忠谋语出惊人，对于英特尔斥资建晶圆厂这个举动，张忠谋毫无顾忌直言：英特尔建芯片代工厂，相当讽刺。
tgt: At the “2021 Master Think Tank Forum” held in April this year, Zhang Zhongmou made a surprising remark and spoke bluntly about Intel’s move to build a wafer factory, “it is rather ironic for Intel to build an OEM factory of chips”.
hypo: At the "2021 Master Think Tank Forum" held in April this year, Zhang Zhongmou made a shocking statement about Intel's move to build a wafer factory. Without reservation, Zhang Zhongmou stated: It is quite ironic for Intel to build a chip foundry.

src: 张忠谋之所以对英特尔进军晶圆领域颇为不屑，是因为张忠谋对30多年前台积电与英特尔的一段恩怨依然耿耿于怀。
tgt: Zhang Zhongmou disdained Intel’s decision to get into the wafer industry because Zhang Zhong still holds a grudge against a feud between Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company and Intel more than 30 years.
hypo: The reason why Zhang Zhongmou is quite disdainful of Intel's entry into the wafer industry is because Zhang Zhongmou still holds a grudge against a dispute between TSMC and Intel over 30 years ago.

src: 上世纪六七十年代，英特尔一直是美帝制造业中的明珠，雄居全球巅峰的位置，是世界半导体领域的霸主。
tgt: In the 1960s and 1970s, Intel has been the pearl in the manufacturing industry of the United States, occupying the leading position in the world; it was a king in the semiconductor industry in the world.
hypo: In the 1960s and 1970s, Intel was always a shining star in the American manufacturing industry, occupying a leading position in the world and being a dominant player in the global semiconductor industry.

src: 到上世纪80年代，世界半导体高端芯片一直被少数强者掌握。
tgt: Until the 1980s, the world's high-end semiconductor chips have been controlled by a few strong ones.
hypo: Until the 1980s, the high-end semiconductor chips in the world were always controlled by a few strong ones.

src: 当时半导体行业以IDM模式为特征，芯片从设计、制造到封测都是由一家工厂来完成，英特尔就是那个时代的代表。
tgt: At that time, the semiconductor industry was characterized by IDM mode; chips were designed, manufactured and sealed by the same factory, and Intel was a representative of that era.
hypo: At that time, the semiconductor industry was characterized by the IDM mode, where the design, manufacturing, and testing of chips were all completed by a single factory, and Intel was the representative of that era.

src: 然而这样的模式让一些小企业不堪重负，很多半导体创业者面对巨额的产线建设费用只能望而却步。
tgt: However, such a model has overwhelmed some small enterprises, and many semiconductor entrepreneurs could only flinch in the face of huge production line construction costs.
hypo: However, this mode makes some small businesses unsustainable, and many semiconductor entrepreneurs have to back down in the face of huge production line construction costs.

src: 在市场需求的感召下，进入80年代后，芯片行业开始出现分工合作的现象，1984年张忠谋听说有专门做芯片设计的公司，便认为既然有专门做设计的，那么就可以成立一家专门用于晶圆制造的工厂。
tgt: To respond to the calling of market demand, after entering the 1980s, the phenomenon of division of labor and cooperation of chips industry began to appear; in 1984, Zhang Zhongmou heard that there were companies specializing in chip design, so he thought that since there were companies specializing in design, a factory specializing in wafer manufacturing could be established.
hypo: Under the influence of market demand, the chips industry began to show a phenomenon of division of labor and cooperation in the 1980s. In 1984, when Zhang Zhongmou heard about a company specializing in chip design, he thought that since there were dedicated designers, he could establish a factory solely for wafer manufacturing.

src: 不久之后，张忠谋的设想变成了现实，台积电应运而生。
tgt: Soon after, Zhang Zhongmou’s imagination became reality, and Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company was created.
hypo: Shortly thereafter, Zhang Zhongmou's imagination became a reality, and TSMC emerged.

src: 台积电把主营业务瞄准了“晶圆加工”这个单一环节，不进行设计，只提供晶圆制造的代工服务。
tgt: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company aimed to set the single link of “processing of wafers” as its primary business; without design, only OEM services of wafer manufacturing was provided.
hypo: TSMC has aimed its core business at the "wafer manufacturing" single link, without designing, only providing OEM services for wafer manufacturing.

src: 当时刚创立的台积电，在英特尔这个巨无霸面前就是小喽啰。
tgt: The newly established Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company was only a small player in front of Intel the giant.
hypo: At that time, the recently established TSMC was just a small fry in front of the giant Intel.

src: 为了获取资本支持，张忠谋就曾找英特尔投资，但当时英特尔一听说台积电只做芯片行业的制造环节，显然有些自视甚高，看不起台积电，果断拒绝对台积电进行投资。
tgt: In order to gain capital support, Zhang Zhongmou once approached Intel for investment, but Intel was arrogant when it heard Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company only participated in the manufacturing of the chips industry; Intel looked down on Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company and resolutely refused to invest in it.
hypo: In order to obtain capital support, Zhang Zhongmou once sought investment from Intel. However, when Intel heard that Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company only engaged in the manufacturing of chips within the industry, they seemed somewhat arrogant and looked down upon Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company, and decisively refused to invest in it.

src: 张忠谋也认定英特尔当时是看不起晶圆制程服务的。
tgt: Zhang Zhongmou also believed that Intel despised wafer manufacturing services at that time.
hypo: that time, looked down upon, wafer fabrication process.  "Zhang Zhongmou also believed that Intel at that time looked down upon services at wafer fabrication process."

src: 没想到当年看不起晶圆制造服务的巨头，如今却也要开始做晶圆代工。
tgt: Unexpectedly, the giant that looked down on wafer manufacturing services back in the days will also start to do wafer foundry now.
hypo: I never expected that the giant who looked down upon wafer manufacturing services back then would have to start doing wafer outsourcing today.

src: 所以，张忠谋觉得英特尔进入晶圆代工很讽刺。
tgt: Therefore, Zhang Zhongmou thinks it is ironic for Intel to work on wafer foundry.
hypo: So, Zhang Zhongmou felt it ironic for Intel to enter the wafer foundry business.

src: 如今台积电的市值已经超过了英特尔。
tgt: The market value of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company has surpassed that of Intel.
hypo: Taiwan Semiconductor's market value has surpassed that of Intel.

src: 面对台积电的强势进攻，英特尔自然也是不敢固步自封。
tgt: Facing the powerful attack of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company, Intel naturally dares not to stand still.
hypo: Facing the strong attack of TSMC, Intel naturally cannot stand still.

src: 如今，台积电已经向着3nm芯片冲刺，而英特尔仍然停留在7年前的14nm。
tgt: Now, Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company is trying to develop to the 3nm chips, and Intel still stays at the 14nm 7 years ago.
hypo: Nowadays, the Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company (TSMC) is trying to sprint towards 3nm chips, while Intel still remains at 14nm from 7 years ago.

src: 想要赶超其实并非易事。
tgt: It is actually not difficulty to surpass it.
hypo: It is not easy to catch up.

src: 今天来看一些【奇怪的热搜】。

tgt: Select three trending topics randomly, the rise of the head of the dragon on the 2nd of February, the price rise of ORLON, and the Huolala incident; the public opinion spread to form a peak, and then the [index declined] to form a (smooth curve) until it finally dissipated; if a secondary public opinion occurs, there will be a small hump again.

Public opinion spreads and forms a peak, and then the index decreases (smooth curve) and eventually dissipates.
